   2:  define("DIRECTION_VERTICAL"        , 690001);
   3:  define("DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL"      , 690002);

   5:  define("SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT"       , 690101);
   6:  define("SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM"       , 690102);
   7: 
   8:  define("SCALE_MODE_FLOATING"       , 690201);
   9:  define("SCALE_MODE_START0"     , 690202);
  10:  define("SCALE_MODE_ADDALL"     , 690203);
  11:  define("SCALE_MODE_ADDALL_START0"  , 690204);
  12:  define("SCALE_MODE_MANUAL"     , 690205);
  13: 
  14:  define("SCALE_SKIP_NONE"       , 690301);
  15:  define("SCALE_SKIP_SAME"       , 690302);
  16:  define("SCALE_SKIP_NUMBERS"        , 690303);

  18:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_TOPLEFT"        , 690401);
  19:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE"      , 690402);
  20:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_TOPRIGHT"       , 690403);
  21:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT"     , 690404);
  22:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE"   , 690405);
  23:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT"    , 690406);
  24:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMLEFT"     , 690407);
  25:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE"   , 690408);
  26:  define("TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMRIGHT"    , 690409);
  27: 
  28:  define("POSITION_TOP"                  , 690501);
  29:  define("POSITION_BOTTOM"               , 690502);
  30: 
  31:  define("LABEL_POS_LEFT"        , 690601);
  32:  define("LABEL_POS_CENTER"      , 690602);
  33:  define("LABEL_POS_RIGHT"       , 690603);
  34:  define("LABEL_POS_TOP"         , 690604);
  35:  define("LABEL_POS_BOTTOM"      , 690605);
  36:  define("LABEL_POS_INSIDE"      , 690606);
  37:  define("LABEL_POS_OUTSIDE"     , 690607);
  38: 
  39:  define("ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL"    , 690701);
  40:  define("ORIENTATION_VERTICAL"      , 690702);
  41:  define("ORIENTATION_AUTO"      , 690703);

  43:  define("LEGEND_NOBORDER"       , 690800);
  44:  define("LEGEND_BOX"            , 690801);
  45:  define("LEGEND_ROUND"          , 690802);
  46: 
  47:  define("LEGEND_VERTICAL"       , 690901);
  48:  define("LEGEND_HORIZONTAL"     , 690902);
  49: 
  50:  define("LEGEND_FAMILY_BOX"     , 691051);
  51:  define("LEGEND_FAMILY_CIRCLE"      , 691052);
  52:  define("LEGEND_FAMILY_LINE"        , 691053);
  53: 
  54:  define("DISPLAY_AUTO"          , 691001);
  55:  define("DISPLAY_MANUAL"        , 691002);
  56: 
  57:  define("LABELING_ALL"          , 691011);
  58:  define("LABELING_DIFFERENT"        , 691012);
  59: 
  60:  define("BOUND_MIN"         , 691021);
  61:  define("BOUND_MAX"         , 691022);
  62:  define("BOUND_BOTH"            , 691023);
  63: 
  64:  define("BOUND_LABEL_POS_TOP"       , 691031);
  65:  define("BOUND_LABEL_POS_BOTTOM"    , 691032);
  66:  define("BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO"      , 691033);
  67: 
  68:  define("CAPTION_LEFT_TOP"      , 691041);
  69:  define("CAPTION_RIGHT_BOTTOM"      , 691042);
  70: 
  71:  define("GRADIENT_SIMPLE"       , 691051);
  72:  define("GRADIENT_EFFECT_CAN"       , 691052);
  73:

  75:  define("LABEL_TITLE_BACKGROUND"    , 691062);

  78:  define("LABEL_POINT_CIRCLE"        , 691072);
  79:  define("LABEL_POINT_BOX"       , 691073);

  84:  define("ALL"       , 69);
  85:  define("NONE"      , 31);
  86:  define("AUTO"      , 690000);
  87:  define("OUT_OF_SIGHT"  , -10000000000000);
  88: 
  89:  /**
  90:  * pDraw - class extension with drawing methods
  91:  * This file can be distributed under the license you can find at
  92:  *                     http://www.pchart.net/license
  93:  * You can find the whole class documentation on the pChart web site.
  94:  *
  95:  * @version    2.1.3
  96:  * @package    pChart
  97:  * @subpackage classes
  98:  * @author     Jean-Damien POGOLOTTI
  99:  * 
 100:  */
 101:  class pDraw
 102:   {
 103:    /* Returns the number of drawable series */
 104:    function countDrawableSeries()
 105:     {
 106:      $Results = 0;
 107:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
 108: 
 109:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
 110:       { if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] ) { $Results++; } }
 111: 
 112:      return($Results);
 113:     }
 114: 
 115:    /* Fix box coordinates */
 116:    function fixBoxCoordinates($Xa,$Ya,$Xb,$Yb)
 117:     {
 118:      $X1 = min($Xa,$Xb); $Y1 = min($Ya,$Yb);
 119:      $X2 = max($Xa,$Xb); $Y2 = max($Ya,$Yb);
 120: 
 121:      return(array($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2));
 122:     }
 123: 
 124:    /* Draw a polygon */
 125:    function drawPolygon($Points,$Format="")
 126:     {
 127:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 128:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 129:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 130:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 131:      $NoFill        = isset($Format["NoFill"]) ? $Format["NoFill"] : FALSE;
 132:      $NoBorder      = isset($Format["NoBorder"]) ? $Format["NoBorder"] : FALSE;
 133:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $R;
 134:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $G;
 135:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $B;
 136:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : $Alpha / 2;
 137:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
 138:      $SkipX     = isset($Format["SkipX"]) ? $Format["SkipX"] : OUT_OF_SIGHT;
 139:      $SkipY     = isset($Format["SkipY"]) ? $Format["SkipY"] : OUT_OF_SIGHT;
 140: 
 141:      /* Calling the ImageFilledPolygon() function over the $Points array will round it */   
 142:      $Backup = $Points;
 143: 
 144:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
 145: 
 146:      if ( $SkipX != OUT_OF_SIGHT ) { $SkipX = floor($SkipX); }
 147:      if ( $SkipY != OUT_OF_SIGHT ) { $SkipY = floor($SkipY); }
 148: 
 149:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 150:      if ( !$NoFill )
 151:       {
 152:        if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 153:         {
 154:          $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 155:          for($i=0;$i<=count($Points)-1;$i=$i+2)
 156:           { $Shadow[] = $Points[$i] + $this->ShadowX; $Shadow[] = $Points[$i+1] + $this->ShadowY; }
 157:          $this->drawPolygon($Shadow,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa,"NoBorder"=>TRUE));
 158:         }
 159: 
 160:        $FillColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 161: 
 162:        if ( count($Points) >= 6 )
 163:         { ImageFilledPolygon($this->Picture,$Points,count($Points)/2,$FillColor); }
 164:       }
 165: 
 166:      if ( !$NoBorder )
 167:       {
 168:        $Points = $Backup;
 169: 
 170:        if ( $NoFill )
 171:         $BorderSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
 172:        else
 173:         $BorderSettings = array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha);
 174: 
 175:        for($i=0;$i<=count($Points)-1;$i=$i+2)
 176:         {
 177:          if ( isset($Points[$i+2]) )
 178:           {
 179:            if ( !($Points[$i] == $Points[$i+2] && $Points[$i] == $SkipX ) && !($Points[$i+1] == $Points[$i+3] && $Points[$i+1] == $SkipY ) )
 180:             $this->drawLine($Points[$i],$Points[$i+1],$Points[$i+2],$Points[$i+3],$BorderSettings);
 181:           }
 182:          else
 183:           {
 184:            if ( !($Points[$i] == $Points[0] && $Points[$i] == $SkipX ) && !($Points[$i+1] == $Points[1] && $Points[$i+1] == $SkipY ) )
 185:             $this->drawLine($Points[$i],$Points[$i+1],$Points[0],$Points[1],$BorderSettings);
 186:           }
 187:         }
 188:       }
 189: 
 190:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
 191:     }
 192: 
 193:    /* Apply AALias correction to the rounded box boundaries */
 194:    function offsetCorrection($Value,$Mode)
 195:     {
 196:      $Value = round($Value,1);
 197: 
 198:      if ( $Value == 0 && $Mode == 1 ) { return(.9); }
 199:      if ( $Value == 0 ) { return(0); }
 200: 
 201:      if ( $Mode == 1) 
 202:       { if ( $Value == 1 ) { return(.9); }; if ( $Value == .1 ) { return(.9); }; if ( $Value == .2 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .3 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .4 ) { return(.7); }; if ( $Value == .5 ) { return(.5); }; if ( $Value == .6 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .7 ) { return(.7); }; if ( $Value == .8 ) { return(.6); }; if ( $Value == .9 ) { return(.9); }; }
 203: 
 204:      if ( $Mode == 2) 
 205:       { if ( $Value == 1 ) { return(.9); }; if ( $Value == .1 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .2 ) { return(.2); }; if ( $Value == .3 ) { return(.3); }; if ( $Value == .4 ) { return(.4); }; if ( $Value == .5 ) { return(.5); }; if ( $Value == .6 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .7 ) { return(.7); }; if ( $Value == .8 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .9 ) { return(.9); }; }
 206: 
 207:      if ( $Mode == 3) 
 208:       { if ( $Value == 1 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .1 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .2 ) { return(.2); }; if ( $Value == .3 ) { return(.3); }; if ( $Value == .4 ) { return(.4); }; if ( $Value == .5 ) { return(.9); }; if ( $Value == .6 ) { return(.6); }; if ( $Value == .7 ) { return(.7); }; if ( $Value == .8 ) { return(.4); }; if ( $Value == .9 ) { return(.5); }; }
 209: 
 210:      if ( $Mode == 4) 
 211:       { if ( $Value == 1 ) { return(-1); }; if ( $Value == .1 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .2 ) { return(.2); }; if ( $Value == .3 ) { return(.3); }; if ( $Value == .4 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .5 ) { return(-.1); }; if ( $Value == .6 ) { return(.8); }; if ( $Value == .7 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .8 ) { return(.1); }; if ( $Value == .9 ) { return(.1); }; }
 212:     }
 213: 
 214:    /* Draw a rectangle with rounded corners */
 215:    function drawRoundedRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Radius,$Format="")
 216:     {
 217:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 218:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 219:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 220:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 221: 
 222:      list($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2) = $this->fixBoxCoordinates($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 223: 
 224:      if ( $X2 - $X1 < $Radius ) { $Radius = floor((($X2-$X1))/2); }
 225:      if ( $Y2 - $Y1 < $Radius ) { $Radius = floor((($Y2-$Y1))/2); }
 226: 
 227:      $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"NoBorder"=>TRUE);
 228: 
 229:      if ( $Radius <= 0 ) { $this->drawRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color); return(0); }
 230: 
 231:      if ( $this->Antialias )
 232:       {
 233:        $this->drawLine($X1+$Radius,$Y1,$X2-$Radius,$Y1,$Color);
 234:        $this->drawLine($X2,$Y1+$Radius,$X2,$Y2-$Radius,$Color);
 235:        $this->drawLine($X2-$Radius,$Y2,$X1+$Radius,$Y2,$Color);
 236:        $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1+$Radius,$X1,$Y2-$Radius,$Color);
 237:       }
 238:      else
 239:       {
 240:        $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 241:        imageline($this->Picture,$X1+$Radius,$Y1,$X2-$Radius,$Y1,$Color);
 242:        imageline($this->Picture,$X2,$Y1+$Radius,$X2,$Y2-$Radius,$Color);
 243:        imageline($this->Picture,$X2-$Radius,$Y2,$X1+$Radius,$Y2,$Color);
 244:        imageline($this->Picture,$X1,$Y1+$Radius,$X1,$Y2-$Radius,$Color);
 245:       }
 246: 
 247:      $Step = 360 / (2 * PI * $Radius);
 248:      for($i=0;$i<=90;$i=$i+$Step)
 249:       {
 250:        $X = cos(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 251:        $Y = sin(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $Y1 + $Radius;
 252:        $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 253: 
 254:        $X = cos(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 255:        $Y = sin(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $Y2 - $Radius;
 256:        $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 257: 
 258:        $X = cos($i*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 259:        $Y = sin($i*PI/180) * $Radius + $Y2 - $Radius;
 260:        $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 261: 
 262:        $X = cos(($i+270)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 263:        $Y = sin(($i+270)*PI/180) * $Radius + $Y1 + $Radius;
 264:        $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 265:       }
 266:     }
 267: 
 268:    /* Draw a rectangle with rounded corners */
 269:    function drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Radius,$Format="")
 270:     {
 271:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 272:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 273:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 274:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
 275:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
 276:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
 277:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 278:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
 279: 
 280:      /* Temporary fix for AA issue */
 281:      $Y1 = floor($Y1); $Y2 = floor($Y2); $X1 = floor($X1); $X2 = floor($X2);
 282: 
 283:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
 284:      if ( $BorderR == -1 ) { $BorderR = $R; $BorderG = $G; $BorderB = $B; }
 285: 
 286:      list($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2) = $this->fixBoxCoordinates($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 287: 
 288:      if ( $X2 - $X1 < $Radius*2 ) { $Radius = floor((($X2-$X1))/4); }
 289:      if ( $Y2 - $Y1 < $Radius*2 ) { $Radius = floor((($Y2-$Y1))/4); }
 290: 
 291:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 292:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 293:       {
 294:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 295:        $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1+$this->ShadowX,$Y1+$this->ShadowY,$X2+$this->ShadowX,$Y2+$this->ShadowY,$Radius,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
 296:       }
 297: 
 298:      $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"NoBorder"=>TRUE);
 299: 
 300:      if ( $Radius <= 0 ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color); return(0); }
 301: 
 302:      $YTop    = $Y1+$Radius;
 303:      $YBottom = $Y2-$Radius;
 304: 
 305:      $Step = 360 / (2 * PI * $Radius);
 306:      $Positions = ""; $Radius--; $MinY = ""; $MaxY = "";
 307:      for($i=0;$i<=90;$i=$i+$Step)
 308:       {
 309:        $Xp1 = cos(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 310:        $Xp2 = cos(((90-$i)+270)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 311:        $Yp  = floor(sin(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $YTop);
 312:        if ( $MinY == "" || $Yp > $MinY ) { $MinY = $Yp; }
 313: 
 314:        if ( $Xp1 <= floor($X1) )  { $Xp1++; }
 315:        if ( $Xp2 >= floor($X2) )  { $Xp2--; }
 316:        $Xp1++;
 317: 
 318:        if ( !isset($Positions[$Yp]) )
 319:         { $Positions[$Yp]["X1"] = $Xp1; $Positions[$Yp]["X2"] = $Xp2; }
 320:        else
 321:         { $Positions[$Yp]["X1"] = ($Positions[$Yp]["X1"]+$Xp1)/2; $Positions[$Yp]["X2"] = ($Positions[$Yp]["X2"]+$Xp2)/2; }
 322: 
 323:        $Xp1 = cos(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 324:        $Xp2 = cos((90-$i)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 325:        $Yp  = floor(sin(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $YBottom);
 326:        if ( $MaxY == "" || $Yp < $MaxY ) { $MaxY = $Yp; }
 327: 
 328:        if ( $Xp1 <= floor($X1) ) { $Xp1++; }
 329:        if ( $Xp2 >= floor($X2) ) { $Xp2--; }
 330:        $Xp1++;
 331: 
 332:        if ( !isset($Positions[$Yp]) )
 333:         { $Positions[$Yp]["X1"] = $Xp1; $Positions[$Yp]["X2"] = $Xp2; }
 334:        else
 335:         { $Positions[$Yp]["X1"] = ($Positions[$Yp]["X1"]+$Xp1)/2; $Positions[$Yp]["X2"] = ($Positions[$Yp]["X2"]+$Xp2)/2; }
 336:       }
 337: 
 338:      $ManualColor  = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 339:      foreach($Positions as $Yp => $Bounds)
 340:       {
 341:        $X1 = $Bounds["X1"]; $X1Dec = $this->getFirstDecimal($X1); if ( $X1Dec != 0 ) { $X1 = floor($X1)+1; }
 342:        $X2 = $Bounds["X2"]; $X2Dec = $this->getFirstDecimal($X2); if ( $X2Dec != 0 ) { $X2 = floor($X2)-1; }
 343:        imageline($this->Picture,$X1,$Yp,$X2,$Yp,$ManualColor);
 344:       }
 345:      $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$MinY+1,floor($X2),$MaxY-1,$Color);
 346: 
 347:      $Radius++;
 348:      $this->drawRoundedRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2+1,$Y2-1,$Radius,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 349: 
 350:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
 351:     }
 352: 
 353:    /* Draw a rectangle with rounded corners */
 354:    function drawRoundedFilledRectangle_deprecated($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Radius,$Format="")
 355:     {
 356:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 357:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 358:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 359:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
 360:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
 361:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
 362:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 363:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
 364: 
 365:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
 366:      if ( $BorderR == -1 ) { $BorderR = $R; $BorderG = $G; $BorderB = $B; }
 367: 
 368:      list($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2) = $this->fixBoxCoordinates($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 369: 
 370:      if ( $X2 - $X1 < $Radius ) { $Radius = floor((($X2-$X1)+2)/2); }
 371:      if ( $Y2 - $Y1 < $Radius ) { $Radius = floor((($Y2-$Y1)+2)/2); }
 372: 
 373:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 374:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 375:       {
 376:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 377:        $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1+$this->ShadowX,$Y1+$this->ShadowY,$X2+$this->ShadowX,$Y2+$this->ShadowY,$Radius,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
 378:       }
 379: 
 380:      if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($X2) >= 5 )  { $XOffset2 = 1; } else { $XOffset2 = 0; }
 381:      if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($X1) <= 5 )  { $XOffset1 = 1; } else { $XOffset1 = 0; }
 382: 
 383:      if ( !$this->Antialias ) { $XOffset1 = 1; $XOffset2 = 1; }
 384: 
 385:      $YTop    = floor($Y1+$Radius);
 386:      $YBottom = floor($Y2-$Radius);
 387: 
 388:      $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1-$XOffset1,$YTop,$X2+$XOffset2,$YBottom,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"NoBorder"=>TRUE));
 389: 
 390:      $Step = 360 / (2 * PI * $Radius);
 391:      $Color  = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 392:      $Color2 = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,255,0,0,$Alpha);
 393:      $Drawn = "";
 394: 
 395:      if ( $Alpha < 100 )  { $Drawn[$YTop] = FALSE; }
 396:      if ( $Alpha < 100 )  { $Drawn[$YBottom] = TRUE; }
 397:      
 398:      for($i=0;$i<=90;$i=$i+$Step)
 399:       {
 400:        $Xp1 = cos(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 401:        $Xp2 = cos(((90-$i)+270)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 402:        $Yp  = sin(($i+180)*PI/180) * $Radius + $YTop;
 403: 
 404:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Xp1) > 5 )  { $XOffset1 = 1; } else { $XOffset1 = 0; }
 405:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Xp2) > 5 )  { $XOffset2 = 1; } else { $XOffset2 = 0; }
 406:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Yp) > 5 )  { $YOffset = 1; } else { $YOffset = 0; }
 407: 
 408:        if ( !isset($Drawn[$Yp+$YOffset]) || $Alpha == 100 )
 409:         imageline($this->Picture,$Xp1+$XOffset1,$Yp+$YOffset,$Xp2+$XOffset2,$Yp+$YOffset,$Color);
 410: 
 411:        $Drawn[$Yp+$YOffset] = $Xp2;
 412: 
 413:        $Xp1 = cos(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X1 + $Radius;
 414:        $Xp2 = cos((90-$i)*PI/180) * $Radius + $X2 - $Radius;
 415:        $Yp  = sin(($i+90)*PI/180) * $Radius + $YBottom;
 416: 
 417:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Xp1) > 7 )  { $XOffset1 = 1; } else { $XOffset1 = 0; }
 418:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Xp2) > 7 )  { $XOffset2 = 1; } else { $XOffset2 = 0; }
 419:        if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Yp) > 5 )  { $YOffset = 1; } else { $YOffset = 0; }
 420: 
 421:        if ( !isset($Drawn[$Yp+$YOffset]) || $Alpha == 100 )
 422:         imageline($this->Picture,$Xp1+$XOffset1,$Yp+$YOffset,$Xp2+$XOffset2,$Yp+$YOffset,$Color);
 423: 
 424:        $Drawn[$Yp+$YOffset] = $Xp2;
 425:       }
 426: 
 427:      $this->drawRoundedRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Radius,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 428: 
 429:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
 430:     }
 431: 
 432:    /* Draw a rectangle */
 433:    function drawRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Format="")
 434:     {
 435:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 436:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 437:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 438:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 439:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 440:      $NoAngle   = isset($Format["NoAngle"]) ? $Format["NoAngle"] : FALSE;
 441: 
 442:      if ($X1 > $X2) { list($X1, $X2) = array($X2, $X1); }
 443:      if ($Y1 > $Y2) { list($Y1, $Y2) = array($Y2, $Y1); }
 444: 
 445:      if ( $this->Antialias )
 446:       {
 447:        if ( $NoAngle )
 448:         {
 449:          $this->drawLine($X1+1,$Y1,$X2-1,$Y1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 450:          $this->drawLine($X2,$Y1+1,$X2,$Y2-1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 451:          $this->drawLine($X2-1,$Y2,$X1+1,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 452:          $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1+1,$X1,$Y2-1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 453:         }
 454:        else
 455:         {
 456:          $this->drawLine($X1+1,$Y1,$X2-1,$Y1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 457:          $this->drawLine($X2,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 458:          $this->drawLine($X2-1,$Y2,$X1+1,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 459:          $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1,$X1,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 460:         }
 461:       }
 462:      else
 463:       {
 464:        $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 465:        imagerectangle($this->Picture,$X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
 466:       }
 467:     }
 468: 
 469:    /* Draw a filled rectangle */
 470:    function drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Format="")
 471:     {
 472:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 473:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 474:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 475:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 476:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
 477:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
 478:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
 479:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : $Alpha;
 480:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
 481:      $Ticks     = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 482:      $NoAngle       = isset($Format["NoAngle"]) ? $Format["NoAngle"] : NULL;
 483:      $Dash      = isset($Format["Dash"]) ? $Format["Dash"] : FALSE;
 484:      $DashStep      = isset($Format["DashStep"]) ? $Format["DashStep"] : 4;
 485:      $DashR     = isset($Format["DashR"]) ? $Format["DashR"] : 0;
 486:      $DashG     = isset($Format["DashG"]) ? $Format["DashG"] : 0;
 487:      $DashB     = isset($Format["DashB"]) ? $Format["DashB"] : 0;
 488:      $NoBorder      = isset($Format["NoBorder"]) ? $Format["NoBorder"] : FALSE;
 489: 
 490:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
 491: 
 492:      if ($X1 > $X2) { list($X1, $X2) = array($X2, $X1); }
 493:      if ($Y1 > $Y2) { list($Y1, $Y2) = array($Y2, $Y1); }
 494: 
 495:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 496:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 497:       {
 498:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 499:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1+$this->ShadowX,$Y1+$this->ShadowY,$X2+$this->ShadowX,$Y2+$this->ShadowY,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"NoAngle"=>$NoAngle));
 500:       }
 501: 
 502:      $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 503:      if ( $NoAngle )
 504:       {
 505:        imagefilledrectangle($this->Picture,ceil($X1)+1,ceil($Y1),floor($X2)-1,floor($Y2),$Color);
 506:        imageline($this->Picture,ceil($X1),ceil($Y1)+1,ceil($X1),floor($Y2)-1,$Color);
 507:        imageline($this->Picture,floor($X2),ceil($Y1)+1,floor($X2),floor($Y2)-1,$Color);
 508:       }
 509:      else
 510:       imagefilledrectangle($this->Picture,ceil($X1),ceil($Y1),floor($X2),floor($Y2),$Color);
 511: 
 512:      if ( $Dash )
 513:       {
 514:        if ( $BorderR != -1 ) { $iX1=$X1+1; $iY1=$Y1+1; $iX2=$X2-1; $iY2=$Y2-1; } else { $iX1=$X1; $iY1=$Y1; $iX2=$X2; $iY2=$Y2; }
 515: 
 516:        $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$DashR,$DashG,$DashB,$Alpha);
 517:        $Y=$iY1-$DashStep;
 518:        for($X=$iX1; $X<=$iX2+($iY2-$iY1); $X=$X+$DashStep)
 519:         {
 520:          $Y=$Y+$DashStep;
 521:          if ( $X > $iX2 ) { $Xa = $X-($X-$iX2); $Ya = $iY1+($X-$iX2); } else { $Xa = $X; $Ya = $iY1; }
 522:          if ( $Y > $iY2 ) { $Xb = $iX1+($Y-$iY2); $Yb = $Y-($Y-$iY2); } else { $Xb = $iX1; $Yb = $Y; }
 523:          imageline($this->Picture,$Xa,$Ya,$Xb,$Yb,$Color);
 524:         }
 525:       }
 526: 
 527:      if ( $this->Antialias && !$NoBorder )
 528:       {
 529:        if ( $X1 < ceil($X1) )
 530:         {
 531:          $AlphaA = $Alpha * (ceil($X1) - $X1);
 532:          $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$AlphaA);
 533:          imageline($this->Picture,ceil($X1)-1,ceil($Y1),ceil($X1)-1,floor($Y2),$Color);
 534:         }
 535: 
 536:        if ( $Y1 < ceil($Y1) )
 537:         {
 538:          $AlphaA = $Alpha * (ceil($Y1) - $Y1);
 539:          $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$AlphaA);
 540:          imageline($this->Picture,ceil($X1),ceil($Y1)-1,floor($X2),ceil($Y1)-1,$Color);
 541:         }
 542: 
 543:        if ( $X2 > floor($X2) )
 544:         {
 545:          $AlphaA = $Alpha * (.5-($X2 - floor($X2)));
 546:          $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$AlphaA);
 547:          imageline($this->Picture,floor($X2)+1,ceil($Y1),floor($X2)+1,floor($Y2),$Color);
 548:         } 
 549: 
 550:        if ( $Y2 > floor($Y2) )
 551:         {
 552:          $AlphaA = $Alpha * (.5-($Y2 - floor($Y2)));
 553:          $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$AlphaA);
 554:          imageline($this->Picture,ceil($X1),floor($Y2)+1,floor($X2),floor($Y2)+1,$Color);
 555:         }
 556:       }
 557: 
 558:      if ( $BorderR != -1 )
 559:       $this->drawRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"NoAngle"=>$NoAngle));
 560: 
 561:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
 562:     }
 563: 
 564:    /* Draw a rectangular marker of the specified size */
 565:    function drawRectangleMarker($X,$Y,$Format="")
 566:     {
 567:      $Size = isset($Format["Size"]) ? $Format["Size"] : 4;
 568: 
 569:      $HalfSize = floor($Size/2);
 570:      $this->drawFilledRectangle($X-$HalfSize,$Y-$HalfSize,$X+$HalfSize,$Y+$HalfSize,$Format);
 571:     }
 572: 
 573:    /* Drawn a spline based on the bezier function */
 574:    function drawSpline($Coordinates,$Format="")
 575:     {
 576:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 577:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 578:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 579:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 580:      $Force = isset($Format["Force"]) ? $Format["Force"] : 30;
 581:      $Forces    = isset($Format["Forces"]) ? $Format["Forces"] : NULL;
 582:      $ShowC = isset($Format["ShowControl"]) ? $Format["ShowControl"] : FALSE;
 583:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 584:      $PathOnly  = isset($Format["PathOnly"]) ? $Format["PathOnly"] : FALSE;
 585:      $Weight    = isset($Format["Weight"]) ? $Format["Weight"] : NULL;
 586: 
 587:      $Cpt = NULL; $Mode = NULL; $Result = "";
 588:      for($i=1;$i<=count($Coordinates)-1;$i++)
 589:       {
 590:        $X1 = $Coordinates[$i-1][0]; $Y1 = $Coordinates[$i-1][1];
 591:        $X2 = $Coordinates[$i][0];   $Y2 = $Coordinates[$i][1];
 592: 
 593:        if ( $Forces != NULL ) { $Force = $Forces[$i]; }
 594: 
 595:        /* First segment */
 596:        if ( $i == 1 )
 597:         { $Xv1 = $X1; $Yv1 = $Y1; }
 598:        else
 599:         {
 600:          $Angle1 = $this->getAngle($XLast,$YLast,$X1,$Y1);
 601:          $Angle2 = $this->getAngle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 602:          $XOff = cos($Angle2 * PI / 180) * $Force + $X1;
 603:          $YOff = sin($Angle2 * PI / 180) * $Force + $Y1;
 604: 
 605:          $Xv1 = cos($Angle1 * PI / 180) * $Force + $XOff;
 606:          $Yv1 = sin($Angle1 * PI / 180) * $Force + $YOff;
 607:         }
 608: 
 609:        /* Last segment */
 610:        if ( $i == count($Coordinates)-1 )
 611:         { $Xv2 = $X2; $Yv2 = $Y2; }
 612:        else
 613:         {
 614:          $Angle1 = $this->getAngle($X2,$Y2,$Coordinates[$i+1][0],$Coordinates[$i+1][1]);
 615:          $Angle2 = $this->getAngle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 616:          $XOff = cos(($Angle2+180) * PI / 180) * $Force + $X2;
 617:          $YOff = sin(($Angle2+180) * PI / 180) * $Force + $Y2;
 618: 
 619:          $Xv2 = cos(($Angle1+180) * PI / 180) * $Force + $XOff;
 620:          $Yv2 = sin(($Angle1+180) * PI / 180) * $Force + $YOff;
 621:         }
 622: 
 623:        $Path = $this->drawBezier($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Xv1,$Yv1,$Xv2,$Yv2,$Format);
 624:        if ($PathOnly) { $Result[] = $Path; }
 625: 
 626:        $XLast = $X1; $YLast = $Y1;
 627:       }
 628: 
 629:      return($Result);
 630:     }
 631: 
 632:    /* Draw a bezier curve with two controls points */
 633:    function drawBezier($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Xv1,$Yv1,$Xv2,$Yv2,$Format="")
 634:     {
 635:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 636:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 637:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 638:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 639:      $ShowC = isset($Format["ShowControl"]) ? $Format["ShowControl"] : FALSE;
 640:      $Segments  = isset($Format["Segments"]) ? $Format["Segments"] : NULL;
 641:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 642:      $NoDraw    = isset($Format["NoDraw"]) ? $Format["NoDraw"] : FALSE;
 643:      $PathOnly  = isset($Format["PathOnly"]) ? $Format["PathOnly"] : FALSE;
 644:      $Weight    = isset($Format["Weight"]) ? $Format["Weight"] : NULL;
 645:      $DrawArrow     = isset($Format["DrawArrow"]) ? $Format["DrawArrow"] : FALSE;
 646:      $ArrowSize     = isset($Format["ArrowSize"]) ? $Format["ArrowSize"] : 10;
 647:      $ArrowRatio    = isset($Format["ArrowRatio"]) ? $Format["ArrowRatio"] : .5;
 648:      $ArrowTwoHeads = isset($Format["ArrowTwoHeads"]) ? $Format["ArrowTwoHeads"] : FALSE;
 649: 
 650:      if ( $Segments == NULL )
 651:       {
 652:        $Length    = $this->getLength($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 653:        $Precision = ($Length*125)/1000;
 654:       }
 655:      else
 656:       $Precision = $Segments;
 657: 
 658:      $P[0]["X"] = $X1;  $P[0]["Y"] = $Y1;
 659:      $P[1]["X"] = $Xv1; $P[1]["Y"] = $Yv1;
 660:      $P[2]["X"] = $Xv2; $P[2]["Y"] = $Yv2;
 661:      $P[3]["X"] = $X2;  $P[3]["Y"] = $Y2;
 662: 
 663:      /* Compute the bezier points */
 664:      $Q = ""; $ID = 0; $Path = "";
 665:      for($i=0;$i<=$Precision;$i=$i+1)
 666:       {
 667:        $u = $i / $Precision;
 668: 
 669:        $C    = "";
 670:        $C[0] = (1 - $u) * (1 - $u) * (1 - $u);
 671:        $C[1] = ($u * 3) * (1 - $u) * (1 - $u);
 672:        $C[2] = 3 * $u * $u * (1 - $u);
 673:        $C[3] = $u * $u * $u;
 674: 
 675:        for($j=0;$j<=3;$j++)
 676:         {
 677:          if ( !isset($Q[$ID]) ) { $Q[$ID] = ""; }
 678:          if ( !isset($Q[$ID]["X"]) ) { $Q[$ID]["X"] = 0; }
 679:          if ( !isset($Q[$ID]["Y"]) ) { $Q[$ID]["Y"] = 0; }
 680: 
 681:          $Q[$ID]["X"] = $Q[$ID]["X"] + $P[$j]["X"] * $C[$j];
 682:          $Q[$ID]["Y"] = $Q[$ID]["Y"] + $P[$j]["Y"] * $C[$j];
 683:         }
 684:        $ID++;
 685:       }        
 686:      $Q[$ID]["X"] = $X2; $Q[$ID]["Y"] = $Y2;
 687: 
 688:      if ( !$NoDraw )
 689:       {
 690:        /* Display the control points */
 691:        if ( $ShowC && !$PathOnly )
 692:         {
 693:          $Xv1 = floor($Xv1); $Yv1 = floor($Yv1); $Xv2 = floor($Xv2); $Yv2 = floor($Yv2);
 694: 
 695:          $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>30));
 696: 
 697:          $MyMarkerSettings = array("R"=>255,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"BorderR"=>255,"BorderB"=>255,"BorderG"=>255,"Size"=>4);
 698:          $this->drawRectangleMarker($Xv1,$Yv1,$MyMarkerSettings);
 699:          $this->drawText($Xv1+4,$Yv1,"v1");
 700:          $MyMarkerSettings = array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>255,"BorderR"=>255,"BorderB"=>255,"BorderG"=>255,"Size"=>4);
 701:          $this->drawRectangleMarker($Xv2,$Yv2,$MyMarkerSettings);
 702:          $this->drawText($Xv2+4,$Yv2,"v2");
 703:         }
 704: 
 705:        /* Draw the bezier */
 706:        $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; $Cpt = NULL; $Mode = NULL; $ArrowS = NULL;
 707:        foreach ($Q as $Key => $Point)
 708:         {
 709:          $X = $Point["X"]; $Y = $Point["Y"];
 710: 
 711:          /* Get the first segment */
 712:          if ( $ArrowS == NULL && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
 713:           { $ArrowS["X2"] = $LastX; $ArrowS["Y2"] = $LastY; $ArrowS["X1"] = $X; $ArrowS["Y1"] = $Y; }
 714: 
 715:          if ( $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL && !$PathOnly)
 716:           list($Cpt,$Mode) = $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Cpt"=>$Cpt,"Mode"=>$Mode,"Weight"=>$Weight));
 717: 
 718:          /* Get the last segment */
 719:          $ArrowE["X1"] = $LastX; $ArrowE["Y1"] = $LastY; $ArrowE["X2"] = $X; $ArrowE["Y2"] = $Y;
 720: 
 721:          $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
 722:         }
 723: 
 724:        if ( $DrawArrow && !$PathOnly )
 725:         {
 726:          $ArrowSettings = array("FillR"=>$R,"FillG"=>$G,"FillB"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Size"=>$ArrowSize,"Ratio"=>$ArrowRatio);
 727:          if ( $ArrowTwoHeads )
 728:           $this->drawArrow($ArrowS["X1"],$ArrowS["Y1"],$ArrowS["X2"],$ArrowS["Y2"],$ArrowSettings);
 729: 
 730:          $this->drawArrow($ArrowE["X1"],$ArrowE["Y1"],$ArrowE["X2"],$ArrowE["Y2"],$ArrowSettings);
 731:         }
 732:       }
 733:      return($Q);
 734:     }
 735: 
 736:    /* Draw a line between two points */
 737:    function drawLine($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Format="")
 738:     {
 739:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 740:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 741:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 742:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 743:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 744:      $Cpt   = isset($Format["Cpt"]) ? $Format["Cpt"] : 1;
 745:      $Mode  = isset($Format["Mode"]) ? $Format["Mode"] : 1;
 746:      $Weight    = isset($Format["Weight"]) ? $Format["Weight"] : NULL;
 747:      $Threshold = isset($Format["Threshold"]) ? $Format["Threshold"] : NULL;
 748: 
 749:      if ( $this->Antialias == FALSE && $Ticks == NULL )
 750:       {
 751:        if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 752:         {
 753:          $ShadowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$this->ShadowR,$this->ShadowG,$this->ShadowB,$this->Shadowa);
 754:          imageline($this->Picture,$X1+$this->ShadowX,$Y1+$this->ShadowY,$X2+$this->ShadowX,$Y2+$this->ShadowY,$ShadowColor);
 755:         }
 756: 
 757:        $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 758:        imageline($this->Picture,$X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
 759:        return(0);
 760:       }
 761: 
 762:      $Distance = sqrt(($X2-$X1)*($X2-$X1)+($Y2-$Y1)*($Y2-$Y1));  
 763:      if ( $Distance == 0 ) { return(-1); }
 764: 
 765:      /* Derivative algorithm for overweighted lines, re-route to polygons primitives */
 766:      if ( $Weight != NULL )
 767:       {
 768:        $Angle        = $this->getAngle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
 769:        $PolySettings = array ("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"BorderAlpha"=>$Alpha);
 770: 
 771:        if ( $Ticks == NULL )
 772:         {
 773:          $Points   = ""; 
 774:          $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $X1; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $Y1;
 775:          $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $X1; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Y1;
 776:          $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $X2; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Y2;
 777:          $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $X2; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $Y2;
 778: 
 779:          $this->drawPolygon($Points,$PolySettings);
 780:         }
 781:        else
 782:         {
 783:          for($i=0;$i<=$Distance;$i=$i+$Ticks*2)
 784:           {
 785:            $Xa = (($X2-$X1)/$Distance) * $i + $X1; $Ya = (($Y2-$Y1)/$Distance) * $i + $Y1;
 786:            $Xb = (($X2-$X1)/$Distance) * ($i+$Ticks) + $X1; $Yb = (($Y2-$Y1)/$Distance) * ($i+$Ticks) + $Y1;
 787: 
 788:            $Points   = ""; 
 789:            $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $Xa; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $Ya;
 790:            $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Xa; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Ya;
 791:            $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Xb; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle+90)) * $Weight + $Yb;
 792:            $Points[] = cos(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight + $Xb; $Points[] = sin(deg2rad($Angle-90)) * $Weight   + $Yb;
 793: 
 794:            $this->drawPolygon($Points,$PolySettings);
 795:           }
 796:         }
 797: 
 798:        return(1);
 799:       }
 800: 
 801:      $XStep = ($X2-$X1) / $Distance;
 802:      $YStep = ($Y2-$Y1) / $Distance;
 803: 
 804:      for($i=0;$i<=$Distance;$i++)
 805:       {
 806:        $X = $i * $XStep + $X1;
 807:        $Y = $i * $YStep + $Y1;
 808: 
 809:        $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
 810: 
 811:        if ( $Threshold != NULL )
 812:         {
 813:          foreach($Threshold as $Key => $Parameters)
 814:           {
 815:            if ( $Y <= $Parameters["MinX"] && $Y >= $Parameters["MaxX"])
 816:             {
 817:              if ( isset($Parameters["R"]) ) { $RT = $Parameters["R"]; } else { $RT = 0; }
 818:              if ( isset($Parameters["G"]) ) { $GT = $Parameters["G"]; } else { $GT = 0; }
 819:              if ( isset($Parameters["B"]) ) { $BT = $Parameters["B"]; } else { $BT = 0; }
 820:              if ( isset($Parameters["Alpha"]) ) { $AlphaT = $Parameters["Alpha"]; } else { $AlphaT = 0; }
 821:              $Color = array("R"=>$RT,"G"=>$GT,"B"=>$BT,"Alpha"=>$AlphaT);
 822:             }
 823:           }
 824:         }
 825: 
 826:        if ( $Ticks != NULL )
 827:         {
 828:          if ( $Cpt % $Ticks == 0 )
 829:           { $Cpt = 0; if ( $Mode == 1 ) { $Mode = 0; } else { $Mode = 1; } }
 830: 
 831:          if ( $Mode == 1 )
 832:           $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,$Color);
 833: 
 834:          $Cpt++;
 835:         }
 836:        else
 837:         $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,$Color);
 838:       }
 839: 
 840:      return(array($Cpt,$Mode));
 841:     }
 842: 
 843:    /* Draw a circle */
 844:    function drawCircle($Xc,$Yc,$Height,$Width,$Format="")
 845:     {
 846:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 847:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 848:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 849:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 850:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 851: 
 852:      $Height    = abs($Height);
 853:      $Width = abs($Width);
 854: 
 855:      if ( $Height == 0 ) { $Height = 1; }
 856:      if ( $Width == 0 )  { $Width = 1; }
 857:      $Xc = floor($Xc); $Yc = floor($Yc);
 858: 
 859:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 860:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 861:       {
 862:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 863:        $this->drawCircle($Xc+$this->ShadowX,$Yc+$this->ShadowY,$Height,$Width,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 864:       }
 865: 
 866:      if ( $Width == 0 ) { $Width = $Height; }
 867:      if ( $R < 0 ) { $R = 0; } if ( $R > 255 ) { $R = 255; }
 868:      if ( $G < 0 ) { $G = 0; } if ( $G > 255 ) { $G = 255; }
 869:      if ( $B < 0 ) { $B = 0; } if ( $B > 255 ) { $B = 255; }
 870: 
 871:      $Step = 360 / (2 * PI * max($Width,$Height));
 872:      $Mode = 1; $Cpt = 1;
 873:      for($i=0;$i<=360;$i=$i+$Step)
 874:       {
 875:        $X = cos($i*PI/180) * $Height + $Xc;
 876:        $Y = sin($i*PI/180) * $Width + $Yc;
 877: 
 878:        if ( $Ticks != NULL )
 879:         {
 880:          if ( $Cpt % $Ticks == 0 )
 881:           { $Cpt = 0; if ( $Mode == 1 ) { $Mode = 0; } else { $Mode = 1; } }
 882: 
 883:          if ( $Mode == 1 )
 884:           $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 885: 
 886:          $Cpt++;
 887:         }
 888:        else
 889:         $this->drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
 890: 
 891:       }
 892:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
 893:     }
 894: 
 895:    /* Draw a filled circle */
 896:    function drawFilledCircle($X,$Y,$Radius,$Format="")
 897:     {
 898:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
 899:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
 900:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
 901:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
 902:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
 903:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
 904:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
 905:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : $Alpha;
 906:      $Ticks         = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
 907:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
 908: 
 909:      if ( $Radius == 0 ) { $Radius = 1; }
 910:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
 911:      $X = floor($X); $Y = floor($Y);
 912: 
 913:      $Radius = abs($Radius);
 914: 
 915:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
 916:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
 917:       {
 918:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
 919:        $this->drawFilledCircle($X+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$this->ShadowY,$Radius,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 920:       }
 921: 
 922:      $this->Mask  = "";
 923:      $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
 924:      for ($i=0; $i<=$Radius*2; $i++)
 925:       {
 926:        $Slice  = sqrt($Radius * $Radius - ($Radius - $i) * ($Radius - $i));
 927:        $XPos   = floor($Slice);
 928:        $YPos   = $Y + $i - $Radius;
 929:        $AAlias = $Slice - floor($Slice);
 930: 
 931:        $this->Mask[$X-$XPos][$YPos] = TRUE;
 932:        $this->Mask[$X+$XPos][$YPos] = TRUE;
 933:        imageline($this->Picture,$X-$XPos,$YPos,$X+$XPos,$YPos,$Color);
 934:       }
 935:      if ( $this->Antialias )
 936:       $this->drawCircle($X,$Y,$Radius,$Radius,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 937: 
 938:      $this->Mask = "";
 939: 
 940:      if ( $BorderR != -1 )
 941:       $this->drawCircle($X,$Y,$Radius,$Radius,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
 942: 
 943:      $this->Shadow  = $RestoreShadow;
 944:     }
 945: 
 946:    /* Write text */
 947:    function drawText($X,$Y,$Text,$Format="")
 948:     {
 949:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : $this->FontColorR;
 950:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : $this->FontColorG;
 951:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : $this->FontColorB;
 952:      $Angle     = isset($Format["Angle"]) ? $Format["Angle"] : 0;
 953:      $Align     = isset($Format["Align"]) ? $Format["Align"] : TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMLEFT;
 954:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : $this->FontColorA;
 955:      $FontName      = isset($Format["FontName"]) ? $Format["FontName"] : $this->FontName;
 956:      $FontSize      = isset($Format["FontSize"]) ? $Format["FontSize"] : $this->FontSize;
 957:      $ShowOrigine   = isset($Format["ShowOrigine"]) ? $Format["ShowOrigine"] : FALSE;
 958:      $TOffset       = isset($Format["TOffset"]) ? $Format["TOffset"] : 2;
 959:      $DrawBox       = isset($Format["DrawBox"]) ? $Format["DrawBox"] : FALSE;
 960:      $DrawBoxBorder = isset($Format["DrawBoxBorder"]) ? $Format["DrawBoxBorder"] : TRUE;
 961:      $BorderOffset  = isset($Format["BorderOffset"]) ? $Format["BorderOffset"] : 6;
 962:      $BoxRounded    = isset($Format["BoxRounded"]) ? $Format["BoxRounded"] : FALSE;
 963:      $RoundedRadius = isset($Format["RoundedRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundedRadius"] : 6;
 964:      $BoxR      = isset($Format["BoxR"]) ? $Format["BoxR"] : 255;
 965:      $BoxG      = isset($Format["BoxG"]) ? $Format["BoxG"] : 255;
 966:      $BoxB      = isset($Format["BoxB"]) ? $Format["BoxB"] : 255;
 967:      $BoxAlpha      = isset($Format["BoxAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxAlpha"] : 50;
 968:      $BoxSurrounding    = isset($Format["BoxSurrounding"]) ? $Format["BoxSurrounding"] : "";
 969:      $BoxBorderR    = isset($Format["BoxR"]) ? $Format["BoxR"] : 0;
 970:      $BoxBorderG    = isset($Format["BoxG"]) ? $Format["BoxG"] : 0;
 971:      $BoxBorderB    = isset($Format["BoxB"]) ? $Format["BoxB"] : 0;
 972:      $BoxBorderAlpha    = isset($Format["BoxAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxAlpha"] : 50;
 973:      $NoShadow      = isset($Format["NoShadow"]) ? $Format["NoShadow"] : FALSE;
 974: 
 975:      $Shadow = $this->Shadow;
 976:      if ( $NoShadow ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
 977: 
 978:      if ( $BoxSurrounding != "" ) { $BoxBorderR = $BoxR - $BoxSurrounding; $BoxBorderG = $BoxG - $BoxSurrounding; $BoxBorderB = $BoxB - $BoxSurrounding; $BoxBorderAlpha = $BoxAlpha; }
 979: 
 980:      if ( $ShowOrigine )
 981:       {
 982:        $MyMarkerSettings = array("R"=>255,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"BorderR"=>255,"BorderB"=>255,"BorderG"=>255,"Size"=>4);
 983:        $this->drawRectangleMarker($X,$Y,$MyMarkerSettings);
 984:       }
 985: 
 986:      $TxtPos = $this->getTextBox($X,$Y,$FontName,$FontSize,$Angle,$Text);
 987: 
 988:      if ( $DrawBox && ($Angle == 0 || $Angle == 90 || $Angle == 180 || $Angle == 270))
 989:       {
 990:        $T[0]["X"]=0;$T[0]["Y"]=0;$T[1]["X"]=0;$T[1]["Y"]=0;$T[2]["X"]=0;$T[2]["Y"]=0;$T[3]["X"]=0;$T[3]["Y"]=0;
 991:        if ( $Angle == 0 ) { $T[0]["X"]=-$TOffset;$T[0]["Y"]=$TOffset;$T[1]["X"]=$TOffset;$T[1]["Y"]=$TOffset;$T[2]["X"]=$TOffset;$T[2]["Y"]=-$TOffset;$T[3]["X"]=-$TOffset;$T[3]["Y"]=-$TOffset; }
 992: 
 993:        $X1 = min($TxtPos[0]["X"],$TxtPos[1]["X"],$TxtPos[2]["X"],$TxtPos[3]["X"]) - $BorderOffset + 3;
 994:        $Y1 = min($TxtPos[0]["Y"],$TxtPos[1]["Y"],$TxtPos[2]["Y"],$TxtPos[3]["Y"]) - $BorderOffset;
 995:        $X2 = max($TxtPos[0]["X"],$TxtPos[1]["X"],$TxtPos[2]["X"],$TxtPos[3]["X"]) + $BorderOffset + 3;
 996:        $Y2 = max($TxtPos[0]["Y"],$TxtPos[1]["Y"],$TxtPos[2]["Y"],$TxtPos[3]["Y"]) + $BorderOffset - 3;
 997: 
 998:        $X1 = $X1 - $TxtPos[$Align]["X"] + $X + $T[0]["X"];
 999:        $Y1 = $Y1 - $TxtPos[$Align]["Y"] + $Y + $T[0]["Y"];
1000:        $X2 = $X2 - $TxtPos[$Align]["X"] + $X + $T[0]["X"];
1001:        $Y2 = $Y2 - $TxtPos[$Align]["Y"] + $Y + $T[0]["Y"];
1002: 
1003:        $Settings = array("R"=>$BoxR,"G"=>$BoxG,"B"=>$BoxB,"Alpha"=>$BoxAlpha,"BorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"BorderAlpha"=>$BoxBorderAlpha);
1004: 
1005:        if ( $BoxRounded )
1006:         { $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$RoundedRadius,$Settings); }
1007:        else
1008:         { $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Settings); }
1009:       }
1010: 
1011:      $X = $X - $TxtPos[$Align]["X"] + $X;
1012:      $Y = $Y - $TxtPos[$Align]["Y"] + $Y;
1013: 
1014:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
1015:       {
1016:        $C_ShadowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$this->ShadowR,$this->ShadowG,$this->ShadowB,$this->Shadowa);
1017:        imagettftext($this->Picture,$FontSize,$Angle,$X+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$this->ShadowY,$C_ShadowColor,$FontName,$Text);
1018:       }
1019: 
1020:      $C_TextColor = $this->AllocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
1021:      imagettftext($this->Picture,$FontSize,$Angle,$X,$Y,$C_TextColor,$FontName,$Text);
1022: 
1023:      $this->Shadow = $Shadow;
1024: 
1025:      return($TxtPos);
1026:     }
1027: 
1028:    /* Draw a gradient within a defined area */
1029:    function drawGradientArea($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Direction,$Format="")
1030:     {
1031:      $StartR    = isset($Format["StartR"]) ? $Format["StartR"] : 90;
1032:      $StartG    = isset($Format["StartG"]) ? $Format["StartG"] : 90;
1033:      $StartB    = isset($Format["StartB"]) ? $Format["StartB"] : 90;
1034:      $EndR  = isset($Format["EndR"]) ? $Format["EndR"] : 0;
1035:      $EndG  = isset($Format["EndG"]) ? $Format["EndG"] : 0;
1036:      $EndB  = isset($Format["EndB"]) ? $Format["EndB"] : 0;
1037:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1038:      $Levels    = isset($Format["Levels"]) ? $Format["Levels"] : NULL;
1039: 
1040:      $Shadow = $this->Shadow;
1041:      $this->Shadow = FALSE;
1042: 
1043:      if ( $StartR == $EndR && $StartG == $EndG && $StartB == $EndB )
1044:       {
1045:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,array("R"=>$StartR,"G"=>$StartG,"B"=>$StartB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1046:        return(0);
1047:       }
1048: 
1049:      if ( $Levels != NULL )
1050:       { $EndR=$StartR+$Levels; $EndG=$StartG+$Levels; $EndB=$StartB+$Levels; }
1051: 
1052:      if ($X1 > $X2) { list($X1, $X2) = array($X2, $X1); }
1053:      if ($Y1 > $Y2) { list($Y1, $Y2) = array($Y2, $Y1); }
1054: 
1055:      if ( $Direction == DIRECTION_VERTICAL )   { $Width = abs($Y2-$Y1); }
1056:      if ( $Direction == DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL ) { $Width = abs($X2-$X1); }
1057: 
1058:      $Step     = max(abs($EndR-$StartR),abs($EndG-$StartG),abs($EndB-$StartB));
1059:      $StepSize = $Width/$Step;
1060:      $RStep    = ($EndR-$StartR)/$Step;
1061:      $GStep    = ($EndG-$StartG)/$Step;
1062:      $BStep    = ($EndB-$StartB)/$Step;
1063: 
1064:      $R=$StartR;$G=$StartG;$B=$StartB;
1065:      switch($Direction)
1066:       {
1067:        case DIRECTION_VERTICAL:
1068:         $StartY = $Y1; $EndY = floor($Y2)+1; $LastY2 = $StartY;
1069:         for($i=0;$i<=$Step;$i++)
1070:          {
1071:           $Y2 = floor($StartY + ($i * $StepSize));
1072: 
1073:           if ($Y2 > $EndY) { $Y2 = $EndY; }
1074:           if (($Y1 != $Y2 && $Y1 < $Y2) || $Y2 == $EndY)
1075:            {
1076:             $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
1077:             $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
1078:             $LastY2 = max($LastY2,$Y2);
1079:             $Y1 = $Y2+1;
1080:            }
1081:           $R = $R + $RStep; $G = $G + $GStep; $B = $B + $BStep;
1082:          }
1083:         if ( $LastY2 < $EndY && isset($Color)) { for ($i=$LastY2+1;$i<=$EndY;$i++) { $this->drawLine($X1,$i,$X2,$i,$Color); } }
1084:         break;
1085: 
1086:        case DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL:
1087:         $StartX = $X1; $EndX = $X2;
1088:         for($i=0;$i<=$Step;$i++)
1089:          {
1090:           $X2 = floor($StartX + ($i * $StepSize));
1091: 
1092:           if ($X2 > $EndX) { $X2 = $EndX; }
1093:           if (($X1 != $X2 && $X1 < $X2) || $X2 == $EndX)
1094:            {
1095:             $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
1096:             $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
1097:             $X1 = $X2+1;
1098:            }
1099:           $R = $R + $RStep; $G = $G + $GStep; $B = $B + $BStep; 
1100:          }
1101:         if ( $X2 < $EndX && isset($Color)) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($X2,$Y1,$EndX,$Y2,$Color); }
1102:         break;
1103:       }
1104: 
1105:      $this->Shadow = $Shadow;
1106: 
1107:     }
1108: 
1109:    /* Draw an aliased pixel */
1110:    function drawAntialiasPixel($X,$Y,$Format="")
1111:     {
1112:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
1113:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
1114:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
1115:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1116: 
1117:      if ( $X < 0 || $Y < 0 || $X >= $this->XSize || $Y >= $this->YSize )
1118:       return(-1);
1119: 
1120:      if ( $R < 0 ) { $R = 0; } if ( $R > 255 ) { $R = 255; }
1121:      if ( $G < 0 ) { $G = 0; } if ( $G > 255 ) { $G = 255; }
1122:      if ( $B < 0 ) { $B = 0; } if ( $B > 255 ) { $B = 255; }
1123: 
1124:      if ( !$this->Antialias )
1125:       {
1126:        if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
1127:         {
1128:          $ShadowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$this->ShadowR,$this->ShadowG,$this->ShadowB,$this->Shadowa);
1129:          imagesetpixel($this->Picture,$X+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$this->ShadowY,$ShadowColor);
1130:         }
1131: 
1132:        $PlotColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
1133:        imagesetpixel($this->Picture,$X,$Y,$PlotColor);
1134: 
1135:        return(0);
1136:       }
1137: 
1138:      $Plot = "";
1139:      $Xi   = floor($X);
1140:      $Yi   = floor($Y);
1141: 
1142:      if ( $Xi == $X && $Yi == $Y)
1143:       {
1144:        if ( $Alpha == 100 )
1145:         $this->drawAlphaPixel($X,$Y,100,$R,$G,$B);
1146:        else
1147:         $this->drawAlphaPixel($X,$Y,$Alpha,$R,$G,$B);
1148:       }
1149:      else
1150:       {
1151:        $Alpha1 = (((1 - ($X - floor($X))) * (1 - ($Y - floor($Y))) * 100) / 100) * $Alpha;
1152:        if ( $Alpha1 > $this->AntialiasQuality ) { $this->drawAlphaPixel($Xi,$Yi,$Alpha1,$R,$G,$B); }
1153: 
1154:        $Alpha2 = ((($X - floor($X)) * (1 - ($Y - floor($Y))) * 100) / 100) * $Alpha;
1155:        if ( $Alpha2 > $this->AntialiasQuality ) { $this->drawAlphaPixel($Xi+1,$Yi,$Alpha2,$R,$G,$B); }
1156: 
1157:        $Alpha3 = (((1 - ($X - floor($X))) * ($Y - floor($Y)) * 100) / 100) * $Alpha;
1158:        if ( $Alpha3 > $this->AntialiasQuality ) { $this->drawAlphaPixel($Xi,$Yi+1,$Alpha3,$R,$G,$B); }
1159: 
1160:        $Alpha4 = ((($X - floor($X)) * ($Y - floor($Y)) * 100) / 100) * $Alpha;
1161:        if ( $Alpha4 > $this->AntialiasQuality ) { $this->drawAlphaPixel($Xi+1,$Yi+1,$Alpha4,$R,$G,$B); }
1162:       }
1163:     }
1164: 
1165:    /* Draw a semi-transparent pixel */
1166:    function drawAlphaPixel($X,$Y,$Alpha,$R,$G,$B)
1167:     {
1168:      if ( isset($this->Mask[$X])) { if ( isset($this->Mask[$X][$Y]) ) { return(0); } }
1169: 
1170:      if ( $X < 0 || $Y < 0 || $X >= $this->XSize || $Y >= $this->YSize )
1171:       return(-1);
1172: 
1173:      if ( $R < 0 ) { $R = 0; } if ( $R > 255 ) { $R = 255; }
1174:      if ( $G < 0 ) { $G = 0; } if ( $G > 255 ) { $G = 255; }
1175:      if ( $B < 0 ) { $B = 0; } if ( $B > 255 ) { $B = 255; }
1176: 
1177:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
1178:       {
1179:        $AlphaFactor = floor(($Alpha / 100) * $this->Shadowa);
1180:        $ShadowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$this->ShadowR,$this->ShadowG,$this->ShadowB,$AlphaFactor);
1181:        imagesetpixel($this->Picture,$X+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$this->ShadowY,$ShadowColor);
1182:       }
1183: 
1184:      $C_Aliased = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
1185:      imagesetpixel($this->Picture,$X,$Y,$C_Aliased);
1186:     }
1187: 
1188:    /* Convert apha to base 10 */
1189:    function convertAlpha($AlphaValue)
1190:     { return((127/100)*(100-$AlphaValue)); }
1191: 
1192:    /* Allocate a color with transparency */
1193:    function allocateColor($Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha=100)
1194:     {
1195:      if ( $R < 0 ) { $R = 0; } if ( $R > 255 ) { $R = 255; }
1196:      if ( $G < 0 ) { $G = 0; } if ( $G > 255 ) { $G = 255; }
1197:      if ( $B < 0 ) { $B = 0; } if ( $B > 255 ) { $B = 255; }
1198:      if ( $Alpha < 0 )  { $Alpha = 0; }
1199:      if ( $Alpha > 100) { $Alpha = 100; }
1200: 
1201:      $Alpha = $this->convertAlpha($Alpha);
1202:      return(imagecolorallocatealpha($Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha));
1203:     }
1204: 
1205:    /* Load a PNG file and draw it over the chart */
1206:    function drawFromPNG($X,$Y,$FileName)
1207:     { $this->drawFromPicture(1,$FileName,$X,$Y); }
1208: 
1209:    /* Load a GIF file and draw it over the chart */
1210:    function drawFromGIF($X,$Y,$FileName)
1211:     { $this->drawFromPicture(2,$FileName,$X,$Y); }
1212: 
1213:    /* Load a JPEG file and draw it over the chart */
1214:    function drawFromJPG($X,$Y,$FileName)
1215:     { $this->drawFromPicture(3,$FileName,$X,$Y); }
1216: 
1217:    function getPicInfo($FileName)
1218:     {
1219:      $Infos  = getimagesize($FileName);
1220:      $Width  = $Infos[0];
1221:      $Height = $Infos[1];
1222:      $Type   = $Infos["mime"];
1223: 
1224:      if ( $Type == "image/png") { $Type = 1; }
1225:      if ( $Type == "image/gif") { $Type = 2; }
1226:      if ( $Type == "image/jpeg ") { $Type = 3; }
1227: 
1228:      return(array($Width,$Height,$Type));
1229:     }
1230: 
1231:    /* Generic loader function for external pictures */
1232:    function drawFromPicture($PicType,$FileName,$X,$Y)
1233:     {
1234:      if ( file_exists($FileName))
1235:       {
1236:        list($Width,$Height) = $this->getPicInfo($FileName);
1237: 
1238:        if ( $PicType == 1 )
1239:         { $Raster = imagecreatefrompng($FileName); }
1240:        elseif ( $PicType == 2 )
1241:         { $Raster = imagecreatefromgif($FileName); }
1242:        elseif ( $PicType == 3 )
1243:         { $Raster = imagecreatefromjpeg($FileName); }
1244:        else
1245:         { return(0); }
1246: 
1247: 
1248:        $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
1249:        if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
1250:         {
1251:          $this->Shadow = FALSE;
1252:          if ( $PicType == 3 )
1253:           $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$this->ShadowY,$X+$Width+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$Height+$this->ShadowY,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
1254:          else
1255:           {
1256:            $TranparentID = imagecolortransparent($Raster);
1257:            for ($Xc=0;$Xc<=$Width-1;$Xc++)
1258:             {
1259:              for ($Yc=0;$Yc<=$Height-1;$Yc++)
1260:               {
1261:                $RGBa   = imagecolorat($Raster,$Xc,$Yc);
1262:                $Values = imagecolorsforindex($Raster,$RGBa);
1263:                if ( $Values["alpha"] < 120 )
1264:                 {
1265:                  $AlphaFactor = floor(($this->Shadowa / 100) * ((100 / 127) * (127-$Values["alpha"])));
1266:                  $this->drawAlphaPixel($X+$Xc+$this->ShadowX,$Y+$Yc+$this->ShadowY,$AlphaFactor,$this->ShadowR,$this->ShadowG,$this->ShadowB);
1267:                 }
1268:               }
1269:             }
1270:           }
1271:         }
1272:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
1273: 
1274:        imagecopy($this->Picture,$Raster,$X,$Y,0,0,$Width,$Height);
1275:        imagedestroy($Raster);
1276:       }
1277:     }
1278: 
1279:    /* Draw an arrow */
1280:    function drawArrow($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Format="")
1281:     {
1282:      $FillR = isset($Format["FillR"]) ? $Format["FillR"] : 0;
1283:      $FillG = isset($Format["FillG"]) ? $Format["FillG"] : 0;
1284:      $FillB = isset($Format["FillB"]) ? $Format["FillB"] : 0;
1285:      $BorderR   = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $FillR;
1286:      $BorderG   = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $FillG;
1287:      $BorderB   = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $FillB;
1288:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1289:      $Size  = isset($Format["Size"]) ? $Format["Size"] : 10;
1290:      $Ratio = isset($Format["Ratio"]) ? $Format["Ratio"] : .5;
1291:      $TwoHeads  = isset($Format["TwoHeads"]) ? $Format["TwoHeads"] : FALSE;
1292:      $Ticks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : FALSE;
1293: 
1294:      /* Calculate the line angle */
1295:      $Angle = $this->getAngle($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2);
1296: 
1297:      /* Override Shadow support, this will be managed internally */
1298:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
1299:      if ( $this->Shadow && $this->ShadowX != 0 && $this->ShadowY != 0 )
1300:       {
1301:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
1302:        $this->drawArrow($X1+$this->ShadowX,$Y1+$this->ShadowY,$X2+$this->ShadowX,$Y2+$this->ShadowY,array("FillR"=>$this->ShadowR,"FillG"=>$this->ShadowG,"FillB"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa,"Size"=>$Size,"Ratio"=>$Ratio,"TwoHeads"=>$TwoHeads,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
1303:       }
1304: 
1305:      /* Draw the 1st Head */
1306:      $TailX = cos(($Angle-180)*PI/180)*$Size+$X2;
1307:      $TailY = sin(($Angle-180)*PI/180)*$Size+$Y2;
1308: 
1309:      $Points    = "";
1310:      $Points[]  = $X2; $Points[]  = $Y2;
1311:      $Points[]  = cos(($Angle-90)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailX; $Points[] = sin(($Angle-90)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailY;
1312:      $Points[]  = cos(($Angle-270)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailX; $Points[] = sin(($Angle-270)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailY;
1313:      $Points[]  = $X2; $Points[]  = $Y2;
1314: 
1315:      /* Visual correction */
1316:      if ($Angle == 180 || $Angle == 360 ) { $Points[4] = $Points[2]; }
1317:      if ($Angle == 90 || $Angle == 270 ) { $Points[5] = $Points[3]; }
1318: 
1319:      $ArrowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$FillR,$FillG,$FillB,$Alpha);
1320:      ImageFilledPolygon($this->Picture,$Points,4,$ArrowColor);
1321: 
1322:      $this->drawLine($Points[0],$Points[1],$Points[2],$Points[3],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1323:      $this->drawLine($Points[2],$Points[3],$Points[4],$Points[5],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1324:      $this->drawLine($Points[0],$Points[1],$Points[4],$Points[5],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1325: 
1326:      /* Draw the second head */
1327:      if ( $TwoHeads )
1328:       {
1329:        $Angle = $this->getAngle($X2,$Y2,$X1,$Y1);
1330: 
1331:        $TailX2 = cos(($Angle-180)*PI/180)*$Size+$X1;
1332:        $TailY2 = sin(($Angle-180)*PI/180)*$Size+$Y1;
1333: 
1334:        $Points   = "";
1335:        $Points[] = $X1; $Points[]  = $Y1;
1336:        $Points[] = cos(($Angle-90)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailX2; $Points[] = sin(($Angle-90)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailY2;
1337:        $Points[] = cos(($Angle-270)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailX2; $Points[] = sin(($Angle-270)*PI/180)*$Size*$Ratio+$TailY2;
1338:        $Points[] = $X1; $Points[]  = $Y1;
1339: 
1340:        /* Visual correction */
1341:        if ($Angle == 180 || $Angle == 360 ) { $Points[4] = $Points[2]; }
1342:        if ($Angle == 90 || $Angle == 270 ) { $Points[5] = $Points[3]; }
1343: 
1344:        $ArrowColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$FillR,$FillG,$FillB,$Alpha);
1345:        ImageFilledPolygon($this->Picture,$Points,4,$ArrowColor);
1346: 
1347:        $this->drawLine($Points[0],$Points[1],$Points[2],$Points[3],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1348:        $this->drawLine($Points[2],$Points[3],$Points[4],$Points[5],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1349:        $this->drawLine($Points[0],$Points[1],$Points[4],$Points[5],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1350: 
1351:        $this->drawLine($TailX,$TailY,$TailX2,$TailY2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
1352:       }
1353:      else
1354:       $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1,$TailX,$TailY,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
1355: 
1356:      /* Re-enable shadows */
1357:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
1358:     }
1359: 
1360:    /* Draw a label with associated arrow */
1361:    function drawArrowLabel($X1,$Y1,$Text,$Format="")
1362:     {
1363:      $FillR    = isset($Format["FillR"]) ? $Format["FillR"] : 0;
1364:      $FillG    = isset($Format["FillG"]) ? $Format["FillG"] : 0;
1365:      $FillB    = isset($Format["FillB"]) ? $Format["FillB"] : 0;
1366:      $BorderR  = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $FillR;
1367:      $BorderG  = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $FillG;
1368:      $BorderB  = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $FillB;
1369:      $FontName = isset($Format["FontName"]) ? $Format["FontName"] : $this->FontName;
1370:      $FontSize = isset($Format["FontSize"]) ? $Format["FontSize"] : $this->FontSize;
1371:      $Alpha    = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1372:      $Length   = isset($Format["Length"]) ? $Format["Length"] : 50;
1373:      $Angle    = isset($Format["Angle"]) ? $Format["Angle"] : 315;
1374:      $Size     = isset($Format["Size"]) ? $Format["Size"] : 10;
1375:      $Position = isset($Format["Position"]) ? $Format["Position"] : POSITION_TOP;
1376:      $RoundPos = isset($Format["RoundPos"]) ? $Format["RoundPos"] : FALSE;
1377:      $Ticks    = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
1378: 
1379:      $Angle = $Angle % 360;
1380: 
1381:      $X2 = sin(($Angle+180)*PI/180)*$Length+$X1;
1382:      $Y2 = cos(($Angle+180)*PI/180)*$Length+$Y1;
1383: 
1384:      if ( $RoundPos && $Angle > 0 && $Angle < 180 ) { $Y2 = ceil($Y2); }
1385:      if ( $RoundPos && $Angle > 180 ) { $Y2 = floor($Y2); }
1386: 
1387:      $this->drawArrow($X2,$Y2,$X1,$Y1,$Format);
1388: 
1389:      $Size  = imagettfbbox($FontSize,0,$FontName,$Text);
1390:      $TxtWidth  = max(abs($Size[2]-$Size[0]),abs($Size[0]-$Size[6]));
1391:      $TxtHeight = max(abs($Size[1]-$Size[7]),abs($Size[3]-$Size[1]));
1392: 
1393:      if ( $Angle > 0 && $Angle < 180 )
1394:       {
1395:        $this->drawLine($X2,$Y2,$X2-$TxtWidth,$Y2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
1396:        if ( $Position == POSITION_TOP )
1397:         $this->drawText($X2,$Y2-2,$Text,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMRIGHT));
1398:        else
1399:         $this->drawText($X2,$Y2+4,$Text,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPRIGHT));
1400:       }
1401:      else
1402:       {
1403:        $this->drawLine($X2,$Y2,$X2+$TxtWidth,$Y2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
1404:        if ( $Position == POSITION_TOP )
1405:         $this->drawText($X2,$Y2-2,$Text,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
1406:        else
1407:         $this->drawText($X2,$Y2+4,$Text,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPLEFT));
1408:       }
1409:     }
1410: 
1411:    /* Draw a progress bar filled with specified % */
1412:    function drawProgress($X,$Y,$Percent,$Format="")
1413:     {
1414:      if ( $Percent > 100 ) { $Percent = 100; }
1415:      if ( $Percent < 0 ) { $Percent = 0; }
1416: 
1417:      $Width = isset($Format["Width"]) ? $Format["Width"] : 200;
1418:      $Height    = isset($Format["Height"]) ? $Format["Height"] : 20;
1419:      $Orientation = isset($Format["Orientation"]) ? $Format["Orientation"] : ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL;
1420:      $ShowLabel = isset($Format["ShowLabel"]) ? $Format["ShowLabel"] : FALSE;
1421:      $LabelPos  = isset($Format["LabelPos"]) ? $Format["LabelPos"] : LABEL_POS_INSIDE;
1422:      $Margin    = isset($Format["Margin"]) ? $Format["Margin"] : 10;
1423:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 130;
1424:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 130;
1425:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 130;
1426:      $RFade = isset($Format["RFade"]) ? $Format["RFade"] : -1;
1427:      $GFade = isset($Format["GFade"]) ? $Format["GFade"] : -1;
1428:      $BFade = isset($Format["BFade"]) ? $Format["BFade"] : -1;
1429:      $BorderR   = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $R;
1430:      $BorderG   = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $G;
1431:      $BorderB   = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $B;
1432:      $BoxBorderR = isset($Format["BoxBorderR"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderR"] : 0;
1433:      $BoxBorderG = isset($Format["BoxBorderG"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderG"] : 0;
1434:      $BoxBorderB = isset($Format["BoxBorderB"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderB"] : 0;
1435:      $BoxBackR  = isset($Format["BoxBackR"]) ? $Format["BoxBackR"] : 255;
1436:      $BoxBackG  = isset($Format["BoxBackG"]) ? $Format["BoxBackG"] : 255;
1437:      $BoxBackB  = isset($Format["BoxBackB"]) ? $Format["BoxBackB"] : 255;
1438:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1439:      $Surrounding = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
1440:      $BoxSurrounding = isset($Format["BoxSurrounding"]) ? $Format["BoxSurrounding"] : NULL;
1441:      $NoAngle   = isset($Format["NoAngle"]) ? $Format["NoAngle"] : FALSE;
1442: 
1443:      if ( $RFade != -1 && $GFade != -1 && $BFade != -1 )
1444:       {
1445:        $RFade = (($RFade-$R)/100)*$Percent+$R;
1446:        $GFade = (($GFade-$G)/100)*$Percent+$G;
1447:        $BFade = (($BFade-$B)/100)*$Percent+$B;
1448:       }
1449: 
1450:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R + $Surrounding; $BorderG = $G + $Surrounding; $BorderB = $B + $Surrounding; }
1451:      if ( $BoxSurrounding != NULL ) { $BoxBorderR = $BoxBackR + $Surrounding; $BoxBorderG = $BoxBackG + $Surrounding; $BoxBorderB = $BoxBackB + $Surrounding; }
1452: 
1453:      if ( $Orientation == ORIENTATION_VERTICAL )
1454:       {
1455:        $InnerHeight = (($Height-2)/100)*$Percent;
1456:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($X,$Y,$X+$Width,$Y-$Height,array("R"=>$BoxBackR,"G"=>$BoxBackG,"B"=>$BoxBackB,"BorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"NoAngle"=>$NoAngle));
1457: 
1458:        $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow; $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
1459:        if ( $RFade != -1 && $GFade != -1 && $BFade != -1 )
1460:         {
1461:          $GradientOptions = array("StartR"=>$RFade,"StartG"=>$GFade,"StartB"=>$BFade,"EndR"=>$R,"EndG"=>$G,"EndB"=>$B);
1462:          $this->drawGradientArea($X+1,$Y-1,$X+$Width-1,$Y-$InnerHeight,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientOptions);
1463: 
1464:          if ( $Surrounding )
1465:           $this->drawRectangle($X+1,$Y-1,$X+$Width-1,$Y-$InnerHeight,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"Alpha"=>$Surrounding));
1466:         }
1467:        else
1468:         $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+1,$Y-1,$X+$Width-1,$Y-$InnerHeight,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB));
1469: 
1470:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
1471: 
1472:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_BOTTOM )   { $this->drawText($X+($Width/2),$Y+$Margin,$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE)); }
1473:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_TOP )      { $this->drawText($X+($Width/2),$Y-$Height-$Margin,$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE)); }
1474:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_INSIDE )   { $this->drawText($X+($Width/2),$Y-$InnerHeight-$Margin,$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT,"Angle"=>90)); }
1475:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_CENTER )   { $this->drawText($X+($Width/2),$Y-($Height/2),$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"Angle"=>90)); }
1476:       }
1477:      else
1478:       {
1479:        if ( $Percent == 100 )
1480:         $InnerWidth = $Width-1;
1481:        else
1482:         $InnerWidth = (($Width-2)/100)*$Percent;
1483: 
1484:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($X,$Y,$X+$Width,$Y+$Height,array("R"=>$BoxBackR,"G"=>$BoxBackG,"B"=>$BoxBackB,"BorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"NoAngle"=>$NoAngle));
1485: 
1486:        $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow; $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
1487:        if ( $RFade != -1 && $GFade != -1 && $BFade != -1 )
1488:         {
1489:          $GradientOptions = array("StartR"=>$R,"StartG"=>$G,"StartB"=>$B,"EndR"=>$RFade,"EndG"=>$GFade,"EndB"=>$BFade);
1490:          $this->drawGradientArea($X+1,$Y+1,$X+$InnerWidth,$Y+$Height-1,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradientOptions);
1491: 
1492:          if ( $Surrounding )
1493:           $this->drawRectangle($X+1,$Y+1,$X+$InnerWidth,$Y+$Height-1,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"Alpha"=>$Surrounding));
1494:         }
1495:        else
1496:         $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+1,$Y+1,$X+$InnerWidth,$Y+$Height-1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB));
1497:  
1498:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
1499: 
1500:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_LEFT )     { $this->drawText($X-$Margin,$Y+($Height/2),$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT)); }
1501:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_RIGHT )    { $this->drawText($X+$Width+$Margin,$Y+($Height/2),$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT)); }
1502:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_CENTER )   { $this->drawText($X+($Width/2),$Y+($Height/2),$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE)); }
1503:        if ( $ShowLabel && $LabelPos == LABEL_POS_INSIDE )   { $this->drawText($X+$InnerWidth+$Margin,$Y+($Height/2),$Percent."%",array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT)); }
1504:       }
1505:     }
1506: 
1507:    /* Get the legend box size */
1508:    function getLegendSize($Format="")
1509:     {
1510:      $FontName      = isset($Format["FontName"]) ? $Format["FontName"] : $this->FontName;
1511:      $FontSize      = isset($Format["FontSize"]) ? $Format["FontSize"] : $this->FontSize;
1512:      $BoxSize       = isset($Format["BoxSize"]) ? $Format["BoxSize"] : 5;
1513:      $Margin        = isset($Format["Margin"]) ? $Format["Margin"] : 5;
1514:      $Style     = isset($Format["Style"]) ? $Format["Style"] : LEGEND_ROUND;
1515:      $Mode      = isset($Format["Mode"]) ? $Format["Mode"] : LEGEND_VERTICAL;
1516:      $BoxWidth      = isset($Format["BoxWidth"]) ? $Format["BoxWidth"] : 5;
1517:      $BoxHeight     = isset($Format["BoxHeight"]) ? $Format["BoxHeight"] : 5;
1518:      $IconAreaWidth = isset($Format["IconAreaWidth"]) ? $Format["IconAreaWidth"] : $BoxWidth;
1519:      $IconAreaHeight    = isset($Format["IconAreaHeight"]) ? $Format["IconAreaHeight"] : $BoxHeight;
1520:      $XSpacing      = isset($Format["XSpacing"]) ? $Format["XSpacing"] : 5;
1521: 
1522:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
1523: 
1524:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
1525:       {
1526:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] && isset($Serie["Picture"]))
1527:         {
1528:          list($PicWidth,$PicHeight) = $this->getPicInfo($Serie["Picture"]);
1529:          if ( $IconAreaWidth < $PicWidth ) { $IconAreaWidth = $PicWidth; }
1530:          if ( $IconAreaHeight < $PicHeight ) { $IconAreaHeight = $PicHeight; }
1531:         }
1532:       }
1533: 
1534:      $YStep = max($this->FontSize,$IconAreaHeight) + 5;
1535:      $XStep = $IconAreaWidth + 5;
1536:      $XStep = $XSpacing;
1537: 
1538:      $X=100; $Y=100;
1539: 
1540:      $Boundaries = ""; $Boundaries["L"] = $X; $Boundaries["T"] = $Y; $Boundaries["R"] = 0; $Boundaries["B"] = 0; $vY = $Y; $vX = $X;
1541:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
1542:       {
1543:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
1544:         {
1545:          if ( $Mode == LEGEND_VERTICAL )
1546:           {
1547:            $BoxArray = $this->getTextBox($vX+$IconAreaWidth+4,$vY+$IconAreaHeight/2,$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Serie["Description"]);
1548: 
1549:            if ( $Boundaries["T"] > $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["T"] = $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1550:            if ( $Boundaries["R"] < $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2 ) { $Boundaries["R"] = $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2; }
1551:            if ( $Boundaries["B"] < $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1552: 
1553:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1554:            $vY = $vY + max($this->FontSize*count($Lines),$IconAreaHeight) + 5;
1555:           }
1556:          elseif ( $Mode == LEGEND_HORIZONTAL )
1557:           {
1558:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1559:            $Width = "";
1560:            foreach($Lines as $Key => $Value)
1561:             {
1562:              $BoxArray = $this->getTextBox($vX+$IconAreaWidth+6,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2+(($this->FontSize+3)*$Key),$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Value);
1563: 
1564:              if ( $Boundaries["T"] > $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["T"] = $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1565:              if ( $Boundaries["R"] < $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2 ) { $Boundaries["R"] = $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2; }
1566:              if ( $Boundaries["B"] < $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1567: 
1568:              $Width[] = $BoxArray[1]["X"];
1569:             }
1570: 
1571:            $vX=max($Width)+$XStep;
1572:           }
1573:         }
1574:       }
1575:      $vY=$vY-$YStep; $vX=$vX-$XStep;
1576: 
1577:      $TopOffset  = $Y - $Boundaries["T"];
1578:      if ( $Boundaries["B"]-($vY+$IconAreaHeight) < $TopOffset ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $vY+$IconAreaHeight+$TopOffset; }
1579: 
1580:      $Width  = ($Boundaries["R"]+$Margin) - ($Boundaries["L"]-$Margin);
1581:      $Height = ($Boundaries["B"]+$Margin) - ($Boundaries["T"]-$Margin);
1582: 
1583:      return(array("Width"=>$Width,"Height"=>$Height));
1584:     }
1585:
