1586:    /* Draw the legend of the active series */
1587:    function drawLegend($X,$Y,$Format="")
1588:     {
1589:      $Family    = isset($Format["Family"]) ? $Format["Family"] : LEGEND_FAMILY_BOX;
1590:      $FontName  = isset($Format["FontName"]) ? $Format["FontName"] : $this->FontName;
1591:      $FontSize  = isset($Format["FontSize"]) ? $Format["FontSize"] : $this->FontSize;
1592:      $FontR = isset($Format["FontR"]) ? $Format["FontR"] : $this->FontColorR;
1593:      $FontG = isset($Format["FontG"]) ? $Format["FontG"] : $this->FontColorG;
1594:      $FontB = isset($Format["FontB"]) ? $Format["FontB"] : $this->FontColorB;
1595:      $BoxWidth  = isset($Format["BoxWidth"]) ? $Format["BoxWidth"] : 5;
1596:      $BoxHeight = isset($Format["BoxHeight"]) ? $Format["BoxHeight"] : 5;
1597:      $IconAreaWidth = isset($Format["IconAreaWidth"]) ? $Format["IconAreaWidth"] : $BoxWidth;
1598:      $IconAreaHeight    = isset($Format["IconAreaHeight"]) ? $Format["IconAreaHeight"] : $BoxHeight;
1599:      $XSpacing  = isset($Format["XSpacing"]) ? $Format["XSpacing"] : 5;
1600:      $Margin    = isset($Format["Margin"]) ? $Format["Margin"] : 5;
1601:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 200;
1602:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 200;
1603:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 200;
1604:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
1605:      $BorderR   = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : 255;
1606:      $BorderG   = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : 255;
1607:      $BorderB   = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : 255;
1608:      $Surrounding = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
1609:      $Style = isset($Format["Style"]) ? $Format["Style"] : LEGEND_ROUND;
1610:      $Mode  = isset($Format["Mode"]) ? $Format["Mode"] : LEGEND_VERTICAL;
1611: 
1612:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R + $Surrounding; $BorderG = $G + $Surrounding; $BorderB = $B + $Surrounding; }
1613: 
1614:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
1615: 
1616:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
1617:       {
1618:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] && isset($Serie["Picture"]))
1619:         {
1620:          list($PicWidth,$PicHeight) = $this->getPicInfo($Serie["Picture"]);
1621:          if ( $IconAreaWidth < $PicWidth ) { $IconAreaWidth = $PicWidth; }
1622:          if ( $IconAreaHeight < $PicHeight ) { $IconAreaHeight = $PicHeight; }
1623:         }
1624:       }
1625: 
1626:      $YStep = max($this->FontSize,$IconAreaHeight) + 5;
1627:      $XStep = $IconAreaWidth + 5;
1628:      $XStep = $XSpacing;
1629: 
1630:      $Boundaries = ""; $Boundaries["L"] = $X; $Boundaries["T"] = $Y; $Boundaries["R"] = 0; $Boundaries["B"] = 0; $vY = $Y; $vX = $X;
1631:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
1632:       {
1633:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
1634:         {
1635:          if ( $Mode == LEGEND_VERTICAL )
1636:           {
1637:            $BoxArray = $this->getTextBox($vX+$IconAreaWidth+4,$vY+$IconAreaHeight/2,$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Serie["Description"]);
1638: 
1639:            if ( $Boundaries["T"] > $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["T"] = $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1640:            if ( $Boundaries["R"] < $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2 ) { $Boundaries["R"] = $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2; }
1641:            if ( $Boundaries["B"] < $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1642: 
1643:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1644:            $vY = $vY + max($this->FontSize*count($Lines),$IconAreaHeight) + 5;
1645:           }
1646:          elseif ( $Mode == LEGEND_HORIZONTAL )
1647:           {
1648:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1649:            $Width = "";
1650:            foreach($Lines as $Key => $Value)
1651:             {
1652:              $BoxArray = $this->getTextBox($vX+$IconAreaWidth+6,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2+(($this->FontSize+3)*$Key),$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Value);
1653: 
1654:              if ( $Boundaries["T"] > $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["T"] = $BoxArray[2]["Y"]+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1655:              if ( $Boundaries["R"] < $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2 ) { $Boundaries["R"] = $BoxArray[1]["X"]+2; }
1656:              if ( $Boundaries["B"] < $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2 ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $BoxArray[1]["Y"]+2+$IconAreaHeight/2; }
1657: 
1658:              $Width[] = $BoxArray[1]["X"];
1659:             }
1660: 
1661:            $vX=max($Width)+$XStep;
1662:           }
1663:         }
1664:       }
1665:      $vY=$vY-$YStep; $vX=$vX-$XStep;
1666: 
1667:      $TopOffset  = $Y - $Boundaries["T"];
1668:      if ( $Boundaries["B"]-($vY+$IconAreaHeight) < $TopOffset ) { $Boundaries["B"] = $vY+$IconAreaHeight+$TopOffset; }
1669: 
1670:      if ( $Style == LEGEND_ROUND )
1671:       $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($Boundaries["L"]-$Margin,$Boundaries["T"]-$Margin,$Boundaries["R"]+$Margin,$Boundaries["B"]+$Margin,$Margin,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB));
1672:      elseif ( $Style == LEGEND_BOX )
1673:       $this->drawFilledRectangle($Boundaries["L"]-$Margin,$Boundaries["T"]-$Margin,$Boundaries["R"]+$Margin,$Boundaries["B"]+$Margin,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB));
1674: 
1675:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow; $this->Shadow = FALSE;
1676:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
1677:       {
1678:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
1679:         {
1680:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"];
1681:          $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
1682: 
1683:          if ( isset($Serie["Picture"]) )
1684:           {
1685:            $Picture = $Serie["Picture"];
1686:            list($PicWidth,$PicHeight) = $this->getPicInfo($Picture);
1687:            $PicX = $X+$IconAreaWidth/2; $PicY = $Y+$IconAreaHeight/2; 
1688: 
1689:            $this->drawFromPNG($PicX-$PicWidth/2,$PicY-$PicHeight/2,$Picture);
1690:           }
1691:          else
1692:           {
1693:            if ( $Family == LEGEND_FAMILY_BOX )
1694:             {
1695:              if ( $BoxWidth != $IconAreaWidth ) { $XOffset = floor(($IconAreaWidth-$BoxWidth)/2); } else { $XOffset = 0; }
1696:              if ( $BoxHeight != $IconAreaHeight ) { $YOffset = floor(($IconAreaHeight-$BoxHeight)/2); } else { $YOffset = 0; }
1697: 
1698:              $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+1+$XOffset,$Y+1+$YOffset,$X+$BoxWidth+$XOffset+1,$Y+$BoxHeight+1+$YOffset,array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>20));
1699:              $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset,$Y+$YOffset,$X+$BoxWidth+$XOffset,$Y+$BoxHeight+$YOffset,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Surrounding"=>20));
1700:             }
1701:            elseif ( $Family == LEGEND_FAMILY_CIRCLE )
1702:             {
1703:              $this->drawFilledCircle($X+1+$IconAreaWidth/2,$Y+1+$IconAreaHeight/2,min($IconAreaHeight/2,$IconAreaWidth/2),array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>20));
1704:              $this->drawFilledCircle($X+$IconAreaWidth/2,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2,min($IconAreaHeight/2,$IconAreaWidth/2),array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Surrounding"=>20));
1705:             }
1706:            elseif ( $Family == LEGEND_FAMILY_LINE )
1707:             {
1708:              $this->drawLine($X+1,$Y+1+$IconAreaHeight/2,$X+1+$IconAreaWidth,$Y+1+$IconAreaHeight/2,array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>20,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
1709:              $this->drawLine($X,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2,$X+$IconAreaWidth,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
1710:             }
1711:           }
1712: 
1713:          if ( $Mode == LEGEND_VERTICAL )
1714:           {
1715:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1716:            foreach($Lines as $Key => $Value)
1717:             $this->drawText($X+$IconAreaWidth+4,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2+(($this->FontSize+3)*$Key),$Value,array("R"=>$FontR,"G"=>$FontG,"B"=>$FontB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT,"FontSize"=>$FontSize,"FontName"=>$FontName));
1718: 
1719:            $Y=$Y+max($this->FontSize*count($Lines),$IconAreaHeight) + 5;
1720:           }
1721:          elseif ( $Mode == LEGEND_HORIZONTAL )
1722:           {
1723:            $Lines = preg_split("/\n/",$Serie["Description"]);
1724:            $Width = "";
1725:            foreach($Lines as $Key => $Value)
1726:             {
1727:              $BoxArray = $this->drawText($X+$IconAreaWidth+4,$Y+$IconAreaHeight/2+(($this->FontSize+3)*$Key),$Value,array("R"=>$FontR,"G"=>$FontG,"B"=>$FontB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT,"FontSize"=>$FontSize,"FontName"=>$FontName));
1728:              $Width[] = $BoxArray[1]["X"];
1729:             }
1730:            $X=max($Width)+2+$XStep;
1731:           }
1732:         }
1733:       }
1734: 
1735: 
1736:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
1737:     }
1738: 
1739:    function drawScale($Format="")
1740:     {
1741:      $Pos       = isset($Format["Pos"]) ? $Format["Pos"] : SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT;
1742:      $Floating      = isset($Format["Floating"]) ? $Format["Floating"] : FALSE;
1743:      $Mode      = isset($Format["Mode"]) ? $Format["Mode"] : SCALE_MODE_FLOATING;
1744:      $RemoveXAxis   = isset($Format["RemoveXAxis"]) ? $Format["RemoveXAxis"] : FALSE;
1745:      $MinDivHeight  = isset($Format["MinDivHeight"]) ? $Format["MinDivHeight"] : 20;
1746:      $Factors       = isset($Format["Factors"]) ? $Format["Factors"] : array(1,2,5);
1747:      $ManualScale   = isset($Format["ManualScale"]) ? $Format["ManualScale"] : array("0"=>array("Min"=>-100,"Max"=>100));
1748:      $XMargin       = isset($Format["XMargin"]) ? $Format["XMargin"] : AUTO;
1749:      $YMargin       = isset($Format["YMargin"]) ? $Format["YMargin"] : 0;
1750:      $ScaleSpacing  = isset($Format["ScaleSpacing"]) ? $Format["ScaleSpacing"] : 15;
1751:      $InnerTickWidth    = isset($Format["InnerTickWidth"]) ? $Format["InnerTickWidth"] : 2;
1752:      $OuterTickWidth    = isset($Format["OuterTickWidth"]) ? $Format["OuterTickWidth"] : 2;
1753:      $DrawXLines    = isset($Format["DrawXLines"]) ? $Format["DrawXLines"] : TRUE;
1754:      $DrawYLines    = isset($Format["DrawYLines"]) ? $Format["DrawYLines"] : ALL;
1755:      $GridTicks     = isset($Format["GridTicks"]) ? $Format["GridTicks"] : 4;
1756:      $GridR     = isset($Format["GridR"]) ? $Format["GridR"] : 255;
1757:      $GridG     = isset($Format["GridG"]) ? $Format["GridG"] : 255;
1758:      $GridB     = isset($Format["GridB"]) ? $Format["GridB"] : 255;
1759:      $GridAlpha     = isset($Format["GridAlpha"]) ? $Format["GridAlpha"] : 40;
1760:      $AxisRo        = isset($Format["AxisR"]) ? $Format["AxisR"] : 0;
1761:      $AxisGo        = isset($Format["AxisG"]) ? $Format["AxisG"] : 0;
1762:      $AxisBo        = isset($Format["AxisB"]) ? $Format["AxisB"] : 0;
1763:      $AxisAlpha     = isset($Format["AxisAlpha"]) ? $Format["AxisAlpha"] : 100;
1764:      $TickRo        = isset($Format["TickR"]) ? $Format["TickR"] : 0;
1765:      $TickGo        = isset($Format["TickG"]) ? $Format["TickG"] : 0;
1766:      $TickBo        = isset($Format["TickB"]) ? $Format["TickB"] : 0;
1767:      $TickAlpha     = isset($Format["TickAlpha"]) ? $Format["TickAlpha"] : 100;
1768:      $DrawSubTicks  = isset($Format["DrawSubTicks"]) ? $Format["DrawSubTicks"] : FALSE;
1769:      $InnerSubTickWidth = isset($Format["InnerSubTickWidth"]) ? $Format["InnerSubTickWidth"] : 0;
1770:      $OuterSubTickWidth = isset($Format["OuterSubTickWidth"]) ? $Format["OuterSubTickWidth"] : 2;
1771:      $SubTickR      = isset($Format["SubTickR"]) ? $Format["SubTickR"] : 255;
1772:      $SubTickG      = isset($Format["SubTickG"]) ? $Format["SubTickG"] : 0;
1773:      $SubTickB      = isset($Format["SubTickB"]) ? $Format["SubTickB"] : 0;
1774:      $SubTickAlpha  = isset($Format["SubTickAlpha"]) ? $Format["SubTickAlpha"] : 100;
1775:      $AutoAxisLabels    = isset($Format["AutoAxisLabels"]) ? $Format["AutoAxisLabels"] : TRUE;
1776:      $XReleasePercent   = isset($Format["XReleasePercent"]) ? $Format["XReleasePercent"] : 1;
1777:      $DrawArrows    = isset($Format["DrawArrows"]) ? $Format["DrawArrows"] : FALSE;
1778:      $ArrowSize         = isset($Format["ArrowSize"]) ? $Format["ArrowSize"] : 8;
1779:      $CycleBackground   = isset($Format["CycleBackground"]) ? $Format["CycleBackground"] : FALSE;
1780:      $BackgroundR1  = isset($Format["BackgroundR1"]) ? $Format["BackgroundR1"] : 255;
1781:      $BackgroundG1  = isset($Format["BackgroundG1"]) ? $Format["BackgroundG1"] : 255;
1782:      $BackgroundB1  = isset($Format["BackgroundB1"]) ? $Format["BackgroundB1"] : 255;
1783:      $BackgroundAlpha1  = isset($Format["BackgroundAlpha1"]) ? $Format["BackgroundAlpha1"] : 20;
1784:      $BackgroundR2  = isset($Format["BackgroundR2"]) ? $Format["BackgroundR2"] : 230;
1785:      $BackgroundG2  = isset($Format["BackgroundG2"]) ? $Format["BackgroundG2"] : 230;
1786:      $BackgroundB2  = isset($Format["BackgroundB2"]) ? $Format["BackgroundB2"] : 230;
1787:      $BackgroundAlpha2  = isset($Format["BackgroundAlpha2"]) ? $Format["BackgroundAlpha2"] : 20;
1788:      $LabelingMethod    = isset($Format["LabelingMethod"]) ? $Format["LabelingMethod"] : LABELING_ALL;
1789:      $LabelSkip     = isset($Format["LabelSkip"]) ? $Format["LabelSkip"] : 0;
1790:      $LabelRotation = isset($Format["LabelRotation"]) ? $Format["LabelRotation"] : 0;
1791:      $SkippedAxisTicks  = isset($Format["SkippedAxisTicks"]) ? $Format["SkippedAxisTicks"] : $GridTicks+2;
1792:      $SkippedAxisR  = isset($Format["SkippedAxisR"]) ? $Format["SkippedAxisR"] : $GridR;
1793:      $SkippedAxisG  = isset($Format["SkippedAxisG"]) ? $Format["SkippedAxisG"] : $GridG;
1794:      $SkippedAxisB  = isset($Format["SkippedAxisB"]) ? $Format["SkippedAxisB"] : $GridB;
1795:      $SkippedAxisAlpha  = isset($Format["SkippedAxisAlpha"]) ? $Format["SkippedAxisAlpha"] : $GridAlpha-30;
1796:      $SkippedTickR  = isset($Format["SkippedTickR"]) ? $Format["SkippedTickR"] : $TickRo;
1797:      $SkippedTickG  = isset($Format["SkippedTickG"]) ? $Format["SkippedTickG"] : $TickGo;
1798:      $SkippedTickB  = isset($Format["SkippedTicksB"]) ? $Format["SkippedTickB"] : $TickBo;
1799:      $SkippedTickAlpha  = isset($Format["SkippedTickAlpha"]) ? $Format["SkippedTickAlpha"] : $TickAlpha-80;
1800:      $SkippedInnerTickWidth = isset($Format["SkippedInnerTickWidth"]) ? $Format["SkippedInnerTickWidth"] : 0;
1801:      $SkippedOuterTickWidth = isset($Format["SkippedOuterTickWidth"]) ? $Format["SkippedOuterTickWidth"] : 2;
1802: 
1803:      /* Floating scale require X & Y margins to be set manually */
1804:      if ( $Floating && ( $XMargin == AUTO || $YMargin == 0 ) ) { $Floating = FALSE; }
1805: 
1806:      /* Skip a NOTICE event in case of an empty array */
1807:      if ( $DrawYLines == NONE || $DrawYLines == FALSE ) { $DrawYLines = array("zarma"=>"31"); }
1808: 
1809:      /* Define the color for the skipped elements */
1810:      $SkippedAxisColor = array("R"=>$SkippedAxisR,"G"=>$SkippedAxisG,"B"=>$SkippedAxisB,"Alpha"=>$SkippedAxisAlpha,"Ticks"=>$SkippedAxisTicks);
1811:      $SkippedTickColor = array("R"=>$SkippedTickR,"G"=>$SkippedTickG,"B"=>$SkippedTickB,"Alpha"=>$SkippedTickAlpha);
1812: 
1813:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
1814:      if ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) ) { $Abscissa = $Data["Abscissa"]; } else { $Abscissa = NULL; }
1815: 
1816:      /* Unset the abscissa axis, needed if we display multiple charts on the same picture */
1817:      if ( $Abscissa != NULL )
1818:       {
1819:        foreach($Data["Axis"] as $AxisID => $Parameters)
1820:         { if ($Parameters["Identity"] == AXIS_X) { unset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]); } }
1821:       }
1822: 
1823:      /* Build the scale settings */
1824:      $GotXAxis = FALSE;
1825:      foreach($Data["Axis"] as $AxisID => $AxisParameter)
1826:       {
1827:        if ( $AxisParameter["Identity"] == AXIS_X ) { $GotXAxis = TRUE; }
1828: 
1829:        if ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT && $AxisParameter["Identity"] == AXIS_Y)
1830:         { $Height = $this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1 - $YMargin*2; }
1831:        elseif ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT && $AxisParameter["Identity"] == AXIS_X)
1832:         { $Height = $this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1; }
1833:        elseif ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM && $AxisParameter["Identity"] == AXIS_Y)
1834:         { $Height = $this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1 - $YMargin*2;; }
1835:        else
1836:         { $Height = $this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1; }
1837: 
1838:        $AxisMin = ABSOLUTE_MAX; $AxisMax = OUT_OF_SIGHT;
1839:        if ( $Mode == SCALE_MODE_FLOATING || $Mode == SCALE_MODE_START0 )
1840:         {
1841:          foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieID => $SerieParameter)
1842:           {
1843:            if ( $SerieParameter["Axis"] == $AxisID && $Data["Series"][$SerieID]["isDrawable"] && $Data["Abscissa"] != $SerieID)
1844:             {
1845:              $AxisMax = max($AxisMax,$Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Max"]);
1846:              $AxisMin = min($AxisMin,$Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Min"]);
1847:             }
1848:           }
1849:          $AutoMargin = (($AxisMax-$AxisMin)/100)*$XReleasePercent;
1850: 
1851:          $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"] = $AxisMin-$AutoMargin; $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Max"] = $AxisMax+$AutoMargin;
1852:          if ( $Mode == SCALE_MODE_START0 ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"] = 0; }
1853:         }
1854:        elseif ( $Mode == SCALE_MODE_MANUAL )
1855:         {
1856:          if ( isset($ManualScale[$AxisID]["Min"]) && isset($ManualScale[$AxisID]["Max"]) )
1857:           {
1858:            $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"] = $ManualScale[$AxisID]["Min"];
1859:            $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Max"] = $ManualScale[$AxisID]["Max"];
1860:           }
1861:          else
1862:           { echo "Manual scale boundaries not set."; exit(); }
1863:         }
1864:        elseif ( $Mode == SCALE_MODE_ADDALL || $Mode == SCALE_MODE_ADDALL_START0 )
1865:         {
1866:          $Series = "";
1867:          foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieID => $SerieParameter)
1868:           { if ( $SerieParameter["Axis"] == $AxisID && $SerieParameter["isDrawable"] && $Data["Abscissa"] != $SerieID ) { $Series[$SerieID] = count($Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Data"]); } }
1869: 
1870:          for ($ID=0;$ID<=max($Series)-1;$ID++)
1871:           {
1872:            $PointMin = 0; $PointMax = 0;
1873:            foreach($Series as $SerieID => $ValuesCount )
1874:             {
1875:              if (isset($Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Data"][$ID]) && $Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Data"][$ID] != NULL )
1876:               {
1877:                $Value = $Data["Series"][$SerieID]["Data"][$ID];
1878:                if ( $Value > 0 ) { $PointMax = $PointMax + $Value; } else { $PointMin = $PointMin + $Value; }
1879:               }
1880:             }
1881:            $AxisMax = max($AxisMax,$PointMax);
1882:            $AxisMin = min($AxisMin,$PointMin);
1883:           }
1884:          $AutoMargin = (($AxisMax-$AxisMin)/100)*$XReleasePercent;
1885:          $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"] = $AxisMin-$AutoMargin; $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Max"] = $AxisMax+$AutoMargin;
1886:         }
1887:        $MaxDivs = floor($Height/$MinDivHeight);
1888: 
1889:        if ( $Mode == SCALE_MODE_ADDALL_START0 ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"] = 0; }
1890: 
1891:        $Scale   = $this->computeScale($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Min"],$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Max"],$MaxDivs,$Factors,$AxisID);
1892: 
1893:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]    = $AxisParameter["Identity"] == AXIS_X ? $XMargin : $YMargin;
1894:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMin"]  = $Scale["XMin"];
1895:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMax"]  = $Scale["XMax"];
1896:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Rows"]      = $Scale["Rows"];
1897:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["RowHeight"] = $Scale["RowHeight"];
1898: 
1899:        if ( isset($Scale["Format"]) ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"] = $Scale["Format"]; }
1900: 
1901:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"]) ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"] = NULL; }
1902:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"]) )  { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"] = NULL; }
1903:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"]) )    { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"] = NULL; }
1904:       }
1905: 
1906:      /* Still no X axis */
1907:      if ( $GotXAxis == FALSE )
1908:       {
1909:        if ( $Abscissa != NULL )
1910:         {
1911:          $Points = count($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Data"]);
1912:          if ( $AutoAxisLabels )
1913:           $AxisName = isset($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Description"]) ? $Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Description"] : NULL;
1914:          else
1915:           $AxisName = NULL;
1916:         }
1917:        else
1918:         {
1919:          $Points = 0;
1920:          $AxisName = isset($Data["XAxisName"]) ? $Data["XAxisName"] : NULL;
1921:          foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieID => $SerieParameter)
1922:           { if ( $SerieParameter["isDrawable"] ) { $Points = max($Points,count($SerieParameter["Data"])); } }
1923:         }
1924: 
1925:        $AxisID = count($Data["Axis"]);
1926:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Identity"] = AXIS_X;
1927:        if ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Position"] = AXIS_POSITION_BOTTOM; } else { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Position"] = AXIS_POSITION_LEFT; }
1928:        if ( isset($Data["AbscissaName"]) ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Name"] = $Data["AbscissaName"]; }
1929:        if ( $XMargin == AUTO )
1930:         {
1931:          if ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
1932:           { $Height = $this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1; }
1933:          else
1934:           { $Height = $this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1; }
1935: 
1936:          if ( $Points == 1 )
1937:           $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] = $Height / 2;
1938:          else
1939:           $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] = ($Height/$Points) / 2;
1940:         }
1941:        else
1942:         { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] = $XMargin; }
1943:        $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Rows"] = $Points-1;
1944:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"]) ) { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"] = NULL; }
1945:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"]) )  { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"] = NULL; }
1946:        if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"]) )    { $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"] = NULL; }
1947:       }
1948: 
1949:      /* Do we need to reverse the abscissa position? */
1950:      if ( $Pos != SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
1951:       {
1952:        if ( $Data["AbsicssaPosition"] == AXIS_POSITION_BOTTOM )
1953:         { $Data["AbsicssaPosition"] = AXIS_POSITION_LEFT; }
1954:        else
1955:         { $Data["AbsicssaPosition"] = AXIS_POSITION_RIGHT; }
1956:       }
1957:      $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Position"] = $Data["AbsicssaPosition"];
1958: 
1959:      $this->DataSet->saveOrientation($Pos);
1960:      $this->DataSet->saveAxisConfig($Data["Axis"]);
1961:      $this->DataSet->saveYMargin($YMargin);
1962: 
1963:      $FontColorRo = $this->FontColorR; $FontColorGo = $this->FontColorG; $FontColorBo = $this->FontColorB;
1964: 
1965:      $AxisPos["L"] = $this->GraphAreaX1; $AxisPos["R"] = $this->GraphAreaX2; $AxisPos["T"] = $this->GraphAreaY1; $AxisPos["B"] = $this->GraphAreaY2;
1966:      foreach($Data["Axis"] as $AxisID => $Parameters)
1967:       {
1968:        if ( isset($Parameters["Color"]) )
1969:         {
1970:          $AxisR = $Parameters["Color"]["R"]; $AxisG = $Parameters["Color"]["G"]; $AxisB = $Parameters["Color"]["B"];
1971:          $TickR = $Parameters["Color"]["R"]; $TickG = $Parameters["Color"]["G"]; $TickB = $Parameters["Color"]["B"];
1972:          $this->setFontProperties(array("R"=>$Parameters["Color"]["R"],"G"=>$Parameters["Color"]["G"],"B"=>$Parameters["Color"]["B"]));
1973:         }
1974:        else
1975:         {
1976:          $AxisR = $AxisRo; $AxisG = $AxisGo; $AxisB = $AxisBo;
1977:          $TickR = $TickRo; $TickG = $TickGo; $TickB = $TickBo;
1978:          $this->setFontProperties(array("R"=>$FontColorRo,"G"=>$FontColorGo,"B"=>$FontColorBo));
1979:         }
1980: 
1981:        $LastValue = "w00t"; $ID = 1;
1982:        if ( $Parameters["Identity"] == AXIS_X )
1983:         {
1984:          if ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
1985:           {
1986:            if ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_BOTTOM )
1987:             {
1988:              if ( $LabelRotation == 0 )                 { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $YLabelOffset = 2; }
1989:              if ( $LabelRotation > 0 && $LabelRotation < 190 )      { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; $YLabelOffset = 5; }
1990:              if ( $LabelRotation == 180 )               { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $YLabelOffset = 5; }
1991:              if ( $LabelRotation > 180 && $LabelRotation < 360 )    { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; $YLabelOffset = 2; }
1992: 
1993:              if ( !$RemoveXAxis )
1994:               {
1995:                if ( $Floating )
1996:                 { $FloatingOffset = $YMargin; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
1997:                else
1998:                 { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1,$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2,$AxisPos["B"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
1999: 
2000:                if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2+($ArrowSize*2),$AxisPos["B"],array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2001:               }
2002: 
2003:              $Width = ($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2004: 
2005:              if ($Parameters["Rows"] == 0 ) { $Step  = $Width; } else { $Step  = $Width / ($Parameters["Rows"]); }
2006:              
2007:              $MaxBottom = $AxisPos["B"];
2008:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2009:               {
2010:                $XPos  = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Parameters["Margin"] + $Step*$i;
2011:                $YPos  = $AxisPos["B"];
2012: 
2013:                if ( $Abscissa != NULL )
2014:                 { if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Data"][$i]) ) { $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Data"][$i],$Data["XAxisDisplay"],$Data["XAxisFormat"],$Data["XAxisUnit"]); } else { $Value = ""; } }
2015:                else
2016:                 {
2017:                  if ( isset($Parameters["ScaleMin"]) && isset ($Parameters["RowHeight"]) )
2018:                   $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Data["XAxisDisplay"],$Data["XAxisFormat"],$Data["XAxisUnit"]);
2019:                  else
2020:                   $Value = $i;
2021:                 }
2022: 
2023:                $ID++; $Skipped = TRUE;
2024:                if ( $this->isValidLabel($Value,$LastValue,$LabelingMethod,$ID,$LabelSkip) && !$RemoveXAxis)
2025:                 {
2026:                  $Bounds    = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos+$OuterTickWidth+$YLabelOffset,$Value,array("Angle"=>$LabelRotation,"Align"=>$LabelAlign));
2027:                  $TxtBottom = $YPos+$OuterTickWidth+2+($Bounds[0]["Y"]-$Bounds[2]["Y"]);
2028:                  $MaxBottom = max($MaxBottom,$TxtBottom);
2029:                  $LastValue = $Value;
2030:                  $Skipped   = FALSE;
2031:                 }
2032: 
2033:                if ( $RemoveXAxis ) { $Skipped   = FALSE; }
2034: 
2035:                if ( $Skipped )
2036:                 {
2037:                  if ( $DrawXLines ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,$SkippedAxisColor); }
2038:                  if ( ($SkippedInnerTickWidth !=0 || $SkippedOuterTickWidth != 0) && !$RemoveXAxis ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$YPos-$SkippedInnerTickWidth,$XPos,$YPos+$SkippedOuterTickWidth,$SkippedTickColor); }
2039:                 }
2040:                else
2041:                 {
2042:                  if ( $DrawXLines && ($XPos != $this->GraphAreaX1 && $XPos != $this->GraphAreaX2) ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2043:                  if ( ($InnerTickWidth !=0 || $OuterTickWidth != 0) && !$RemoveXAxis ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$YPos-$InnerTickWidth,$XPos,$YPos+$OuterTickWidth,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha)); }
2044:                 }
2045:               }
2046: 
2047:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) && !$RemoveXAxis)
2048:               {
2049:                $YPos   = $MaxBottom+2;
2050:                $XPos   = $this->GraphAreaX1+($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/2;
2051:                $Bounds = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE));
2052:                $MaxBottom = $Bounds[0]["Y"];
2053: 
2054:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["Y2"] = $MaxBottom + $this->FontSize;
2055:               }
2056: 
2057:              $AxisPos["B"] = $MaxBottom + $ScaleSpacing;
2058:             }
2059:            elseif ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_TOP )
2060:             {
2061:              if ( $LabelRotation == 0 )                 { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $YLabelOffset = 2; }
2062:              if ( $LabelRotation > 0 && $LabelRotation < 190 )      { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; $YLabelOffset = 2; }
2063:              if ( $LabelRotation == 180 )               { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $YLabelOffset = 5; }
2064:              if ( $LabelRotation > 180 && $LabelRotation < 360 )    { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; $YLabelOffset = 5; }
2065: 
2066:              if ( !$RemoveXAxis )
2067:               {
2068:                if ( $Floating )
2069:                 { $FloatingOffset = $YMargin; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["T"],$this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["T"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }

2072:

2074:               }
2075:

2077:

2079:

2081:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)

2133:           }
2134:          elseif ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
2135:           {
2136:            if ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_LEFT )
2137:             {

2152:

2156:

2213:              if ( $LabelRotation == 180 )               { $LabelAlign = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; $XLabelOffset = 5; }

2215:

2217:               {
2218:                if ( $Floating )
2219:                 { $FloatingOffset = $YMargin; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2-$Parameters["Margin"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2220:                else
2221:                 { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1,$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2,array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2222: 
2223:                if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2+($ArrowSize*2),array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2224:               }
2225: 
2226:              $Height = ($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2227: 
2228:              if ($Parameters["Rows"] == 0 ) { $Step  = $Height; } else { $Step   = $Height / $Parameters["Rows"]; }
2229:              
2230:              $MaxRight = $AxisPos["R"];
2231:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2232:               {
2233:                $YPos  = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $Parameters["Margin"] + $Step*$i;
2234:                $XPos  = $AxisPos["R"];
2235: 
2236:                if ( $Abscissa != NULL )
2237:                 { if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Data"][$i]) ) { $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Data["Series"][$Abscissa]["Data"][$i],$Data["XAxisDisplay"],$Data["XAxisFormat"],$Data["XAxisUnit"]); } else { $Value = ""; } }
2238:                else
2239:                 {
2240:                  if ( isset($Parameters["ScaleMin"]) && isset ($Parameters["RowHeight"]) )
2241:                   $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Data["XAxisDisplay"],$Data["XAxisFormat"],$Data["XAxisUnit"]);
2242:                  else
2243:                   $Value = $i;
2244:                 }
2245: 
2246:                $ID++; $Skipped = TRUE;
2247:                if ( $this->isValidLabel($Value,$LastValue,$LabelingMethod,$ID,$LabelSkip) && !$RemoveXAxis)
2248:                 {
2249:                  $Bounds   = $this->drawText($XPos+$OuterTickWidth+$XLabelOffset,$YPos,$Value,array("Angle"=>$LabelRotation,"Align"=>$LabelAlign));
2250:                  $TxtBox   = $XPos+$OuterTickWidth+2+($Bounds[1]["X"]-$Bounds[0]["X"]);
2251:                  $MaxRight = max($MaxRight,$TxtBox);
2252:                  $LastValue = $Value;
2253:                  $Skipped   = FALSE;
2254:                 }
2255: 
2256:                if ( $RemoveXAxis ) { $Skipped   = FALSE; }
2257: 
2258:                if ( $Skipped )
2259:                 {
2260:                  if ( $DrawXLines ) { $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$SkippedAxisColor); }
2261:                  if ( ($SkippedInnerTickWidth != 0 || $SkippedOuterTickWidth != 0) && !$RemoveXAxis ) { $this->drawLine($XPos+$SkippedOuterTickWidth,$YPos,$XPos-$SkippedInnerTickWidth,$YPos,$SkippedTickColor); }
2262:                 }
2263:                else
2264:                 {
2265:                  if ( $DrawXLines ) { $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2266:                  if ( ($InnerTickWidth != 0 || $OuterTickWidth != 0) && !$RemoveXAxis ) { $this->drawLine($XPos+$OuterTickWidth,$YPos,$XPos-$InnerTickWidth,$YPos,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha)); }
2267:                 }
2268: 
2269:               }
2270: 
2271:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) && !$RemoveXAxis)
2272:               {
2273:                $XPos   = $MaxRight+4;
2274:                $YPos   = $this->GraphAreaY1+($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/2;
2275:                $Bounds = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE,"Angle"=>270));
2276:                $MaxRight = $Bounds[1]["X"];
2277: 
2278:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["X2"] = $MaxRight + $this->FontSize;
2279:               }
2280: 
2281:              $AxisPos["R"] = $MaxRight + $ScaleSpacing;
2282:             }
2283:           }
2284:         }
2285: 
2286: 
2287: 
2288:        if ( $Parameters["Identity"] == AXIS_Y )
2289:         {
2290:          if ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
2291:           {
2292:            if ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_LEFT )
2293:             {
2294: 
2295:              if ( $Floating )
2296:               { $FloatingOffset = $XMargin; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY2-$Parameters["Margin"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2297:              else
2298:               { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY1,$AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY2,array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2299: 
2300:              if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["L"],$this->GraphAreaY1-($ArrowSize*2),array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2301: 
2302:              $Height = ($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2303:              $Step   = $Height / $Parameters["Rows"]; $SubTicksSize = $Step /2; $MinLeft = $AxisPos["L"];
2304:              $LastY  = NULL;
2305:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2306:               {
2307:                $YPos  = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $Parameters["Margin"] - $Step*$i;
2308:                $XPos  = $AxisPos["L"];
2309:                $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Parameters["Display"],$Parameters["Format"],$Parameters["Unit"]);
2310: 
2311:                if ( $i%2 == 1 ) { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR1,"G"=>$BackgroundG1,"B"=>$BackgroundB1,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha1); } else { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR2,"G"=>$BackgroundG2,"B"=>$BackgroundB2,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha2); }
2312:                if ( $LastY != NULL && $CycleBackground && ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) )) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$LastY,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$BGColor); }
2313: 
2314:                if ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) ) { $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2315: 
2316:                if ( $DrawSubTicks && $i != $Parameters["Rows"] )
2317:                 $this->drawLine($XPos-$OuterSubTickWidth,$YPos-$SubTicksSize,$XPos+$InnerSubTickWidth,$YPos-$SubTicksSize,array("R"=>$SubTickR,"G"=>$SubTickG,"B"=>$SubTickB,"Alpha"=>$SubTickAlpha));
2318: 
2319:                $this->drawLine($XPos-$OuterTickWidth,$YPos,$XPos+$InnerTickWidth,$YPos,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha));
2320:                $Bounds  = $this->drawText($XPos-$OuterTickWidth-2,$YPos,$Value,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT));
2321:                $TxtLeft = $XPos-$OuterTickWidth-2-($Bounds[1]["X"]-$Bounds[0]["X"]);
2322:                $MinLeft = min($MinLeft,$TxtLeft);
2323: 
2324:                $LastY = $YPos;
2325:               }
2326: 
2327:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) )
2328:               {
2329:                $XPos    = $MinLeft-2;
2330:                $YPos    = $this->GraphAreaY1+($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/2;
2331:                $Bounds  = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE,"Angle"=>90));
2332:                $MinLeft = $Bounds[2]["X"];
2333: 
2334:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["X1"] = $MinLeft;
2335:               }
2336: 
2337:              $AxisPos["L"] = $MinLeft - $ScaleSpacing;
2338:             }
2339:            elseif ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_RIGHT )
2340:             {
2341:              if ( $Floating )
2342:               { $FloatingOffset = $XMargin; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2-$Parameters["Margin"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2343:              else
2344:               { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1,$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY2,array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2345: 
2346:              if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["R"],$this->GraphAreaY1-($ArrowSize*2),array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2347: 
2348:              $Height = ($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2349:              $Step   = $Height / $Parameters["Rows"]; $SubTicksSize = $Step /2; $MaxLeft = $AxisPos["R"];
2350:              $LastY  = NULL;
2351:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2352:               {
2353:                $YPos  = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $Parameters["Margin"] - $Step*$i;
2354:                $XPos  = $AxisPos["R"];
2355:                $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Parameters["Display"],$Parameters["Format"],$Parameters["Unit"]);
2356: 
2357:                if ( $i%2 == 1 ) { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR1,"G"=>$BackgroundG1,"B"=>$BackgroundB1,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha1); } else { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR2,"G"=>$BackgroundG2,"B"=>$BackgroundB2,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha2); }
2358:                if ( $LastY != NULL && $CycleBackground  && ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) )) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$LastY,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$BGColor); }
2359: 
2360:                if ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) ) { $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$FloatingOffset,$YPos,$this->GraphAreaX2-$FloatingOffset,$YPos,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2361: 
2362:                if ( $DrawSubTicks && $i != $Parameters["Rows"] )
2363:                 $this->drawLine($XPos-$OuterSubTickWidth,$YPos-$SubTicksSize,$XPos+$InnerSubTickWidth,$YPos-$SubTicksSize,array("R"=>$SubTickR,"G"=>$SubTickG,"B"=>$SubTickB,"Alpha"=>$SubTickAlpha));
2364: 
2365:                $this->drawLine($XPos-$InnerTickWidth,$YPos,$XPos+$OuterTickWidth,$YPos,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha));
2366:                $Bounds  = $this->drawText($XPos+$OuterTickWidth+2,$YPos,$Value,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT));
2367:                $TxtLeft = $XPos+$OuterTickWidth+2+($Bounds[1]["X"]-$Bounds[0]["X"]);
2368:                $MaxLeft = max($MaxLeft,$TxtLeft);
2369: 
2370:                $LastY = $YPos;
2371:               }
2372: 
2373:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) )
2374:               {
2375:                $XPos    = $MaxLeft+6;
2376:                $YPos    = $this->GraphAreaY1+($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/2;
2377:                $Bounds  = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE,"Angle"=>270));
2378:                $MaxLeft = $Bounds[2]["X"];
2379: 
2380:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["X2"] = $MaxLeft + $this->FontSize;
2381:               }
2382:              $AxisPos["R"] = $MaxLeft + $ScaleSpacing;
2383:             }
2384:           }
2385:          elseif ( $Pos == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
2386:           {
2387:            if ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_TOP )
2388:             {
2389:              if ( $Floating )
2390:               { $FloatingOffset = $XMargin; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["T"],$this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["T"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2391:              else
2392:               { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1,$AxisPos["T"],$this->GraphAreaX2,$AxisPos["T"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2393: 
2394:              if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["T"],$this->GraphAreaX2+($ArrowSize*2),$AxisPos["T"],array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2395: 
2396:              $Width = ($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2397:              $Step   = $Width / $Parameters["Rows"]; $SubTicksSize = $Step /2; $MinTop = $AxisPos["T"];
2398:              $LastX  = NULL;
2399:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2400:               {
2401:                $XPos  = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Parameters["Margin"] + $Step*$i;
2402:                $YPos  = $AxisPos["T"];
2403:                $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Parameters["Display"],$Parameters["Format"],$Parameters["Unit"]);
2404: 
2405:                if ( $i%2 == 1 ) { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR1,"G"=>$BackgroundG1,"B"=>$BackgroundB1,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha1); } else { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR2,"G"=>$BackgroundG2,"B"=>$BackgroundB2,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha2); }
2406:                if ( $LastX != NULL && $CycleBackground  && ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) )) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($LastX,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,$BGColor); }
2407: 
2408:                if ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2409: 
2410:                if ( $DrawSubTicks && $i != $Parameters["Rows"] )
2411:                 $this->drawLine($XPos+$SubTicksSize,$YPos-$OuterSubTickWidth,$XPos+$SubTicksSize,$YPos+$InnerSubTickWidth,array("R"=>$SubTickR,"G"=>$SubTickG,"B"=>$SubTickB,"Alpha"=>$SubTickAlpha));
2412: 
2413:                $this->drawLine($XPos,$YPos-$OuterTickWidth,$XPos,$YPos+$InnerTickWidth,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha));
2414:                $Bounds    = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos-$OuterTickWidth-2,$Value,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
2415:                $TxtHeight = $YPos-$OuterTickWidth-2-($Bounds[1]["Y"]-$Bounds[2]["Y"]);
2416:                $MinTop    = min($MinTop,$TxtHeight);
2417: 
2418:                $LastX = $XPos;
2419:               }
2420: 
2421:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) )
2422:               {
2423:                $YPos   = $MinTop-2;
2424:                $XPos   = $this->GraphAreaX1+($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/2;
2425:                $Bounds = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
2426:                $MinTop = $Bounds[2]["Y"];
2427: 
2428:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["Y1"] = $MinTop;
2429:               }
2430: 
2431:              $AxisPos["T"] = $MinTop - $ScaleSpacing;
2432:             }
2433:            elseif ( $Parameters["Position"] == AXIS_POSITION_BOTTOM )
2434:             {
2435:              if ( $Floating )
2436:               { $FloatingOffset = $XMargin; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2437:              else
2438:               { $FloatingOffset = 0; $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1,$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2,$AxisPos["B"],array("R"=>$AxisR,"G"=>$AxisG,"B"=>$AxisB,"Alpha"=>$AxisAlpha)); }
2439: 
2440:              if ( $DrawArrows ) { $this->drawArrow($this->GraphAreaX2-$Parameters["Margin"],$AxisPos["B"],$this->GraphAreaX2+($ArrowSize*2),$AxisPos["B"],array("FillR"=>$AxisR,"FillG"=>$AxisG,"FillB"=>$AxisB,"Size"=>$ArrowSize)); }
2441: 
2442:              $Width = ($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $Parameters["Margin"]*2;
2443:              $Step   = $Width / $Parameters["Rows"]; $SubTicksSize = $Step /2; $MaxBottom = $AxisPos["B"];
2444:              $LastX  = NULL;
2445:              for($i=0;$i<=$Parameters["Rows"];$i++)
2446:               {
2447:                $XPos  = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Parameters["Margin"] + $Step*$i;
2448:                $YPos  = $AxisPos["B"];
2449:                $Value = $this->scaleFormat($Parameters["ScaleMin"] + $Parameters["RowHeight"]*$i,$Parameters["Display"],$Parameters["Format"],$Parameters["Unit"]);
2450: 
2451:                if ( $i%2 == 1 ) { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR1,"G"=>$BackgroundG1,"B"=>$BackgroundB1,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha1); } else { $BGColor = array("R"=>$BackgroundR2,"G"=>$BackgroundG2,"B"=>$BackgroundB2,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha2); }
2452:                if ( $LastX != NULL && $CycleBackground  && ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) )) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($LastX,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,$BGColor); }
2453: 
2454:                if ( $DrawYLines == ALL || in_array($AxisID,$DrawYLines) ) { $this->drawLine($XPos,$this->GraphAreaY1+$FloatingOffset,$XPos,$this->GraphAreaY2-$FloatingOffset,array("R"=>$GridR,"G"=>$GridG,"B"=>$GridB,"Alpha"=>$GridAlpha,"Ticks"=>$GridTicks)); }
2455: 
2456:                if ( $DrawSubTicks && $i != $Parameters["Rows"] )
2457:                 $this->drawLine($XPos+$SubTicksSize,$YPos-$OuterSubTickWidth,$XPos+$SubTicksSize,$YPos+$InnerSubTickWidth,array("R"=>$SubTickR,"G"=>$SubTickG,"B"=>$SubTickB,"Alpha"=>$SubTickAlpha));
2458: 
2459:                $this->drawLine($XPos,$YPos-$OuterTickWidth,$XPos,$YPos+$InnerTickWidth,array("R"=>$TickR,"G"=>$TickG,"B"=>$TickB,"Alpha"=>$TickAlpha));
2460:                $Bounds    = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos+$OuterTickWidth+2,$Value,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE));
2461:                $TxtHeight = $YPos+$OuterTickWidth+2+($Bounds[1]["Y"]-$Bounds[2]["Y"]);
2462:                $MaxBottom = max($MaxBottom,$TxtHeight);
2463: 
2464:                $LastX = $XPos;
2465:               }
2466: 
2467:              if ( isset($Parameters["Name"]) )
2468:               {
2469:                $YPos   = $MaxBottom+2;
2470:                $XPos   = $this->GraphAreaX1+($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/2;
2471:                $Bounds = $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$Parameters["Name"],array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE));
2472:                $MaxBottom = $Bounds[0]["Y"];
2473: 
2474:                $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["Y2"] = $MaxBottom + $this->FontSize;
2475:               }
2476: 
2477:              $AxisPos["B"] = $MaxBottom + $ScaleSpacing;
2478:             }
2479:           }
2480:         }
2481:       }
2482:     }
2483: 
2484:    function isValidLabel($Value,$LastValue,$LabelingMethod,$ID,$LabelSkip)
2485:     {
2486:      if ( $LabelingMethod == LABELING_DIFFERENT && $Value != $LastValue ) { return(TRUE); }
2487:      if ( $LabelingMethod == LABELING_DIFFERENT && $Value == $LastValue ) { return(FALSE); }
2488:      if ( $LabelingMethod == LABELING_ALL && $LabelSkip == 0 ) { return(TRUE); }
2489:      if ( $LabelingMethod == LABELING_ALL && ($ID+$LabelSkip) % ($LabelSkip+1) != 1 ) { return(FALSE); }
2490: 
2491:      return(TRUE);
2492:     }
2493: 
2494:    /* Compute the scale, check for the best visual factors */
2495:    function computeScale($XMin,$XMax,$MaxDivs,$Factors,$AxisID=0)
2496:     {
2497:      /* Compute each factors */
2498:      $Results = "";
2499:      foreach ($Factors as $Key => $Factor)
2500:       $Results[$Factor] = $this->processScale($XMin,$XMax,$MaxDivs,array($Factor),$AxisID);
2501: 
2502:      /* Remove scales that are creating to much decimals */
2503:      $GoodScaleFactors = "";
2504:      foreach ($Results as $Key => $Result)
2505:       {
2506:        $Decimals = preg_split("/\./",$Result["RowHeight"]);
2507:        if ( (!isset($Decimals[1])) || (strlen($Decimals[1]) < 6) ) { $GoodScaleFactors[] = $Key; }
2508:       }
2509: 
2510:      /* Found no correct scale, shame,... returns the 1st one as default */
2511:      if ( $GoodScaleFactors == "" ) { return($Results[$Factors[0]]); }
2512: 
2513:      /* Find the factor that cause the maximum number of Rows */
2514:      $MaxRows = 0; $BestFactor = 0;
2515:      foreach($GoodScaleFactors as $Key => $Factor)
2516:       { if ( $Results[$Factor]["Rows"] > $MaxRows ) { $MaxRows = $Results[$Factor]["Rows"]; $BestFactor = $Factor; } }
2517: 
2518:      /* Return the best visual scale */
2519:      return($Results[$BestFactor]);
2520:     }
2521: 
2522:    /* Compute the best matching scale based on size & factors */
2523:    function processScale($XMin,$XMax,$MaxDivs,$Factors,$AxisID)
2524:     {
2525:      $ScaleHeight = abs(ceil($XMax)-floor($XMin));
2526: 
2527:      if ( isset($this->DataSet->Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"]) )
2528:       $Format = $this->DataSet->Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
2529:      else
2530:       $Format = NULL;
2531: 
2532:      if ( isset($this->DataSet->Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"]) )
2533:       $Mode = $this->DataSet->Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
2534:      else
2535:       $Mode = AXIS_FORMAT_DEFAULT;
2536: 
2537:      $Scale = "";
2538:      if ( $XMin != $XMax )
2539:       {
2540:        $Found = FALSE; $Rescaled = FALSE; $Scaled10Factor = .0001; $Result = 0;
2541:        while(!$Found)
2542:         {
2543:          foreach($Factors as $Key => $Factor)
2544:           {
2545:            if ( !$Found )
2546:             {
2547:              if ( !($this->modulo($XMin,$Factor*$Scaled10Factor) == 0) || ($XMin != floor($XMin))) { $XMinRescaled = floor($XMin/($Factor*$Scaled10Factor))*$Factor*$Scaled10Factor; } else { $XMinRescaled = $XMin; }
2548:              if ( !($this->modulo($XMax,$Factor*$Scaled10Factor) == 0) || ($XMax != floor($XMax))) { $XMaxRescaled = floor($XMax/($Factor*$Scaled10Factor))*$Factor*$Scaled10Factor+($Factor*$Scaled10Factor); } else { $XMaxRescaled = $XMax; }
2549:              $ScaleHeightRescaled = abs($XMaxRescaled-$XMinRescaled);
2550: 
2551:              if ( !$Found && floor($ScaleHeightRescaled/($Factor*$Scaled10Factor)) <= $MaxDivs ) { $Found = TRUE; $Rescaled = TRUE; $Result = $Factor * $Scaled10Factor; }
2552:             }
2553:           }
2554:          $Scaled10Factor = $Scaled10Factor * 10;
2555:         }
2556: 
2557:        /* ReCall Min / Max / Height */
2558:        if ( $Rescaled ) { $XMin = $XMinRescaled; $XMax = $XMaxRescaled; $ScaleHeight = $ScaleHeightRescaled; }
2559: 
2560:        /* Compute rows size */
2561:        $Rows      = floor($ScaleHeight / $Result); if ( $Rows == 0 ) { $Rows = 1; }
2562:        $RowHeight = $ScaleHeight / $Rows;
2563: 
2564:        /* Return the results */
2565:        $Scale["Rows"] = $Rows; $Scale["RowHeight"] = $RowHeight; $Scale["XMin"] = $XMin;  $Scale["XMax"] = $XMax;
2566: 
2567:        /* Compute the needed decimals for the metric view to avoid repetition of the same X Axis labels */
2568:        if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_METRIC && $Format == NULL )
2569:         {
2570:          $Done = FALSE; $GoodDecimals = 0;
2571:          for($Decimals=0;$Decimals<=10;$Decimals++)
2572:           {
2573:            if ( !$Done )
2574:             {
2575:              $LastLabel = "zob"; $ScaleOK = TRUE;
2576:              for($i=0;$i<=$Rows;$i++)
2577:               {
2578:                $Value = $XMin + $i*$RowHeight;
2579:                $Label = $this->scaleFormat($Value,AXIS_FORMAT_METRIC,$Decimals);
2580: 
2581:                if ( $LastLabel == $Label ) { $ScaleOK = FALSE; }
2582:                $LastLabel = $Label;
2583:               }
2584:              if ( $ScaleOK ) { $Done = TRUE; $GoodDecimals = $Decimals; }
2585:             }
2586:           }
2587: 
2588:          $Scale["Format"] = $GoodDecimals;
2589:         }
2590:       }
2591:      else
2592:       {
2593:        /* If all values are the same we keep a +1/-1 scale */
2594:        $Rows = 2; $XMin = $XMax-1; $XMax = $XMax+1; $RowHeight = 1;
2595: 
2596:        /* Return the results */
2597:        $Scale["Rows"] = $Rows; $Scale["RowHeight"] = $RowHeight; $Scale["XMin"] = $XMin;  $Scale["XMax"] = $XMax;
2598:       }
2599: 
2600:      return($Scale);
2601:     }
2602: 
2603:    function modulo($Value1,$Value2)
2604:     {
2605:      if (floor($Value2) == 0) { return(0); }
2606:      if (floor($Value2) != 0) { return($Value1 % $Value2); }
2607: 
2608:      $MinValue = min($Value1,$Value2); $Factor = 10;
2609:      while ( floor($MinValue*$Factor) == 0 )
2610:       { $Factor = $Factor * 10; }
2611: 
2612:      return(($Value1*$Factor) % ($Value2*$Factor));
2613:     }
2614: 
2615:    /* Draw an X threshold */
2616:    function drawXThreshold($Value,$Format="")
2617:     {
2618:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 255;
2619:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
2620:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
2621:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 50;
2622:      $Weight        = isset($Format["Weight"]) ? $Format["Weight"] : NULL;
2623:      $Ticks     = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : 6;
2624:      $Wide      = isset($Format["Wide"]) ? $Format["Wide"] : FALSE;
2625:      $WideFactor    = isset($Format["WideFactor"]) ? $Format["WideFactor"] : 5;
2626:      $WriteCaption  = isset($Format["WriteCaption"]) ? $Format["WriteCaption"] : FALSE;
2627:      $Caption       = isset($Format["Caption"]) ? $Format["Caption"] : NULL;
2628:      $CaptionAlign  = isset($Format["CaptionAlign"]) ? $Format["CaptionAlign"] : CAPTION_LEFT_TOP;
2629:      $CaptionOffset     = isset($Format["CaptionOffset"]) ? $Format["CaptionOffset"] : 5;
2630:      $CaptionR      = isset($Format["CaptionR"]) ? $Format["CaptionR"] : 255;
2631:      $CaptionG      = isset($Format["CaptionG"]) ? $Format["CaptionG"] : 255;
2632:      $CaptionB      = isset($Format["CaptionB"]) ? $Format["CaptionB"] : 255;
2633:      $CaptionAlpha  = isset($Format["CaptionAlpha"]) ? $Format["CaptionAlpha"] : 100;
2634:      $DrawBox       = isset($Format["DrawBox"]) ? $Format["DrawBox"] : TRUE;
2635:      $DrawBoxBorder = isset($Format["DrawBoxBorder"]) ? $Format["DrawBoxBorder"] : FALSE;
2636:      $BorderOffset  = isset($Format["BorderOffset"]) ? $Format["BorderOffset"] : 3;
2637:      $BoxRounded    = isset($Format["BoxRounded"]) ? $Format["BoxRounded"] : TRUE;
2638:      $RoundedRadius = isset($Format["RoundedRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundedRadius"] : 3;
2639:      $BoxR      = isset($Format["BoxR"]) ? $Format["BoxR"] : 0;
2640:      $BoxG      = isset($Format["BoxG"]) ? $Format["BoxG"] : 0;
2641:      $BoxB      = isset($Format["BoxB"]) ? $Format["BoxB"] : 0;
2642:      $BoxAlpha      = isset($Format["BoxAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxAlpha"] : 30;
2643:      $BoxSurrounding    = isset($Format["BoxSurrounding"]) ? $Format["BoxSurrounding"] : "";
2644:      $BoxBorderR    = isset($Format["BoxBorderR"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderR"] : 255;
2645:      $BoxBorderG    = isset($Format["BoxBorderG"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderG"] : 255;
2646:      $BoxBorderB    = isset($Format["BoxBorderB"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderB"] : 255;
2647:      $BoxBorderAlpha    = isset($Format["BoxBorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderAlpha"] : 100;
2648:      $ValueIsLabel  = isset($Format["ValueIsLabel"]) ? $Format["ValueIsLabel"] : FALSE;
2649: 
2650:      $Data           = $this->DataSet->getData();
2651:      $AbscissaMargin = $this->getAbscissaMargin($Data);
2652:      $XScale         = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
2653: 
2654:      if ( is_array($Value) ) { foreach ($Value as $Key => $ID) { $this->drawXThreshold($ID,$Format); } return(0); }
2655: 
2656:      if ( $ValueIsLabel )
2657:       {
2658:        $Format["ValueIsLabel"] = FALSE;
2659:        foreach($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"] as $Key => $SerieValue)
2660:         { if ( $SerieValue == $Value ) { $this->drawXThreshold($Key,$Format); } }
2661: 
2662:        return(0);
2663:       }
2664: 
2665:      $CaptionSettings = array("DrawBox"=>$DrawBox,"DrawBoxBorder"=>$DrawBoxBorder,"BorderOffset"=>$BorderOffset,"BoxRounded"=>$BoxRounded,"RoundedRadius"=>$RoundedRadius,
2666:                               "BoxR"=>$BoxR,"BoxG"=>$BoxG,"BoxB"=>$BoxB,"BoxAlpha"=>$BoxAlpha,"BoxSurrounding"=>$BoxSurrounding,
2667:                               "BoxBorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BoxBorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BoxBorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"BoxBorderAlpha"=>$BoxBorderAlpha,
2668:                               "R"=>$CaptionR,"G"=>$CaptionG,"B"=>$CaptionB,"Alpha"=>$CaptionAlpha);
2669: 
2670:      if ( $Caption == NULL )
2671:       {
2672:        if ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) )
2673:         {
2674:          if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Value]) )
2675:           $Caption = $Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Value];
2676:          else
2677:           $Caption = $Value;
2678:         }
2679:        else
2680:         $Caption = $Value;
2681:       }
2682: 
2683:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
2684:       {
2685:        $XStep = (($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $XScale[0] *2 ) / $XScale[1];
2686:        $XPos  = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value;
2687:        $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $Data["YMargin"];
2688:        $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $Data["YMargin"];
2689: 
2690:        if ( $XPos >= $this->GraphAreaX1 + $AbscissaMargin && $XPos <= $this->GraphAreaX2 - $AbscissaMargin )
2691:         {
2692:          $this->drawLine($XPos,$YPos1,$XPos,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
2693: 
2694:          if ( $Wide )
2695:           {
2696:            $this->drawLine($XPos-1,$YPos1,$XPos-1,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2697:            $this->drawLine($XPos+1,$YPos1,$XPos+1,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2698:           }
2699: 
2700:          if ( $WriteCaption )
2701:           {
2702:            if ( $CaptionAlign == CAPTION_LEFT_TOP )
2703:             { $Y = $YPos1 + $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; }
2704:            else 
2705:             { $Y = $YPos2 - $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; }
2706:            
2707:            $this->drawText($XPos,$Y,$Caption,$CaptionSettings);
2708:           }
2709: 
2710:          return(array("X"=>$XPos));
2711:         }
2712:       }
2713:      elseif( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
2714:       {
2715:        $XStep = (($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $XScale[0] *2 ) / $XScale[1];
2716:        $XPos  = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value;
2717:        $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Data["YMargin"];
2718:        $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $Data["YMargin"];
2719: 
2720:        if ( $XPos >= $this->GraphAreaY1 + $AbscissaMargin && $XPos <= $this->GraphAreaY2 - $AbscissaMargin )
2721:         {
2722:          $this->drawLine($YPos1,$XPos,$YPos2,$XPos,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
2723: 
2724:          if ( $Wide )
2725:           {
2726:            $this->drawLine($YPos1,$XPos-1,$YPos2,$XPos-1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2727:            $this->drawLine($YPos1,$XPos+1,$YPos2,$XPos+1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2728:           }
2729: 
2730:          if ( $WriteCaption )
2731:           {
2732:            if ( $CaptionAlign == CAPTION_LEFT_TOP )
2733:             { $Y = $YPos1 + $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; }
2734:            else 
2735:             { $Y = $YPos2 - $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; }
2736:            
2737:            $this->drawText($Y,$XPos,$Caption,$CaptionSettings);
2738:           }
2739: 
2740:          return(array("X"=>$XPos));
2741:         }
2742:       }
2743:     }
2744: 
2745:    /* Draw an X threshold area */
2746:    function drawXThresholdArea($Value1,$Value2,$Format="")
2747:     {
2748:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 255;
2749:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
2750:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
2751:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 20;
2752:      $Border    = isset($Format["Border"]) ? $Format["Border"] : TRUE;
2753:      $BorderR   = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $R;
2754:      $BorderG   = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $G;
2755:      $BorderB   = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $B;
2756:      $BorderAlpha = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : $Alpha + 20;
2757:      $BorderTicks = isset($Format["BorderTicks"]) ? $Format["BorderTicks"] : 2;
2758:      $AreaName  = isset($Format["AreaName"]) ? $Format["AreaName"] : NULL;
2759:      $NameAngle = isset($Format["NameAngle"]) ? $Format["NameAngle"] : ZONE_NAME_ANGLE_AUTO;
2760:      $NameR = isset($Format["NameR"]) ? $Format["NameR"] : 255;
2761:      $NameG = isset($Format["NameG"]) ? $Format["NameG"] : 255;
2762:      $NameB = isset($Format["NameB"]) ? $Format["NameB"] : 255;
2763:      $NameAlpha = isset($Format["NameAlpha"]) ? $Format["NameAlpha"] : 100;
2764:      $DisableShadowOnArea = isset($Format["DisableShadowOnArea"]) ? $Format["DisableShadowOnArea"] : TRUE;
2765: 
2766:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
2767:      if ( $DisableShadowOnArea && $this->Shadow ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
2768: 
2769:      if ($BorderAlpha >100) { $BorderAlpha = 100;}
2770: 
2771:      $Data           = $this->DataSet->getData();
2772:      $XScale         = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
2773:      $AbscissaMargin = $this->getAbscissaMargin($Data);
2774: 
2775:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
2776:       {
2777:        $XStep = (($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $XScale[0] *2 ) / $XScale[1];
2778:        $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value1;
2779:        $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value2;
2780:        $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $Data["YMargin"];
2781:        $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $Data["YMargin"];
2782: 
2783:        if ( $XPos1 < $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0]; }
2784:        if ( $XPos1 > $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XScale[0] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XScale[0]; }
2785:        if ( $XPos2 < $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XScale[0]; }
2786:        if ( $XPos2 > $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XScale[0] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XScale[0]; }
2787: 
2788:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
2789: 
2790:        if ( $Border )
2791:         {
2792:          $this->drawLine($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos1,$YPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
2793:          $this->drawLine($XPos2,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
2794:         }
2795: 
2796:        if ( $AreaName != NULL )
2797:         {
2798:          $XPos = ($XPos2-$XPos1)/2 + $XPos1;
2799:          $YPos = ($YPos2-$YPos1)/2 + $YPos1;
2800: 
2801:          if ( $NameAngle == ZONE_NAME_ANGLE_AUTO )
2802:           {
2803:            $TxtPos   = $this->getTextBox($XPos,$YPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$AreaName);
2804:            $TxtWidth = $TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"];
2805:            if ( abs($XPos2 - $XPos1) > $TxtWidth ) { $NameAngle = 0; } else { $NameAngle = 90; }
2806:           }
2807:          $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
2808:          $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$AreaName,array("R"=>$NameR,"G"=>$NameG,"B"=>$NameB,"Alpha"=>$NameAlpha,"Angle"=>$NameAngle,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE));
2809:          if ( $DisableShadowOnArea ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
2810:         }
2811: 
2812:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
2813:        return(array("X1"=>$XPos1,"X2"=>$XPos2));
2814:       }
2815:      elseif ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
2816:       {
2817:        $XStep = (($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $XScale[0] *2 ) / $XScale[1];
2818:        $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value1;
2819:        $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0] + $XStep * $Value2;
2820:        $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Data["YMargin"];
2821:        $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $Data["YMargin"];
2822: 
2823:        if ( $XPos1 < $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0]; }
2824:        if ( $XPos1 > $this->GraphAreaY2 - $XScale[0] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $XScale[0]; }
2825:        if ( $XPos2 < $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XScale[0]; }
2826:        if ( $XPos2 > $this->GraphAreaY2 - $XScale[0] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $XScale[0]; }
2827: 
2828:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($YPos1,$XPos1,$YPos2,$XPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
2829: 
2830:        if ( $Border )
2831:         {
2832:          $this->drawLine($YPos1,$XPos1,$YPos2,$XPos1,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
2833:          $this->drawLine($YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,$XPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
2834:         }
2835: 
2836:        if ( $AreaName != NULL )
2837:         {
2838:          $XPos = ($XPos2-$XPos1)/2 + $XPos1;
2839:          $YPos = ($YPos2-$YPos1)/2 + $YPos1;
2840: 
2841:          $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
2842:          $this->drawText($YPos,$XPos,$AreaName,array("R"=>$NameR,"G"=>$NameG,"B"=>$NameB,"Alpha"=>$NameAlpha,"Angle"=>0,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE));
2843:          if ( $DisableShadowOnArea ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
2844:         }
2845: 
2846:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
2847:        return(array("X1"=>$XPos1,"X2"=>$XPos2));
2848:       }
2849:     }
2850: 
2851:    /* Draw an Y threshold with the computed scale */
2852:    function drawThreshold($Value,$Format="")
2853:     {
2854:      $AxisID        = isset($Format["AxisID"]) ? $Format["AxisID"] : 0;
2855:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 255;
2856:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
2857:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
2858:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 50;
2859:      $Weight        = isset($Format["Weight"]) ? $Format["Weight"] : NULL;
2860:      $Ticks     = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : 6;
2861:      $Wide      = isset($Format["Wide"]) ? $Format["Wide"] : FALSE;
2862:      $WideFactor    = isset($Format["WideFactor"]) ? $Format["WideFactor"] : 5;
2863:      $WriteCaption  = isset($Format["WriteCaption"]) ? $Format["WriteCaption"] : FALSE;
2864:      $Caption       = isset($Format["Caption"]) ? $Format["Caption"] : NULL;
2865:      $CaptionAlign  = isset($Format["CaptionAlign"]) ? $Format["CaptionAlign"] : CAPTION_LEFT_TOP;
2866:      $CaptionOffset     = isset($Format["CaptionOffset"]) ? $Format["CaptionOffset"] : 10;
2867:      $CaptionR      = isset($Format["CaptionR"]) ? $Format["CaptionR"] : 255;
2868:      $CaptionG      = isset($Format["CaptionG"]) ? $Format["CaptionG"] : 255;
2869:      $CaptionB      = isset($Format["CaptionB"]) ? $Format["CaptionB"] : 255;
2870:      $CaptionAlpha  = isset($Format["CaptionAlpha"]) ? $Format["CaptionAlpha"] : 100;
2871:      $DrawBox       = isset($Format["DrawBox"]) ? $Format["DrawBox"] : TRUE;
2872:      $DrawBoxBorder = isset($Format["DrawBoxBorder"]) ? $Format["DrawBoxBorder"] : FALSE;
2873:      $BorderOffset  = isset($Format["BorderOffset"]) ? $Format["BorderOffset"] : 5;
2874:      $BoxRounded    = isset($Format["BoxRounded"]) ? $Format["BoxRounded"] : TRUE;
2875:      $RoundedRadius = isset($Format["RoundedRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundedRadius"] : 3;
2876:      $BoxR      = isset($Format["BoxR"]) ? $Format["BoxR"] : 0;
2877:      $BoxG      = isset($Format["BoxG"]) ? $Format["BoxG"] : 0;
2878:      $BoxB      = isset($Format["BoxB"]) ? $Format["BoxB"] : 0;
2879:      $BoxAlpha      = isset($Format["BoxAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxAlpha"] : 20;
2880:      $BoxSurrounding    = isset($Format["BoxSurrounding"]) ? $Format["BoxSurrounding"] : "";
2881:      $BoxBorderR    = isset($Format["BoxBorderR"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderR"] : 255;
2882:      $BoxBorderG    = isset($Format["BoxBorderG"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderG"] : 255;
2883:      $BoxBorderB    = isset($Format["BoxBorderB"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderB"] : 255;
2884:      $BoxBorderAlpha    = isset($Format["BoxBorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderAlpha"] : 100;
2885:      $NoMargin      = isset($Format["NoMargin"]) ? $Format["NoMargin"] : FALSE;
2886: 
2887:      if ( is_array($Value) ) { foreach ($Value as $Key => $ID) { $this->drawThreshold($ID,$Format); } return(0); }
2888: 
2889:      $CaptionSettings = array("DrawBox"=>$DrawBox,"DrawBoxBorder"=>$DrawBoxBorder,"BorderOffset"=>$BorderOffset,"BoxRounded"=>$BoxRounded,"RoundedRadius"=>$RoundedRadius,
2890:                               "BoxR"=>$BoxR,"BoxG"=>$BoxG,"BoxB"=>$BoxB,"BoxAlpha"=>$BoxAlpha,"BoxSurrounding"=>$BoxSurrounding,
2891:                               "BoxBorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BoxBorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BoxBorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"BoxBorderAlpha"=>$BoxBorderAlpha,
2892:                               "R"=>$CaptionR,"G"=>$CaptionG,"B"=>$CaptionB,"Alpha"=>$CaptionAlpha);
2893: 
2894:      $Data           = $this->DataSet->getData();
2895:      $AbscissaMargin = $this->getAbscissaMargin($Data);
2896: 
2897:      if ( $NoMargin ) { $AbscissaMargin = 0; }
2898:      if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]) ) { return(-1); }
2899:      if ( $Caption == NULL ) { $Caption = $Value; }
2900: 
2901:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
2902:       {
2903:        $YPos = $this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
2904:        if ( $YPos >= $this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] && $YPos <= $this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] )
2905:         {
2906:          $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $AbscissaMargin;
2907:          $X2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $AbscissaMargin;
2908: 
2909:          $this->drawLine($X1,$YPos,$X2,$YPos,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
2910: 
2911:          if ( $Wide )
2912:           {
2913:            $this->drawLine($X1,$YPos-1,$X2,$YPos-1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2914:            $this->drawLine($X1,$YPos+1,$X2,$YPos+1,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2915:           }
2916: 
2917:          if ( $WriteCaption )
2918:           {
2919:            if ( $CaptionAlign == CAPTION_LEFT_TOP )
2920:             { $X = $X1 + $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; }
2921:            else 
2922:             { $X = $X2 - $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; }
2923:            
2924:            $this->drawText($X,$YPos,$Caption,$CaptionSettings);
2925:           }
2926:         }
2927: 
2928:        return(array("Y"=>$YPos));
2929:       }
2930: 
2931:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
2932:       {
2933:        $XPos = $this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
2934:        if ( $XPos >= $this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] && $XPos <= $this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] )
2935:         {
2936:          $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $AbscissaMargin;
2937:          $Y2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $AbscissaMargin;
2938: 
2939:          $this->drawLine($XPos,$Y1,$XPos,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
2940: 
2941:          if ( $Wide )
2942:           {
2943:            $this->drawLine($XPos-1,$Y1,$XPos-1,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2944:            $this->drawLine($XPos+1,$Y1,$XPos+1,$Y2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/$WideFactor,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
2945:           }
2946: 
2947:          if ( $WriteCaption )
2948:           {
2949:            if ( $CaptionAlign == CAPTION_LEFT_TOP )
2950:             { $Y = $Y1 + $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; }
2951:            else 
2952:             { $Y = $Y2 - $CaptionOffset; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; }
2953: 
2954:            $CaptionSettings["Align"] = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE;
2955:            $this->drawText($XPos,$Y,$Caption,$CaptionSettings);
2956:           }
2957:         }
2958: 
2959:        return(array("Y"=>$XPos));
2960:       }
2961:     }
2962: 
2963:    /* Draw a threshold with the computed scale */
2964:    function drawThresholdArea($Value1,$Value2,$Format="")
2965:     {
2966:      $AxisID    = isset($Format["AxisID"]) ? $Format["AxisID"] : 0;
2967:      $R     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 255;
2968:      $G     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
2969:      $B     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
2970:      $Alpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 20;
2971:      $Border    = isset($Format["Border"]) ? $Format["Border"] : TRUE;
2972:      $BorderR   = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $R;
2973:      $BorderG   = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $G;
2974:      $BorderB   = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $B;
2975:      $BorderAlpha = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : $Alpha + 20;
2976:      $BorderTicks = isset($Format["BorderTicks"]) ? $Format["BorderTicks"] : 2;
2977:      $AreaName  = isset($Format["AreaName"]) ? $Format["AreaName"] : NULL;
2978:      $NameAngle = isset($Format["NameAngle"]) ? $Format["NameAngle"] : ZONE_NAME_ANGLE_AUTO;
2979:      $NameR = isset($Format["NameR"]) ? $Format["NameR"] : 255;
2980:      $NameG = isset($Format["NameG"]) ? $Format["NameG"] : 255;
2981:      $NameB = isset($Format["NameB"]) ? $Format["NameB"] : 255;
2982:      $NameAlpha = isset($Format["NameAlpha"]) ? $Format["NameAlpha"] : 100;
2983:      $DisableShadowOnArea = isset($Format["DisableShadowOnArea"]) ? $Format["DisableShadowOnArea"] : TRUE;
2984:      $NoMargin  = isset($Format["NoMargin"]) ? $Format["NoMargin"] : FALSE;
2985: 
2986:      if ($Value1 > $Value2) { list($Value1, $Value2) = array($Value2, $Value1); }
2987: 
2988:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
2989:      if ( $DisableShadowOnArea && $this->Shadow ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
2990: 
2991:      if ($BorderAlpha >100) { $BorderAlpha = 100;}
2992: 
2993:      $Data           = $this->DataSet->getData();
2994:      $AbscissaMargin = $this->getAbscissaMargin($Data);
2995: 
2996:      if ( $NoMargin ) { $AbscissaMargin = 0; }
2997:      if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]) ) { return(-1); }
2998: 
2999:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3000:       {
3001:        $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $AbscissaMargin;
3002:        $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $AbscissaMargin;
3003:        $YPos1 = $this->scaleComputeY($Value1,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3004:        $YPos2 = $this->scaleComputeY($Value2,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3005: 
3006:        if ( $YPos1 < $this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3007:        if ( $YPos1 > $this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3008:        if ( $YPos2 < $this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3009:        if ( $YPos2 > $this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3010: 
3011:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
