3012:        if ( $Border )
3013:         {
3014:          $this->drawLine($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos1,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
3015:          $this->drawLine($XPos1,$YPos2,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
3016:         }
3017: 
3018:        if ( $AreaName != NULL )
3019:         {
3020:          $XPos = ($XPos2-$XPos1)/2 + $XPos1;
3021:          $YPos = ($YPos2-$YPos1)/2 + $YPos1;
3022:          $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
3023:          $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$AreaName,array("R"=>$NameR,"G"=>$NameG,"B"=>$NameB,"Alpha"=>$NameAlpha,"Angle"=>0,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE));
3024:          if ( $DisableShadowOnArea ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
3025:         }
3026: 
3027:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
3028:        return(array("Y1"=>$YPos1,"Y2"=>$YPos2));
3029:       }
3030:      elseif ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
3031:       {
3032:        $YPos1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $AbscissaMargin;
3033:        $YPos2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $AbscissaMargin;
3034:        $XPos1 = $this->scaleComputeY($Value1,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3035:        $XPos2 = $this->scaleComputeY($Value2,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3036: 
3037:        if ( $XPos1 < $this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3038:        if ( $XPos1 > $this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $XPos1 = $this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3039:        if ( $XPos2 < $this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3040:        if ( $XPos2 > $this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] ) { $XPos2 = $this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]; }
3041: 
3042:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
3043:        if ( $Border )
3044:         {
3045:          $this->drawLine($XPos1,$YPos1,$XPos1,$YPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
3046:          $this->drawLine($XPos2,$YPos1,$XPos2,$YPos2,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Ticks"=>$BorderTicks));
3047:         }
3048: 
3049:        if ( $AreaName != NULL )
3050:         {
3051:          $XPos = ($YPos2-$YPos1)/2 + $YPos1;
3052:          $YPos = ($XPos2-$XPos1)/2 + $XPos1;
3053: 
3054:          if ( $NameAngle == ZONE_NAME_ANGLE_AUTO )
3055:           {
3056:            $TxtPos   = $this->getTextBox($XPos,$YPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$AreaName);
3057:            $TxtWidth = $TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"];
3058:            if ( abs($XPos2 - $XPos1) > $TxtWidth ) { $NameAngle = 0; } else { $NameAngle = 90; }
3059:           }
3060:          $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
3061:          $this->drawText($YPos,$XPos,$AreaName,array("R"=>$NameR,"G"=>$NameG,"B"=>$NameB,"Alpha"=>$NameAlpha,"Angle"=>$NameAngle,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE));
3062:          if ( $DisableShadowOnArea ) { $this->Shadow = FALSE; }
3063:         }
3064: 
3065:        $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
3066:        return(array("Y1"=>$XPos1,"Y2"=>$XPos2));
3067:       }
3068:     }
3069: 
3070:    function scaleGetXSettings()
3071:     {
3072:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3073:      foreach($Data["Axis"] as $AxisID => $Settings)
3074:       {
3075:        if ( $Settings["Identity"] == AXIS_X )
3076:         {
3077:          $Rows = $Settings["Rows"];
3078: 
3079:          return(array($Settings["Margin"],$Rows));
3080:         }
3081:       }
3082:     }
3083: 
3084:    function scaleComputeY($Values,$Option="",$ReturnOnly0Height=FALSE)
3085:     {
3086:      $AxisID    = isset($Option["AxisID"]) ? $Option["AxisID"] : 0;
3087:      $SerieName = isset($Option["SerieName"]) ? $Option["SerieName"] : NULL;
3088: 
3089:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3090:      if ( !isset($Data["Axis"][$AxisID]) ) { return(-1); }
3091: 
3092:      if ( $SerieName != NULL ) { $AxisID = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Axis"]; }
3093:      if ( !is_array($Values) ) { $tmp = $Values; $Values = ""; $Values[0] = $tmp; }
3094: 
3095:      $Result = "";
3096:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3097:       {
3098:        $Height      = ($this->GraphAreaY2 - $this->GraphAreaY1) - $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]*2;
3099:        $ScaleHeight = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMax"] - $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMin"];
3100:        $Step        = $Height / $ScaleHeight;
3101: 
3102:        if ( $ReturnOnly0Height )
3103:         { foreach($Values as $Key => $Value) { if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Result[] = VOID; } else { $Result[] = $Step * $Value; } } }
3104:        else
3105:         { foreach($Values as $Key => $Value) { if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Result[] = VOID; } else { $Result[] = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] - ($Step * ($Value-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMin"])); } } }
3106:       }
3107:      else
3108:       {
3109:        $Width      = ($this->GraphAreaX2 - $this->GraphAreaX1) - $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"]*2;
3110:        $ScaleWidth = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMax"] - $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMin"];
3111:        $Step       = $Width / $ScaleWidth;
3112: 
3113:        if ( $ReturnOnly0Height )
3114:         { foreach($Values as $Key => $Value) { if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Result[] = VOID; } else { $Result[] = $Step * $Value; } } }
3115:        else
3116:         { foreach($Values as $Key => $Value) { if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Result[] = VOID; } else { $Result[] = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Margin"] + ($Step * ($Value-$Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["ScaleMin"])); } } }
3117:       }
3118: 
3119:      if ( count($Result) == 1 )
3120:       return($Result[0]);
3121:      else
3122:       return($Result);
3123:     }
3124: 
3125:    /* Format the axis values */
3126:    function scaleFormat($Value,$Mode=NULL,$Format=NULL,$Unit=NULL)
3127:     {
3128:      if ( $Value == VOID ) { return(""); }
3129: 
3130:      if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_CUSTOM )
3131:       { if ( function_exists($Format) ) { return(call_user_func($Format,$Value)); } }
3132: 
3133:      if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_DATE )
3134:       { if ( $Format == NULL ) { $Pattern = "d/m/Y"; } else { $Pattern = $Format; } return(date($Pattern,$Value)); }
3135: 
3136:      if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_TIME )
3137:       { if ( $Format == NULL ) { $Pattern = "H:i:s"; } else { $Pattern = $Format; } return(date($Pattern,$Value)); }
3138: 
3139:      if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_CURRENCY )
3140:       { return($Format.number_format($Value,2)); }
3141: 
3142:      if ( $Mode == AXIS_FORMAT_METRIC )
3143:       {
3144:        if (abs($Value) > 1000000000)
3145:         return(round($Value/1000000000,$Format)."g".$Unit);
3146:        if (abs($Value) > 1000000)
3147:         return(round($Value/1000000,$Format)."m".$Unit);
3148:        elseif (abs($Value) >= 1000)
3149:         return(round($Value/1000,$Format)."k".$Unit);
3150:        
3151:       }
3152:      return($Value.$Unit);
3153:     }
3154: 
3155:    /* Write Max value on a chart */
3156:    function writeBounds($Type=BOUND_BOTH,$Format=NULL)
3157:     {
3158:      $MaxLabelTxt   = isset($Format["MaxLabelTxt"]) ? $Format["MaxLabelTxt"] : "max=";
3159:      $MinLabelTxt   = isset($Format["MinLabelTxt"]) ? $Format["MinLabelTxt"] : "min=";
3160:      $Decimals      = isset($Format["Decimals"]) ? $Format["Decimals"] : 1;
3161:      $ExcludedSeries    = isset($Format["ExcludedSeries"]) ? $Format["ExcludedSeries"] : "";
3162:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 4;
3163:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3164:      $MaxDisplayR   = isset($Format["MaxDisplayR"]) ? $Format["MaxDisplayR"] : 0;
3165:      $MaxDisplayG   = isset($Format["MaxDisplayG"]) ? $Format["MaxDisplayG"] : 0;
3166:      $MaxDisplayB   = isset($Format["MaxDisplayB"]) ? $Format["MaxDisplayB"] : 0;
3167:      $MinDisplayR   = isset($Format["MinDisplayR"]) ? $Format["MinDisplayR"] : 255;
3168:      $MinDisplayG   = isset($Format["MinDisplayG"]) ? $Format["MinDisplayG"] : 255;
3169:      $MinDisplayB   = isset($Format["MinDisplayB"]) ? $Format["MinDisplayB"] : 255;
3170:      $MinLabelPos   = isset($Format["MinLabelPos"]) ? $Format["MinLabelPos"] : BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO;
3171:      $MaxLabelPos   = isset($Format["MaxLabelPos"]) ? $Format["MaxLabelPos"] : BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO;
3172:      $DrawBox       = isset($Format["DrawBox"]) ? $Format["DrawBox"] : TRUE;
3173:      $DrawBoxBorder = isset($Format["DrawBoxBorder"]) ? $Format["DrawBoxBorder"] : FALSE;
3174:      $BorderOffset  = isset($Format["BorderOffset"]) ? $Format["BorderOffset"] : 5;
3175:      $BoxRounded    = isset($Format["BoxRounded"]) ? $Format["BoxRounded"] : TRUE;
3176:      $RoundedRadius = isset($Format["RoundedRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundedRadius"] : 3;
3177:      $BoxR      = isset($Format["BoxR"]) ? $Format["BoxR"] : 0;
3178:      $BoxG      = isset($Format["BoxG"]) ? $Format["BoxG"] : 0;
3179:      $BoxB      = isset($Format["BoxB"]) ? $Format["BoxB"] : 0;
3180:      $BoxAlpha      = isset($Format["BoxAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxAlpha"] : 20;
3181:      $BoxSurrounding    = isset($Format["BoxSurrounding"]) ? $Format["BoxSurrounding"] : "";
3182:      $BoxBorderR    = isset($Format["BoxBorderR"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderR"] : 255;
3183:      $BoxBorderG    = isset($Format["BoxBorderG"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderG"] : 255;
3184:      $BoxBorderB    = isset($Format["BoxBorderB"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderB"] : 255;
3185:      $BoxBorderAlpha    = isset($Format["BoxBorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BoxBorderAlpha"] : 100;
3186: 
3187:      $CaptionSettings = array("DrawBox"=>$DrawBox,"DrawBoxBorder"=>$DrawBoxBorder,"BorderOffset"=>$BorderOffset,"BoxRounded"=>$BoxRounded,"RoundedRadius"=>$RoundedRadius,
3188:                               "BoxR"=>$BoxR,"BoxG"=>$BoxG,"BoxB"=>$BoxB,"BoxAlpha"=>$BoxAlpha,"BoxSurrounding"=>$BoxSurrounding,
3189:                               "BoxBorderR"=>$BoxBorderR,"BoxBorderG"=>$BoxBorderG,"BoxBorderB"=>$BoxBorderB,"BoxBorderAlpha"=>$BoxBorderAlpha);
3190: 
3191:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3192: 
3193:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3194:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3195:       {
3196:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] && !isset($ExcludedSeries[$SerieName]))
3197:         {
3198:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
3199:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3200: 
3201:          $MinValue = $this->DataSet->getMin($SerieName);
3202:          $MaxValue = $this->DataSet->getMax($SerieName);
3203: 
3204:          $MinPos = VOID; $MaxPos = VOID;
3205:          foreach($Serie["Data"] as $Key => $Value)
3206:           { 
3207:            if ( $Value == $MinValue && $MinPos == VOID ) { $MinPos = $Key; }
3208:            if ( $Value == $MaxValue ) { $MaxPos = $Key; }
3209:           }
3210: 
3211:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3212:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3213:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3214:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3215: 
3216:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3217: 
3218:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3219:           {
3220:            $XStep       = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs;
3221:            $X           = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
3222:            $SerieOffset = isset($Serie["XOffset"]) ? $Serie["XOffset"] : 0;
3223: 
3224:            if ( $Type == BOUND_MAX || $Type == BOUND_BOTH )
3225:             {
3226:              if ( $MaxLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_TOP    || ( $MaxLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MaxValue >= 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MaxPos] - $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; }
3227:              if ( $MaxLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_BOTTOM || ( $MaxLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MaxValue < 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MaxPos] + $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; }
3228: 
3229:              $XPos  = $X + $MaxPos*$XStep + $SerieOffset;
3230:              $Label = $MaxLabelTxt.$this->scaleFormat(round($MaxValue,$Decimals),$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
3231: 
3232:              $TxtPos  = $this->getTextBox($XPos,$YPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$Label);
3233:              $XOffset = 0; $YOffset = 0;
3234:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["X"] < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $XOffset = (($this->GraphAreaX1 - $TxtPos[0]["X"])/2); }
3235:              if ( $TxtPos[1]["X"] > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $XOffset = -(($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $this->GraphAreaX2)/2); }
3236:              if ( $TxtPos[2]["Y"] < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $YOffset = $this->GraphAreaY1 - $TxtPos[2]["Y"]; }
3237:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["Y"] > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $YOffset = -($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $this->GraphAreaY2); }
3238: 
3239:              $CaptionSettings["R"] = $MaxDisplayR; $CaptionSettings["G"] = $MaxDisplayG;
3240:              $CaptionSettings["B"] = $MaxDisplayB; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = $Align;
3241: 
3242:              $this->drawText($XPos+$XOffset,$YPos+$YOffset,$Label,$CaptionSettings);
3243:             }
3244: 
3245:            if ( $Type == BOUND_MIN || $Type == BOUND_BOTH )
3246:             {
3247:              if ( $MinLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_TOP    || ( $MinLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MinValue >= 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MinPos] - $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; }
3248:              if ( $MinLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_BOTTOM || ( $MinLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MinValue < 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MinPos] + $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; }
3249: 
3250:              $XPos  = $X + $MinPos*$XStep + $SerieOffset;
3251:              $Label = $MinLabelTxt.$this->scaleFormat(round($MinValue,$Decimals),$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
3252: 
3253:              $TxtPos  = $this->getTextBox($XPos,$YPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$Label);
3254:              $XOffset = 0; $YOffset = 0;
3255:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["X"] < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $XOffset = (($this->GraphAreaX1 - $TxtPos[0]["X"])/2); }
3256:              if ( $TxtPos[1]["X"] > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $XOffset = -(($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $this->GraphAreaX2)/2); }
3257:              if ( $TxtPos[2]["Y"] < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $YOffset = $this->GraphAreaY1 - $TxtPos[2]["Y"]; }
3258:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["Y"] > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $YOffset = -($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $this->GraphAreaY2); }
3259: 
3260:              $CaptionSettings["R"] = $MinDisplayR; $CaptionSettings["G"] = $MinDisplayG;
3261:              $CaptionSettings["B"] = $MinDisplayB; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = $Align;
3262: 
3263:              $this->drawText($XPos+$XOffset,$YPos-$DisplayOffset+$YOffset,$Label,$CaptionSettings);
3264:             }
3265:           }
3266:          else
3267:           {
3268:            $XStep       = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs;
3269:            $X           = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
3270:            $SerieOffset = isset($Serie["XOffset"]) ? $Serie["XOffset"] : 0;
3271: 
3272:            if ( $Type == BOUND_MAX || $Type == BOUND_BOTH )
3273:             {
3274:              if ( $MaxLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_TOP    || ( $MaxLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MaxValue >= 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MaxPos] + $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; }
3275:              if ( $MaxLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_BOTTOM || ( $MaxLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MaxValue < 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MaxPos] - $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; }
3276: 
3277:              $XPos  = $X + $MaxPos*$XStep + $SerieOffset;
3278:              $Label = $MaxLabelTxt.$this->scaleFormat($MaxValue,$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
3279: 
3280:              $TxtPos  = $this->getTextBox($YPos,$XPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$Label);
3281:              $XOffset = 0; $YOffset = 0;
3282:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["X"] < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $XOffset = $this->GraphAreaX1 - $TxtPos[0]["X"]; }
3283:              if ( $TxtPos[1]["X"] > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $XOffset = -($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $this->GraphAreaX2); }
3284:              if ( $TxtPos[2]["Y"] < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $YOffset = ($this->GraphAreaY1 - $TxtPos[2]["Y"])/2; }
3285:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["Y"] > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $YOffset = -(($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $this->GraphAreaY2)/2);}
3286: 
3287:              $CaptionSettings["R"] = $MaxDisplayR; $CaptionSettings["G"] = $MaxDisplayG;
3288:              $CaptionSettings["B"] = $MaxDisplayB; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = $Align;
3289: 
3290:              $this->drawText($YPos+$XOffset,$XPos+$YOffset,$Label,$CaptionSettings);
3291:             }
3292: 
3293:            if ( $Type == BOUND_MIN || $Type == BOUND_BOTH )
3294:             {
3295:              if ( $MinLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_TOP    || ( $MinLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MinValue >= 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MinPos] + $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; }
3296:              if ( $MinLabelPos == BOUND_LABEL_POS_BOTTOM || ( $MinLabelPos ==  BOUND_LABEL_POS_AUTO && $MinValue < 0) ) { $YPos  = $PosArray[$MinPos] - $DisplayOffset + 2; $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; }
3297: 
3298:              $XPos  = $X + $MinPos*$XStep + $SerieOffset;
3299:              $Label = $MinLabelTxt.$this->scaleFormat($MinValue,$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
3300: 
3301:              $TxtPos  = $this->getTextBox($YPos,$XPos,$this->FontName,$this->FontSize,0,$Label);
3302:              $XOffset = 0; $YOffset = 0;
3303:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["X"] < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $XOffset = $this->GraphAreaX1 - $TxtPos[0]["X"]; }
3304:              if ( $TxtPos[1]["X"] > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $XOffset = -($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $this->GraphAreaX2); }
3305:              if ( $TxtPos[2]["Y"] < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $YOffset = ($this->GraphAreaY1 - $TxtPos[2]["Y"])/2; }
3306:              if ( $TxtPos[0]["Y"] > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $YOffset = -(($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $this->GraphAreaY2)/2);}
3307: 
3308:              $CaptionSettings["R"] = $MinDisplayR; $CaptionSettings["G"] = $MinDisplayG;
3309:              $CaptionSettings["B"] = $MinDisplayB; $CaptionSettings["Align"] = $Align;
3310: 
3311:              $this->drawText($YPos+$XOffset,$XPos+$YOffset,$Label,$CaptionSettings);
3312:             }
3313:           }
3314:         }
3315:       }
3316:     }
3317: 
3318:    /* Draw a plot chart */
3319:    function drawPlotChart($Format=NULL)
3320:     {
3321:      $PlotSize      = isset($Format["PlotSize"]) ? $Format["PlotSize"] : NULL;
3322:      $PlotBorder    = isset($Format["PlotBorder"]) ? $Format["PlotBorder"] : FALSE;
3323:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : 50;
3324:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : 50;
3325:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : 50;
3326:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : 30;
3327:      $BorderSize    = isset($Format["BorderSize"]) ? $Format["BorderSize"] : 2;
3328:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
3329:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
3330:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 4;
3331:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3332:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
3333:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
3334:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
3335:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
3336: 
3337:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3338: 
3339:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3340:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3341: 
3342:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3343:       {
3344:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
3345:         {
3346:          if ( isset($Serie["Weight"]) ) { $SerieWeight = $Serie["Weight"] + 2; } else { $SerieWeight = 2; }
3347:          if ( $PlotSize != NULL ) { $SerieWeight = $PlotSize; }
3348: 
3349:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
3350:          if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R + $Surrounding; $BorderG = $G + $Surrounding; $BorderB = $B + $Surrounding; }
3351:          if ( isset($Serie["Picture"]) )
3352:           { $Picture = $Serie["Picture"]; list($PicWidth,$PicHeight,$PicType) = $this->getPicInfo($Picture); }
3353:          else { $Picture = NULL; $PicOffset = 0; }
3354: 
3355:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3356: 
3357:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3358:          $Shape     = $Serie["Shape"];
3359:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3360:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3361:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3362: 
3363:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
3364: 
3365:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3366: 
3367:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
3368: 
3369:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3370:           {
3371:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3372:            if ( $Picture != NULL ) { $PicOffset = $PicHeight / 2; $SerieWeight = 0; }
3373:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
3374: 
3375:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3376:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
3377:             {
3378:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3379:               $this->drawText($X,$Y-$DisplayOffset-$SerieWeight-$BorderSize-$PicOffset,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3380: 
3381:              if ( $Y != VOID )
3382:               {
3383:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$SerieWeight,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3384: 
3385:                if ( $Picture != NULL )
3386:                 { $this->drawFromPicture($PicType,$Picture,$X-$PicWidth/2,$Y-$PicHeight/2); }
3387:                else
3388:                 { $this->drawShape($X,$Y,$Shape,$SerieWeight,$PlotBorder,$BorderSize,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha,$BorderR,$BorderG,$BorderB,$BorderAlpha); }
3389:               }
3390:              $X = $X + $XStep;
3391:             }
3392:           }
3393:          else
3394:           {
3395:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3396:            if ( $Picture != NULL ) { $PicOffset = $PicWidth / 2; $SerieWeight = 0; }
3397:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
3398: 
3399:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3400:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
3401:             {
3402:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3403:               $this->drawText($X+$DisplayOffset+$SerieWeight+$BorderSize+$PicOffset,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("Angle"=>270,"R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3404: 
3405:              if ( $X != VOID )
3406:               {
3407:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$SerieWeight,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3408: 
3409:                if ( $Picture != NULL )
3410:                 { $this->drawFromPicture($PicType,$Picture,$X-$PicWidth/2,$Y-$PicHeight/2); }
3411:                else
3412:                 { $this->drawShape($X,$Y,$Shape,$SerieWeight,$PlotBorder,$BorderSize,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha,$BorderR,$BorderG,$BorderB,$BorderAlpha); }
3413:               }
3414:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
3415:             }
3416:           }
3417:         }
3418:       }
3419:     }
3420: 
3421:    /* Draw a spline chart */
3422:    function drawSplineChart($Format=NULL)
3423:     {
3424:      $BreakVoid     = isset($Format["BreakVoid"]) ? $Format["BreakVoid"] : TRUE;
3425:      $VoidTicks     = isset($Format["VoidTicks"]) ? $Format["VoidTicks"] : 4;
3426:      $BreakR        = isset($Format["BreakR"]) ? $Format["BreakR"] : NULL; // 234
3427:      $BreakG        = isset($Format["BreakG"]) ? $Format["BreakG"] : NULL; // 55
3428:      $BreakB        = isset($Format["BreakB"]) ? $Format["BreakB"] : NULL; // 26
3429:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
3430:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
3431:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3432:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
3433:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
3434:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
3435:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
3436:      $ImageMapPlotSize  = isset($Format["ImageMapPlotSize"]) ? $Format["ImageMapPlotSize"] : 5;
3437: 
3438:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3439: 
3440:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3441:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3442:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3443:       {
3444:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
3445:         {
3446:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
3447: 
3448:          if ( $BreakR == NULL )
3449:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks);
3450:          else
3451:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$BreakR,"G"=>$BreakG,"B"=>$BreakB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3452: 
3453:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3454: 
3455:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3456:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3457:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3458:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3459: 
3460:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
3461: 
3462:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3463: 
3464:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
3465: 
3466:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3467:           {
3468:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3469:            $X     = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $WayPoints = "";
3470:            $Force = $XStep / 5;
3471: 
3472:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3473:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $LastX = 1; $LastY = 1;
3474:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
3475:             {
3476:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3477:               $this->drawText($X,$Y-$DisplayOffset,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3478:     
3479:              if ( $RecordImageMap && $Y != VOID ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$ImageMapPlotSize,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3480: 
3481:              if ( $Y == VOID && $LastY != NULL )
3482:               { $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight)); $WayPoints = ""; }
3483: 
3484:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastY == NULL && $LastGoodY != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
3485:               { $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings); }
3486: 
3487:              if ( $Y != VOID )
3488:               $WayPoints[] = array($X,$Y);
3489: 
3490:              if ( $Y != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
3491:              if ( $Y == VOID ) { $Y = NULL; }
3492: 
3493:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
3494:              $X = $X + $XStep;
3495:             }
3496:            $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
3497:           }
3498:          else
3499:           {
3500:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3501:            $Y     = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $WayPoints = "";
3502:            $Force = $YStep / 5;
3503: 
3504:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3505:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $LastX = 1; $LastY = 1;
3506:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
3507:             {
3508:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3509:               $this->drawText($X+$DisplayOffset,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("Angle"=>270,"R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3510: 
3511:              if ( $RecordImageMap && $X != VOID ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$ImageMapPlotSize,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3512: 
3513:              if ( $X == VOID && $LastX != NULL )
3514:               { $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight)); $WayPoints = ""; }
3515: 
3516:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX == NULL && $LastGoodX != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
3517:               { $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings); }
3518: 
3519:              if ( $X != VOID )
3520:               $WayPoints[] = array($X,$Y);
3521: 
3522:              if ( $X != VOID ) { $LastGoodX = $X; $LastGoodY = $Y; }
3523:              if ( $X == VOID ) { $X = NULL; }
3524: 
3525:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
3526:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
3527:             }
3528:            $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
3529:           }
3530:         }
3531:       }
3532:     }
3533: 
3534:    /* Draw a filled spline chart */
3535:    function drawFilledSplineChart($Format=NULL)
3536:     {
3537:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
3538:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
3539:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3540:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
3541:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
3542:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
3543:      $AroundZero    = isset($Format["AroundZero"]) ? $Format["AroundZero"] : TRUE;
3544:      $Threshold     = isset($Format["Threshold"]) ? $Format["Threshold"] : NULL;
3545: 
3546:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3547: 
3548:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3549:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3550:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3551:       {
3552:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
3553:         {
3554:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
3555:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3556: 
3557:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3558:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3559:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3560:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3561: 
3562:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3563:          if ( $AroundZero ) { $YZero = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"])); }
3564: 
3565:          if ( $Threshold != NULL )
3566:           {
3567:            foreach($Threshold as $Key => $Params)
3568:             {
3569:              $Threshold[$Key]["MinX"] = $this->scaleComputeY($Params["Min"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3570:              $Threshold[$Key]["MaxX"] = $this->scaleComputeY($Params["Max"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3571:             }
3572:           }
3573: 
3574:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
3575: 
3576:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3577:           {
3578:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3579:            $X     = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $WayPoints = "";
3580:            $Force = $XStep / 5;
3581: 
3582:            if ( !$AroundZero ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
3583:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
3584:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaY1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY1+1; }
3585: 
3586:            $LastX = ""; $LastY = "";
3587:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3588:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
3589:             {
3590:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3591:               $this->drawText($X,$Y-$DisplayOffset,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3592: 
3593:              if ( $Y == VOID )
3594:               {
3595:                $Area = $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"PathOnly"=>TRUE));
3596: 
3597:                if ( $Area != "" )
3598:                 {
3599:                  foreach ($Area as $key => $Points)
3600:                   {
3601:                    $Corners = ""; $Corners[] = $Area[$key][0]["X"]; $Corners[] = $YZero;
3602:                    foreach($Points as $subKey => $Point)
3603:                     {
3604:                      if ( $subKey == count($Points)-1) { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]-1; } else { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]; }
3605:                      $Corners[] = $Point["Y"]+1;
3606:                     }
3607:                    $Corners[] = $Points[$subKey]["X"]-1; $Corners[] = $YZero;
3608: 
3609:                    $this->drawPolygonChart($Corners,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/2,"NoBorder"=>TRUE,"Threshold"=>$Threshold));
3610:                   }
3611:                  $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
3612:                 }
3613: 
3614:                $WayPoints = "";
3615:               }
3616:              else
3617:               $WayPoints[] = array($X,$Y-.5); /* -.5 for AA visual fix */
3618: 
3619:              $X = $X + $XStep;
3620:             }
3621:            $Area = $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"PathOnly"=>TRUE));
3622: 
3623:            if ( $Area != "" )
3624:             {
3625:              foreach ($Area as $key => $Points)
3626:               {
3627:                $Corners = ""; $Corners[] = $Area[$key][0]["X"]; $Corners[] = $YZero;
3628:                foreach($Points as $subKey => $Point)
3629:                 {
3630:                  if ( $subKey == count($Points)-1) { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]-1; } else { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]; }
3631:                  $Corners[] = $Point["Y"]+1;
3632:                 }
3633:                $Corners[] = $Points[$subKey]["X"]-1; $Corners[] = $YZero;
3634: 
3635:                $this->drawPolygonChart($Corners,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/2,"NoBorder"=>TRUE,"Threshold"=>$Threshold));
3636:               }
3637:              $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
3638:             }
3639:           }
3640:          else
3641:           {
3642:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3643:            $Y     = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $WayPoints = "";
3644:            $Force = $YStep / 5;
3645: 
3646:            if ( !$AroundZero ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
3647:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
3648:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
3649: 
3650:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3651:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
3652:             {
3653:              if ( $DisplayValues ) 
3654:               $this->drawText($X+$DisplayOffset,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("Angle"=>270,"R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE));
3655: 
3656:              if ( $X == VOID )
3657:               {
3658:                $Area = $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"PathOnly"=>TRUE));
3659: 
3660:                if ( $Area != "" )
3661:                 {
3662:                  foreach ($Area as $key => $Points)
3663:                   {
3664:                    $Corners = ""; $Corners[] = $YZero; $Corners[] = $Area[$key][0]["Y"];
3665:                    foreach($Points as $subKey => $Point)
3666:                     {
3667:                      if ( $subKey == count($Points)-1) { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]-1; } else { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]; }
3668:                      $Corners[] = $Point["Y"];
3669:                     }
3670:                    $Corners[] = $YZero; $Corners[] = $Points[$subKey]["Y"]-1;
3671: 
3672:                    $this->drawPolygonChart($Corners,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/2,"NoBorder"=>TRUE,"Threshold"=>$Threshold));
3673:                   }
3674:                  $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
3675:                 }
3676: 
3677:                $WayPoints = "";
3678:               }
3679:              else
3680:               $WayPoints[] = array($X,$Y);
3681: 
3682:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
3683:             }
3684:            $Area = $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"PathOnly"=>TRUE));
3685: 
3686:            if ( $Area != "" )
3687:             {
3688:              foreach ($Area as $key => $Points)
3689:               {
3690:                $Corners = ""; $Corners[] = $YZero; $Corners[] = $Area[$key][0]["Y"];
3691:                foreach($Points as $subKey => $Point)
3692:                 {
3693:                  if ( $subKey == count($Points)-1) { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]-1; } else { $Corners[] = $Point["X"]; }
3694:                  $Corners[] = $Point["Y"];
3695:                 }
3696:                $Corners[] = $YZero; $Corners[] = $Points[$subKey]["Y"]-1;
3697: 
3698:                $this->drawPolygonChart($Corners,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha/2,"NoBorder"=>TRUE,"Threshold"=>$Threshold));
3699:               }
3700:              $this->drawSpline($WayPoints,array("Force"=>$Force,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks));
3701:             }
3702: 
3703:           }
3704:         }
3705:       }
3706:     }
3707: 
3708:    /* Draw a line chart */
3709:    function drawLineChart($Format=NULL)
3710:     {
3711:      $BreakVoid     = isset($Format["BreakVoid"]) ? $Format["BreakVoid"] : TRUE;
3712:      $VoidTicks     = isset($Format["VoidTicks"]) ? $Format["VoidTicks"] : 4;
3713:      $BreakR        = isset($Format["BreakR"]) ? $Format["BreakR"] : NULL;
3714:      $BreakG        = isset($Format["BreakG"]) ? $Format["BreakG"] : NULL;
3715:      $BreakB        = isset($Format["BreakB"]) ? $Format["BreakB"] : NULL;
3716:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
3717:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
3718:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3719:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
3720:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
3721:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
3722:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
3723:      $ImageMapPlotSize  = isset($Format["ImageMapPlotSize"]) ? $Format["ImageMapPlotSize"] : 5;
3724:      $ForceColor    = isset($Format["ForceColor"]) ? $Format["ForceColor"] : FALSE;
3725:      $ForceR        = isset($Format["ForceR"]) ? $Format["ForceR"] : 0;
3726:      $ForceG        = isset($Format["ForceG"]) ? $Format["ForceG"] : 0;
3727:      $ForceB        = isset($Format["ForceB"]) ? $Format["ForceB"] : 0;
3728:      $ForceAlpha    = isset($Format["ForceAlpha"]) ? $Format["ForceAlpha"] : 100;
3729: 
3730:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3731: 
3732:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3733:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3734:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3735:       {
3736:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
3737:         {
3738:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
3739: 
3740:          if ( $ForceColor )
3741:           { $R = $ForceR; $G = $ForceG; $B = $ForceB; $Alpha = $ForceAlpha; }
3742: 
3743:          if ( $BreakR == NULL )
3744:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3745:          else
3746:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$BreakR,"G"=>$BreakG,"B"=>$BreakB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3747: 
3748:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3749: 
3750:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3751:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3752:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3753:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3754: 
3755:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
3756: 
3757:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3758: 
3759:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
3760: 
3761:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3762:           {
3763:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3764:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
3765: 
3766:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3767:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL;
3768:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
3769:             {
3770:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID ) 
3771:               {
3772:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] > 0 ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
3773:                $this->drawText($X,$Y-$Offset-$Weight,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align));
3774:               }
3775: 
3776:              if ( $RecordImageMap && $Y != VOID ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$ImageMapPlotSize,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3777: 
3778:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
3779:               $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
3780: 
3781:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastY == NULL && $LastGoodY != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
3782:               { $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings); $LastGoodY = NULL; }
3783: 
3784:              if ( $Y != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
3785:              if ( $Y == VOID ) { $Y = NULL; }
3786: 
3787:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
3788:              $X = $X + $XStep;
3789:             }
3790:           }
3791:          else
3792:           {
3793:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3794:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
3795: 
3796:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3797:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL;
3798:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
3799:             {
3800:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID ) 
3801:               { $this->drawText($X+$DisplayOffset+$Weight,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("Angle"=>270,"R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE)); }
3802: 
3803:              if ( $RecordImageMap && $X != VOID ) { $this->addToImageMap("CIRCLE",floor($X).",".floor($Y).",".$ImageMapPlotSize,$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3804: 
3805:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
3806:               $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$X,$Y,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight));
3807: 
3808:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX == NULL && $LastGoodY != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
3809:               { $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings); $LastGoodY = NULL; }
3810: 
3811:              if ( $X != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
3812:              if ( $X == VOID ) { $X = NULL; }
3813: 
3814:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
3815:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
3816:             }
3817:           }
3818:         }
3819:       }
3820:     }
3821: 
3822:    /* Draw a line chart */
3823:    function drawZoneChart($SerieA,$SerieB,$Format=NULL)
3824:     {
3825:      $AxisID    = isset($Format["AxisID"]) ? $Format["AxisID"] : 0;
3826:      $LineR = isset($Format["LineR"]) ? $Format["LineR"] : 150;
3827:      $LineG = isset($Format["LineG"]) ? $Format["LineG"] : 150;
3828:      $LineB = isset($Format["LineB"]) ? $Format["LineB"] : 150;
3829:      $LineAlpha = isset($Format["LineAlpha"]) ? $Format["LineAlpha"] : 50;
3830:      $LineTicks = isset($Format["LineTicks"]) ? $Format["LineTicks"] : 1;
3831:      $AreaR = isset($Format["AreaR"]) ? $Format["AreaR"] : 150;
3832:      $AreaG = isset($Format["AreaG"]) ? $Format["AreaG"] : 150;
3833:      $AreaB = isset($Format["AreaB"]) ? $Format["AreaB"] : 150;
3834:      $AreaAlpha = isset($Format["AreaAlpha"]) ? $Format["AreaAlpha"] : 5;
3835: 
3836:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3837: 
3838:      $Data   = $this->DataSet->getData();
3839:      if ( !isset($Data["Series"][$SerieA]["Data"]) || !isset($Data["Series"][$SerieB]["Data"]) ) { return(0); }
3840:      $SerieAData = $Data["Series"][$SerieA]["Data"];
3841:      $SerieBData = $Data["Series"][$SerieB]["Data"];
3842: 
3843:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3844: 
3845:      $Mode  = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3846:      $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3847:      $Unit  = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3848: 
3849:      $PosArrayA = $this->scaleComputeY($SerieAData,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3850:      $PosArrayB = $this->scaleComputeY($SerieBData,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID));
3851:      if ( count($PosArrayA) != count($PosArrayB) ) { return(0); }
3852: 
3853:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3854:       {
3855:        if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3856:        $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
3857: 
3858:        $LastX = NULL; $LastY1 = NULL; $LastY2 = NULL;
3859:        $BoundsA = ""; $BoundsB = "";
3860:        foreach($PosArrayA as $Key => $Y1)
3861:         {
3862:          $Y2 = $PosArrayB[$Key];
3863: 
3864:          $BoundsA[] = $X; $BoundsA[] = $Y1;
3865:          $BoundsB[] = $X; $BoundsB[] = $Y2;
3866: 
3867:          $LastX = $X;
3868:          $LastY1 = $Y1; $LastY2 = $Y2;
3869: 
3870:          $X = $X + $XStep;
3871:         }
3872:        $Bounds = array_merge($BoundsA,$this->reversePlots($BoundsB));
3873:        $this->drawPolygonChart($Bounds,array("R"=>$AreaR,"G"=>$AreaG,"B"=>$AreaB,"Alpha"=>$AreaAlpha));
3874: 
3875:        for($i=0;$i<=count($BoundsA)-4;$i=$i+2)
3876:         {
3877:          $this->drawLine($BoundsA[$i],$BoundsA[$i+1],$BoundsA[$i+2],$BoundsA[$i+3],array("R"=>$LineR,"G"=>$LineG,"B"=>$LineB,"Alpha"=>$LineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$LineTicks));
3878:          $this->drawLine($BoundsB[$i],$BoundsB[$i+1],$BoundsB[$i+2],$BoundsB[$i+3],array("R"=>$LineR,"G"=>$LineG,"B"=>$LineB,"Alpha"=>$LineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$LineTicks));
3879:         }
3880:       }
3881:      else
3882:       {
3883:        if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3884:        $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
3885: 
3886:        $LastY = NULL; $LastX1 = NULL; $LastX2 = NULL;
3887:        $BoundsA = ""; $BoundsB = "";
3888:        foreach($PosArrayA as $Key => $X1)
3889:         {
3890:          $X2 = $PosArrayB[$Key];
3891: 
3892:          $BoundsA[] = $X1; $BoundsA[] = $Y;
3893:          $BoundsB[] = $X2; $BoundsB[] = $Y;
3894: 
3895:          $LastY = $Y;
3896:          $LastX1 = $X1; $LastX2 = $X2;
3897: 
3898:          $Y = $Y + $YStep;
3899:         }
3900:        $Bounds = array_merge($BoundsA,$this->reversePlots($BoundsB));
3901:        $this->drawPolygonChart($Bounds,array("R"=>$AreaR,"G"=>$AreaG,"B"=>$AreaB,"Alpha"=>$AreaAlpha));
3902: 
3903:        for($i=0;$i<=count($BoundsA)-4;$i=$i+2)
3904:         {
3905:          $this->drawLine($BoundsA[$i],$BoundsA[$i+1],$BoundsA[$i+2],$BoundsA[$i+3],array("R"=>$LineR,"G"=>$LineG,"B"=>$LineB,"Alpha"=>$LineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$LineTicks));
3906:          $this->drawLine($BoundsB[$i],$BoundsB[$i+1],$BoundsB[$i+2],$BoundsB[$i+3],array("R"=>$LineR,"G"=>$LineG,"B"=>$LineB,"Alpha"=>$LineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$LineTicks));
3907:         }
3908:       }
3909:     }
3910: 
3911:    /* Draw a step chart */
3912:    function drawStepChart($Format=NULL)
3913:     {
3914:      $BreakVoid     = isset($Format["BreakVoid"]) ? $Format["BreakVoid"] : FALSE;
3915:      $ReCenter      = isset($Format["ReCenter"]) ? $Format["ReCenter"] : TRUE;
3916:      $VoidTicks     = isset($Format["VoidTicks"]) ? $Format["VoidTicks"] : 4;
3917:      $BreakR        = isset($Format["BreakR"]) ? $Format["BreakR"] : NULL;
3918:      $BreakG        = isset($Format["BreakG"]) ? $Format["BreakG"] : NULL;
3919:      $BreakB        = isset($Format["BreakB"]) ? $Format["BreakB"] : NULL;
3920:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] :FALSE;
3921:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
3922:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
3923:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
3924:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
3925:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
3926:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
3927:      $ImageMapPlotSize  = isset($Format["ImageMapPlotSize"]) ? $Format["ImageMapPlotSize"] : 5;
3928: 
3929:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
3930: 
3931:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
3932:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
3933:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
3934:       {
3935:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
3936:         {
3937:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
3938: 
3939:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
3940: 
3941:          if ( $BreakR == NULL )
3942:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3943:          else
3944:           $BreakSettings = array("R"=>$BreakR,"G"=>$BreakG,"B"=>$BreakB,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$VoidTicks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3945: 
3946:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
3947: 
3948:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
3949:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
3950:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
3951:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
3952:          $Color     = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
3953: 
3954:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
3955: 
3956:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
3957: 
3958:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
3959:           {
3960:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
3961:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
3962: 
3963:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
3964:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $Init = FALSE;
3965:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
3966:             {
3967:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID ) 
3968:               {
3969:                if ( $Y <= $LastY ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
3970:                $this->drawText($X,$Y-$Offset-$Weight,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align));
3971:               }
3972: 
3973:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
3974:               {
3975:                $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$X,$LastY,$Color);
3976:                $this->drawLine($X,$LastY,$X,$Y,$Color);
3977:                if ( $ReCenter && $X+$XStep < $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XMargin )
3978:                 {
3979:                  $this->drawLine($X,$Y,$X+$XStep,$Y,$Color);
3980:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$XStep+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3981:                 }
3982:                else
3983:                 { if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); } }
3984:               }
3985: 
3986:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastY == NULL && $LastGoodY != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
3987:               { 
3988:                if ( $ReCenter )
3989:                 {
3990:                  $this->drawLine($LastGoodX+$XStep,$LastGoodY,$X,$LastGoodY,$BreakSettings);
3991:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastGoodX+$XStep-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3992:                 }
3993:                else
3994:                 {
3995:                  $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$X,$LastGoodY,$BreakSettings);
3996:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastGoodX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
3997:                 }
3998: 
3999:                $this->drawLine($X,$LastGoodY,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings);
4000:                $LastGoodY = NULL;
4001:               }
4002:              elseif( !$BreakVoid && $LastGoodY == NULL && $Y != VOID )
4003:               {
4004:               $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin,$Y,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings);
4005:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($this->GraphAreaX1+$XMargin-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4006:               }
4007: 
4008:              if ( $Y != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
4009:              if ( $Y == VOID ) { $Y = NULL; }
4010: 
4011:              if ( !$Init && $ReCenter ) { $X = $X - $XStep/2; $Init = TRUE; }
4012:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
4013:              if ( $LastX < $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin ) { $LastX = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; }
4014:              $X = $X + $XStep;
4015:             }
4016:            if ( $ReCenter )
4017:             {
4018:              $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$this->GraphAreaX2 - $XMargin,$LastY,$Color);
4019:              if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($this->GraphAreaX2-$XMargin+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4020:             }
4021:           }
4022:          else
4023:           {
4024:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4025:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
4026: 
4027:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4028:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $Init = FALSE;
4029:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
4030:             {
4031:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID ) 
4032:               {
4033:                if ( $X >= $LastX ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
4034:                $this->drawText($X+$Offset+$Weight,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align));
4035:               }
4036: 
4037:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
4038:               {
4039:                $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$LastX,$Y,$Color);
4040:                $this->drawLine($LastX,$Y,$X,$Y,$Color);
4041: 
4042:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastX+$XStep+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4043:               }
4044: 
4045:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX == NULL && $LastGoodY != NULL && !$BreakVoid )
4046:               {
4047:                $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY,$LastGoodX,$LastGoodY+$YStep,$Color);
4048:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastGoodX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodX+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY+$YStep+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4049: 
4050:                $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$LastGoodY+$YStep,$LastGoodX,$Y,$BreakSettings);
4051:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastGoodX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodY+$YStep-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastGoodX+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($YStep+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4052: 
4053:                $this->drawLine($LastGoodX,$Y,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings);
4054:                $LastGoodY = NULL;
4055:               }
4056:              elseif ( $X != VOID && $LastGoodY == NULL && !$BreakVoid )
4057:               {
4058:                $this->drawLine($X,$this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin,$X,$Y,$BreakSettings);
4059:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($this->GraphAreaY1+$XMargin-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($X+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($Y+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4060:               }
4061: 
4062:              if ( $X != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
4063:              if ( $X == VOID ) { $X = NULL; }
4064: 
4065:              if ( !$Init && $ReCenter ) { $Y = $Y - $YStep/2; $Init = TRUE; }
4066:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
4067:              if ( $LastY < $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin ) { $LastY = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; }
4068:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
4069:             }
4070:            if ( $ReCenter )
4071:             {
4072:              $this->drawLine($LastX,$LastY,$LastX,$this->GraphAreaY2 - $XMargin,$Color);
4073:              if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($LastX-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastY-$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($LastX+$ImageMapPlotSize).",".floor($this->GraphAreaY2-$XMargin+$ImageMapPlotSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4074:             }
4075:           }
4076:         }
4077:       }
4078:     }
4079: 
4080:    /* Draw a step chart */
4081:    function drawFilledStepChart($Format=NULL)
4082:     {
4083:      $ReCenter      = isset($Format["ReCenter"]) ? $Format["ReCenter"] : TRUE;
4084:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] :FALSE;
4085:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
4086:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
4087:      $ForceTransparency = isset($Format["ForceTransparency"]) ? $Format["ForceTransparency"] : NULL;
4088:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
4089:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
4090:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
4091:      $AroundZero    = isset($Format["AroundZero"]) ? $Format["AroundZero"] : TRUE;
4092: 
4093:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
4094: 
4095:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
4096:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
4097:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
4098:       {
4099:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
4100:         {
4101:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
4102: 
4103:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
4104: 
4105:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
4106:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
4107:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
4108:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
4109: 
4110:          $Color     = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B);
4111:          if ( $ForceTransparency != NULL ) { $Color["Alpha"] = $ForceTransparency; } else { $Color["Alpha"] = $Alpha; }
4112: 
4113:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4114:          $YZero    = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4115: 
4116:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
4117: 
4118:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
4119:           {
4120:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4121:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaY1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY1+1; }
4122: 
4123:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4124:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
4125: 
4126:            if ( !$AroundZero ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4127: 
4128:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4129:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $Points = ""; $Init = FALSE;
4130:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
4131:             {
4132:              if ( $Y == VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL && $Points !="" )
4133:               {
4134:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $LastY;
4135:                $Points[] = $X; $Points[] = $LastY;
4136:                $Points[] = $X; $Points[] = $YZero;
4137:                $this->drawPolygon($Points,$Color);
4138:                $Points = "";
4139:               }
4140: 
4141:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
4142:               {
4143:                if ( $Points == "") { $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $YZero; }
4144:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $LastY;
4145:                $Points[] = $X; $Points[] = $LastY;
4146:                $Points[] = $X; $Points[] = $Y;
4147:               }
4148: 
4149:              if ( $Y != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
4150:              if ( $Y == VOID ) { $Y = NULL; }
4151: 
4152:              if ( !$Init && $ReCenter ) { $X = $X - $XStep/2; $Init = TRUE; }
4153:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
4154:              if ( $LastX < $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin ) { $LastX = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; }
4155:              $X = $X + $XStep;
4156:             }
4157: 
4158:            if ( $ReCenter )
4159:             {
4160:              $Points[] = $LastX+$XStep/2; $Points[] = $LastY;
4161:              $Points[] = $LastX+$XStep/2; $Points[] = $YZero;
4162:             }
4163:            else
4164:             { $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $YZero; }
4165: 
4166:            $this->drawPolygon($Points,$Color);
4167:           }
4168:          else
4169:           {
4170:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4171:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
4172: 
4173:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4174:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
4175: 
4176:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4177:            $LastGoodY = NULL; $LastGoodX = NULL; $Points = "";
4178:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
4179:             {
4180:              if ( $X == VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL && $Points !="" )
4181:               {
4182:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $LastY;
4183:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $Y;
4184:                $Points[] = $YZero; $Points[] = $Y;
4185:                $this->drawPolygon($Points,$Color);
4186:                $Points = "";
4187:               }
4188: 
4189:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX != NULL && $LastY != NULL )
4190:               {
4191:                if ( $Points == "") { $Points[] = $YZero; $Points[] = $LastY; }
4192:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $LastY;
4193:                $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $Y;
4194:                $Points[] = $X; $Points[] = $Y;
4195:               }
4196: 
4197:              if ( $X != VOID ) { $LastGoodY = $Y; $LastGoodX = $X; }
4198:              if ( $X == VOID ) { $X = NULL; }
4199: 
4200:              if ( $LastX == NULL && $ReCenter ) { $Y = $Y - $YStep/2; }
4201:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
4202:              if ( $LastY < $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin ) { $LastY = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; }
4203:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
4204:             }
4205: 
4206:            if ( $ReCenter )
4207:             {
4208:              $Points[] = $LastX; $Points[] = $LastY+$YStep/2;
4209:              $Points[] = $YZero; $Points[] = $LastY+$YStep/2;
4210:             }
4211:            else
4212:             { $Points[] = $YZero; $Points[] = $LastY; }
4213: 
4214:            $this->drawPolygon($Points,$Color);
4215:           }
4216:         }
4217:       }
4218:     }
4219: 
4220:    /* Draw an area chart */
4221:    function drawAreaChart($Format=NULL)
4222:     {
4223:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
4224:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
4225:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
4226:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
4227:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
4228:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
4229:      $ForceTransparency = isset($Format["ForceTransparency"]) ? $Format["ForceTransparency"] : 25;
4230:      $AroundZero    = isset($Format["AroundZero"]) ? $Format["AroundZero"] : TRUE;
4231:      $Threshold     = isset($Format["Threshold"]) ? $Format["Threshold"] : NULL;
4232: 
4233:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
4234: 
4235:      $Data  = $this->DataSet->getData();
4236:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
4237: 
4238:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
4239:       {
4240:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
4241:         {
4242:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
4243:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
4244: 
4245:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
4246:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
4247:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
4248:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
4249: 
4250:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4251:          $YZero    = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4252: 
4253:          if ( $Threshold != NULL )
4254:           {
4255:            foreach($Threshold as $Key => $Params)
4256:             {
4257:              $Threshold[$Key]["MinX"] = $this->scaleComputeY($Params["Min"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4258:              $Threshold[$Key]["MaxX"] = $this->scaleComputeY($Params["Max"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4259:             }
4260:           }
4261: 
4262:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
4263: 
4264:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
4265:           {
4266:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4267: 
4268:            $Areas = ""; $AreaID = 0; 
4269:            $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
4270:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4271: 
4272:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4273:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
4274: 
4275:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4276:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
4277:             {
4278:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID )
4279:               {
4280:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] > 0 ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
4281:                $this->drawText($X,$Y-$Offset,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align));
4282:               }
4283: 
4284:              if ( $Y == VOID && isset($Areas[$AreaID]) )
4285:               {
4286:                if($LastX == NULL)
4287:                 { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $X; }
4288:                else
4289:                 { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $LastX; }
4290: 
4291:                if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4292:                $AreaID++;
4293:               }
4294:              elseif ($Y != VOID)
4295:               {
4296:                if ( !isset($Areas[$AreaID]) )
4297:                 {
4298:                  $Areas[$AreaID][] = $X;
4299:                  if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4300:                 }
4301: 
4302:                $Areas[$AreaID][] = $X;
4303:                $Areas[$AreaID][] = $Y;
4304:               }
4305: 
4306:              $LastX = $X;
4307:              $X = $X + $XStep;
4308:             }
4309:            $Areas[$AreaID][] = $LastX;
4310:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4311: 
4312:            /* Handle shadows in the areas */
4313:            if ( $this->Shadow )
4314:             {
4315:              $ShadowArea = "";
4316:              foreach($Areas as $Key => $Points)
4317:               {
4318:                $ShadowArea[$Key] = "";
4319:                foreach($Points as $Key2 => $Value)
4320:                 {
4321:                  if ( $Key2 % 2 == 0 )
4322:                   { $ShadowArea[$Key][] = $Value + $this->ShadowX; }
4323:                  else
4324:                   { $ShadowArea[$Key][] = $Value + $this->ShadowY; }
4325:                 }
4326:               }              
4327: 
4328:              foreach($ShadowArea as $Key => $Points)
4329:               $this->drawPolygonChart($Points,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
4330:             }
4331: 
4332:            $Alpha = $ForceTransparency != NULL ? $ForceTransparency : $Alpha;
4333:            $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Threshold"=>$Threshold);
4334: 
4335:            foreach($Areas as $Key => $Points)
4336:             $this->drawPolygonChart($Points,$Color);
4337:           }
4338:          else
4339:           {
4340:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4341:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
4342: 
4343:            $Areas = ""; $AreaID = 0; 
4344:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4345:            $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
4346: 
4347:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4348:            $Y     = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin; $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL;
4349: 
4350:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4351:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
4352:             {
4353:              if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID )
4354:               {
