4355:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] > 0 ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
4356:                $this->drawText($X+$Offset,$Y,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("Angle"=>270,"R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align));
4357:               }
4358: 
4359:              if ( $X == VOID && isset($Areas[$AreaID]) )
4360:               {
4361:                if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4362: 
4363:                if($LastY == NULL)
4364:                 { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $Y; }
4365:                else
4366:                 { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $LastY; }
4367: 
4368:                $AreaID++;
4369:               }
4370:              elseif ($X != VOID)
4371:               {
4372:                if ( !isset($Areas[$AreaID]) )
4373:                 {
4374:                  if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4375:                  $Areas[$AreaID][] = $Y;
4376:                 }
4377: 
4378:                $Areas[$AreaID][] = $X;
4379:                $Areas[$AreaID][] = $Y;
4380:               }
4381: 
4382:              $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y;
4383:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
4384:             }
4385:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $YZero; } else { $Areas[$AreaID][] = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4386:            $Areas[$AreaID][] = $LastY;
4387: 
4388:            /* Handle shadows in the areas */
4389:            if ( $this->Shadow )
4390:             {
4391:              $ShadowArea = "";
4392:              foreach($Areas as $Key => $Points)
4393:               {
4394:                $ShadowArea[$Key] = "";
4395:                foreach($Points as $Key2 => $Value)
4396:                 {
4397:                  if ( $Key2 % 2 == 0 )
4398:                   { $ShadowArea[$Key][] = $Value + $this->ShadowX; }
4399:                  else
4400:                   { $ShadowArea[$Key][] = $Value + $this->ShadowY; }
4401:                 }
4402:               }              
4403: 
4404:              foreach($ShadowArea as $Key => $Points)
4405:               $this->drawPolygonChart($Points,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
4406:             }
4407: 
4408:            $Alpha = $ForceTransparency != NULL ? $ForceTransparency : $Alpha;
4409:            $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Threshold"=>$Threshold);
4410: 
4411:            foreach($Areas as $Key => $Points)
4412:             $this->drawPolygonChart($Points,$Color);
4413:           }
4414:         }
4415:       }
4416:     }
4417: 
4418: 
4419:    /* Draw a bar chart */
4420:    function drawBarChart($Format=NULL)
4421:     {
4422:      $Floating0Serie    = isset($Format["Floating0Serie"]) ? $Format["Floating0Serie"] : NULL;
4423:      $Floating0Value    = isset($Format["Floating0Value"]) ? $Format["Floating0Value"] : NULL;
4424:      $Draw0Line     = isset($Format["Draw0Line"]) ? $Format["Draw0Line"] : FALSE;
4425:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
4426:      $DisplayOrientation = isset($Format["DisplayOrientation"]) ? $Format["DisplayOrientation"] : ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL;
4427:      $DisplayOffset = isset($Format["DisplayOffset"]) ? $Format["DisplayOffset"] : 2;
4428:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
4429:      $DisplayFont   = isset($Format["DisplaySize"]) ? $Format["DisplaySize"] : $this->FontName;
4430:      $DisplaySize   = isset($Format["DisplaySize"]) ? $Format["DisplaySize"] : $this->FontSize;
4431:      $DisplayPos    = isset($Format["DisplayPos"]) ? $Format["DisplayPos"] : LABEL_POS_OUTSIDE;
4432:      $DisplayShadow = isset($Format["DisplayShadow"]) ? $Format["DisplayShadow"] : TRUE;
4433:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
4434:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
4435:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
4436:      $AroundZero    = isset($Format["AroundZero"]) ? $Format["AroundZero"] : TRUE;
4437:      $Interleave    = isset($Format["Interleave"]) ? $Format["Interleave"] : .5;
4438:      $Rounded       = isset($Format["Rounded"]) ? $Format["Rounded"] : FALSE;
4439:      $RoundRadius   = isset($Format["RoundRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundRadius"] : 4;
4440:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
4441:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
4442:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
4443:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
4444:      $Gradient      = isset($Format["Gradient"]) ? $Format["Gradient"] : FALSE;
4445:      $GradientMode  = isset($Format["GradientMode"]) ? $Format["GradientMode"] : GRADIENT_SIMPLE;
4446:      $GradientAlpha = isset($Format["GradientAlpha"]) ? $Format["GradientAlpha"] : 20;
4447:      $GradientStartR    = isset($Format["GradientStartR"]) ? $Format["GradientStartR"] : 255;
4448:      $GradientStartG    = isset($Format["GradientStartG"]) ? $Format["GradientStartG"] : 255;
4449:      $GradientStartB    = isset($Format["GradientStartB"]) ? $Format["GradientStartB"] : 255;
4450:      $GradientEndR  = isset($Format["GradientEndR"]) ? $Format["GradientEndR"] : 0;
4451:      $GradientEndG  = isset($Format["GradientEndG"]) ? $Format["GradientEndG"] : 0;
4452:      $GradientEndB  = isset($Format["GradientEndB"]) ? $Format["GradientEndB"] : 0;
4453:      $TxtMargin     = isset($Format["TxtMargin"]) ? $Format["TxtMargin"] : 6;
4454:      $OverrideColors    = isset($Format["OverrideColors"]) ? $Format["OverrideColors"] : NULL;
4455:      $OverrideSurrounding = isset($Format["OverrideSurrounding"]) ? $Format["OverrideSurrounding"] : 30;
4456:      $InnerSurrounding  = isset($Format["InnerSurrounding"]) ? $Format["InnerSurrounding"] : NULL;
4457:      $InnerBorderR  = isset($Format["InnerBorderR"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderR"] : -1;
4458:      $InnerBorderG  = isset($Format["InnerBorderG"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderG"] : -1;
4459:      $InnerBorderB  = isset($Format["InnerBorderB"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderB"] : -1;
4460:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
4461: 
4462:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_REGULAR;
4463: 
4464:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
4465:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
4466: 
4467:      if ( $OverrideColors != NULL )
4468:       {
4469:        $OverrideColors = $this->validatePalette($OverrideColors,$OverrideSurrounding);
4470:        $this->DataSet->saveExtendedData("Palette",$OverrideColors);
4471:       }
4472: 
4473:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
4474: 
4475:      $SeriesCount  = $this->countDrawableSeries();
4476:      $CurrentSerie = 0;
4477:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
4478:       {
4479:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
4480:         {
4481:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
4482:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = $R; $DisplayG = $G; $DisplayB = $B; }
4483:          if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
4484:          if ( $InnerSurrounding != NULL ) { $InnerBorderR = $R+$InnerSurrounding; $InnerBorderG = $G+$InnerSurrounding; $InnerBorderB = $B+$InnerSurrounding; }
4485:          if ( $InnerBorderR == -1 ) { $InnerColor = NULL; } else { $InnerColor = array("R"=>$InnerBorderR,"G"=>$InnerBorderG,"B"=>$InnerBorderB); }
4486:          $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB);
4487: 
4488:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
4489:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
4490:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
4491:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
4492: 
4493:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
4494: 
4495:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4496: 
4497:          if ( $Floating0Value != NULL )
4498:           { $YZero = $this->scaleComputeY($Floating0Value,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"])); }
4499:          else
4500:           { $YZero = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"])); }
4501: 
4502:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
4503:           {
4504:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4505:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaY1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY1+1; }
4506: 
4507:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = 0; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4508:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
4509: 
4510:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $Y1 = $YZero; } else { $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4511:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XSize = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/($SeriesCount+$Interleave); } else { $XSize   = ($XStep / ($SeriesCount+$Interleave) ); }
4512: 
4513:            $XOffset = -($XSize*$SeriesCount)/2 + $CurrentSerie * $XSize;
4514:            if ( $X + $XOffset <= $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $XOffset = $this->GraphAreaX1 - $X + 1 ; }
4515: 
4516:            $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = $XOffset + $XSize / 2;
4517: 
4518:            if ( $Rounded || $BorderR != -1) { $XSpace = 1; } else { $XSpace = 0; }
4519: 
4520:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4521: 
4522:            $ID = 0;
4523:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y2)
4524:             {
4525:              if ( $Floating0Serie != NULL )
4526:               {
4527:                if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Floating0Serie]["Data"][$Key]) )
4528:                 { $Value = $Data["Series"][$Floating0Serie]["Data"][$Key]; }
4529:                else
4530:                 { $Value = 0; }
4531: 
4532:                $YZero = $this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4533:                if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4534:                if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaY1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY1+1; }
4535: 
4536:                if ( $AroundZero ) { $Y1 = $YZero; } else { $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4537:               }
4538: 
4539:              if ( $OverrideColors != NULL )
4540:               { if ( isset($OverrideColors[$ID]) ) { $Color = array("R"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["R"],"G"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["G"],"B"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["B"],"Alpha"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["Alpha"],"BorderR"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderR"],"BorderG"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderG"],"BorderB"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderB"]); } else { $Color = $this->getRandomColor(); } }
4541: 
4542:              if ( $Y2 != VOID )
4543:               {
4544:                $BarHeight = $Y1 - $Y2;
4545: 
4546:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] == 0 )
4547:                 {
4548:                  $this->drawLine($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,$Y1,$Color);
4549:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X+$XOffset+$XSpace).",".floor($Y1-1).",".floor($X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace).",".floor($Y1+1),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4550:                 }
4551:                else
4552:                 {
4553:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X+$XOffset+$XSpace).",".floor($Y1).",".floor($X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace).",".floor($Y2),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4554: 
4555:                  if ( $Rounded )
4556:                   $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,$Y2,$RoundRadius,$Color);
4557:                  else
4558:                   {
4559:                    $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,$Y2,$Color);
4560: 
4561:                    if ( $InnerColor != NULL ) { $this->drawRectangle($X+$XOffset+$XSpace+1,min($Y1,$Y2)+1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace-1,max($Y1,$Y2)-1,$InnerColor); }
4562: 
4563:                    if ( $Gradient )
4564:                     {
4565:                      $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
4566: 
4567:                      if ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_SIMPLE )
4568:                       {
4569:                        if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] >= 0 )
4570:                         $GradienColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4571:                        else
4572:                         $GradienColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4573: 
4574:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,$Y2,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradienColor);
4575:                       }
4576:                      elseif ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_EFFECT_CAN )
4577:                       {
4578:                        $GradienColor1 = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4579:                        $GradienColor2 = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4580:                        $XSpan = floor($XSize / 3);
4581: 
4582:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSpan-$XSpace,$Y2,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradienColor1);
4583:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XOffset+$XSpan+$XSpace,$Y1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,$Y2,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradienColor2);
4584:                       }
4585:                      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4586:                     }
4587:                   }
4588: 
4589:                  if ( $Draw0Line )
4590:                   {
4591:                    $Line0Color = array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>20);
4592: 
4593:                    if ( abs($Y1 - $Y2) > 3 ) { $Line0Width = 3; } else { $Line0Width = 1; }
4594:                    if ( $Y1 - $Y2 < 0 ) { $Line0Width = -$Line0Width; }
4595: 
4596:                    $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,floor($Y1),$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,floor($Y1)-$Line0Width,$Line0Color);
4597:                    $this->drawLine($X+$XOffset+$XSpace,floor($Y1),$X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace,floor($Y1),$Line0Color);
4598:                   }
4599:                 }
4600: 
4601:                if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID )
4602:                 {
4603:                  if ( $DisplayShadow ) { $this->Shadow = TRUE; }
4604: 
4605:                  $Caption    = $this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
4606:                  $TxtPos     = $this->getTextBox(0,0,$DisplayFont,$DisplaySize,90,$Caption);
4607:                  $TxtHeight  = $TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $TxtPos[1]["Y"] + $TxtMargin;
4608: 
4609:                  if ( $DisplayPos == LABEL_POS_INSIDE && abs($TxtHeight) < abs($BarHeight) )
4610:                   {
4611:                    $CenterX = (($X+$XOffset+$XSize-$XSpace)-($X+$XOffset+$XSpace))/2 + $X+$XOffset+$XSpace;
4612:                    $CenterY = ($Y2-$Y1)/2 + $Y1;
4613: 
4614:                    $this->drawText($CenterX,$CenterY,$Caption,array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize,"Angle"=>90));
4615:                   }
4616:                  else
4617:                   {
4618:                    if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] >= 0 ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMMIDDLE; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_TOPMIDDLE; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
4619:                    $this->drawText($X+$XOffset+$XSize/2,$Y2-$Offset,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize));
4620:                   }
4621: 
4622:                  $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4623:                 }
4624:               }
4625: 
4626:              $X = $X + $XStep;
4627:              $ID++;
4628:             }
4629:           }
4630:          else
4631:           {
4632:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4633:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
4634: 
4635:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = 0; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4636:            
4637:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
4638: 
4639:            if ( $AroundZero ) { $X1 = $YZero; } else { $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4640:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YSize = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/($SeriesCount+$Interleave); } else { $YSize   = ($YStep / ($SeriesCount+$Interleave) ); }
4641:            
4642:            $YOffset = -($YSize*$SeriesCount)/2 + $CurrentSerie * $YSize;
4643:            if ( $Y + $YOffset <= $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $YOffset = $this->GraphAreaY1 - $Y + 1 ; }
4644: 
4645:            $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = $YOffset + $YSize / 2;
4646: 
4647:            if ( $Rounded || $BorderR != -1 ) { $YSpace = 1; } else { $YSpace = 0; }
4648: 
4649:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4650: 
4651:            $ID = 0 ;
4652:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X2)
4653:             {
4654:              if ( $Floating0Serie != NULL )
4655:               {
4656:                if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Floating0Serie]["Data"][$Key]) )
4657:                 $Value = $Data["Series"][$Floating0Serie]["Data"][$Key];
4658:                else { $Value = 0; }
4659: 
4660:                $YZero = $this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4661:                if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4662:                if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
4663:                if ( $AroundZero ) { $X1 = $YZero; } else { $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4664:               }
4665: 
4666:              if ( $OverrideColors != NULL )
4667:               { if ( isset($OverrideColors[$ID]) ) { $Color = array("R"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["R"],"G"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["G"],"B"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["B"],"Alpha"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["Alpha"],"BorderR"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderR"],"BorderG"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderG"],"BorderB"=>$OverrideColors[$ID]["BorderB"]); } else { $Color = $this->getRandomColor(); } }
4668: 
4669:              if ( $X2 != VOID )
4670:               {
4671:                $BarWidth = $X2 - $X1;
4672: 
4673:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] == 0 )
4674:                 {
4675:                  $this->drawLine($X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,$X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,$Color);
4676:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X1-1).",".floor($Y+$YOffset+$YSpace).",".floor($X1+1).",".floor($Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4677:                 }
4678:                else
4679:                 {
4680:                  if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X1).",".floor($Y+$YOffset+$YSpace).",".floor($X2).",".floor($Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4681: 
4682:                  if ( $Rounded )
4683:                   $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1+1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,$X2,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,$RoundRadius,$Color);
4684:                  else
4685:                   {
4686:                    $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,$X2,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,$Color);
4687: 
4688:                    if ( $InnerColor != NULL ) { $this->drawRectangle(min($X1,$X2)+1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace+1,max($X1,$X2)-1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace-1,$InnerColor); }
4689: 
4690:                    if ( $Gradient )
4691:                     {
4692:                      $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
4693: 
4694:                      if ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_SIMPLE )
4695:                       {
4696:                        if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] >= 0 )
4697:                         $GradienColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4698:                        else
4699:                         $GradienColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4700: 
4701:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,$X2,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradienColor);
4702:                       }
4703:                      elseif ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_EFFECT_CAN )
4704:                       {
4705:                        $GradienColor1 = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4706:                        $GradienColor2 = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4707:                        $YSpan = floor($YSize / 3);
4708: 
4709:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,$X2,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpan-$YSpace,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradienColor1);
4710:                        $this->drawGradientArea($X1,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpan,$X2,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradienColor2);
4711:                       }
4712:                      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4713:                     }
4714:                   }
4715: 
4716:                  if ( $Draw0Line )
4717:                   {
4718:                    $Line0Color = array("R"=>0,"G"=>0,"B"=>0,"Alpha"=>20);
4719: 
4720:                    if ( abs($X1 - $X2) > 3 ) { $Line0Width = 3; } else { $Line0Width = 1; }
4721:                    if ( $X2 - $X1 < 0 ) { $Line0Width = -$Line0Width; }
4722: 
4723:                    $this->drawFilledRectangle(floor($X1),$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,floor($X1)+$Line0Width,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,$Line0Color);
4724:                    $this->drawLine(floor($X1),$Y+$YOffset+$YSpace,floor($X1),$Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace,$Line0Color);
4725:                   }
4726:                 }
4727: 
4728:                if ( $DisplayValues && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != VOID ) 
4729:                 {
4730:                  if ( $DisplayShadow ) { $this->Shadow = TRUE; }
4731: 
4732:                  $Caption   = $this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
4733:                  $TxtPos    = $this->getTextBox(0,0,$DisplayFont,$DisplaySize,0,$Caption);
4734:                  $TxtWidth  = $TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"] + $TxtMargin;
4735: 
4736:                  if ( $DisplayPos == LABEL_POS_INSIDE && abs($TxtWidth) < abs($BarWidth) )
4737:                   {
4738:                    $CenterX = ($X2-$X1)/2 + $X1;
4739:                    $CenterY = (($Y+$YOffset+$YSize-$YSpace)-($Y+$YOffset+$YSpace))/2 + ($Y+$YOffset+$YSpace);
4740: 
4741:                    $this->drawText($CenterX,$CenterY,$Caption,array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize));
4742:                   }
4743:                  else
4744:                   {
4745:                    if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] >= 0 ) { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLELEFT; $Offset = $DisplayOffset; } else { $Align = TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLERIGHT; $Offset = -$DisplayOffset; }
4746:                    $this->drawText($X2+$Offset,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize/2,$Caption,array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>$Align,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize));
4747:                   }
4748: 
4749:                  $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4750:                 }
4751:               }
4752:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
4753:              $ID++;
4754:             }
4755:           }
4756:          $CurrentSerie++;
4757:         }
4758:       }
4759:     }
4760: 
4761:    /* Draw a bar chart */
4762:    function drawStackedBarChart($Format=NULL)
4763:     {
4764:      $DisplayValues = isset($Format["DisplayValues"]) ? $Format["DisplayValues"] : FALSE;
4765:      $DisplayOrientation = isset($Format["DisplayOrientation"]) ? $Format["DisplayOrientation"] : ORIENTATION_AUTO;
4766:      $DisplayRound      = isset($Format["DisplayRound"]) ? $Format["DisplayRound"] : 0;
4767:      $DisplayColor  = isset($Format["DisplayColor"]) ? $Format["DisplayColor"] : DISPLAY_MANUAL;
4768:      $DisplayFont   = isset($Format["DisplayFont"]) ? $Format["DisplayFont"] : $this->FontName;
4769:      $DisplaySize   = isset($Format["DisplaySize"]) ? $Format["DisplaySize"] : $this->FontSize;
4770:      $DisplayR      = isset($Format["DisplayR"]) ? $Format["DisplayR"] : 0;
4771:      $DisplayG      = isset($Format["DisplayG"]) ? $Format["DisplayG"] : 0;
4772:      $DisplayB      = isset($Format["DisplayB"]) ? $Format["DisplayB"] : 0;
4773:      $Interleave    = isset($Format["Interleave"]) ? $Format["Interleave"] : .5;
4774:      $Rounded       = isset($Format["Rounded"]) ? $Format["Rounded"] : FALSE;
4775:      $RoundRadius   = isset($Format["RoundRadius"]) ? $Format["RoundRadius"] : 4;
4776:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
4777:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : -1;
4778:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : -1;
4779:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : -1;
4780:      $Gradient      = isset($Format["Gradient"]) ? $Format["Gradient"] : FALSE;
4781:      $GradientMode  = isset($Format["GradientMode"]) ? $Format["GradientMode"] : GRADIENT_SIMPLE;
4782:      $GradientAlpha = isset($Format["GradientAlpha"]) ? $Format["GradientAlpha"] : 20;
4783:      $GradientStartR    = isset($Format["GradientStartR"]) ? $Format["GradientStartR"] : 255;
4784:      $GradientStartG    = isset($Format["GradientStartG"]) ? $Format["GradientStartG"] : 255;
4785:      $GradientStartB    = isset($Format["GradientStartB"]) ? $Format["GradientStartB"] : 255;
4786:      $GradientEndR  = isset($Format["GradientEndR"]) ? $Format["GradientEndR"] : 0;
4787:      $GradientEndG  = isset($Format["GradientEndG"]) ? $Format["GradientEndG"] : 0;
4788:      $GradientEndB  = isset($Format["GradientEndB"]) ? $Format["GradientEndB"] : 0;
4789:      $InnerSurrounding  = isset($Format["InnerSurrounding"]) ? $Format["InnerSurrounding"] : NULL;
4790:      $InnerBorderR  = isset($Format["InnerBorderR"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderR"] : -1;
4791:      $InnerBorderG  = isset($Format["InnerBorderG"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderG"] : -1;
4792:      $InnerBorderB  = isset($Format["InnerBorderB"]) ? $Format["InnerBorderB"] : -1;
4793:      $RecordImageMap    = isset($Format["RecordImageMap"]) ? $Format["RecordImageMap"] : FALSE;
4794:      $FontFactor    = isset($Format["FontFactor"]) ? $Format["FontFactor"] : 8;
4795: 
4796:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_STACKED;
4797: 
4798:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
4799:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
4800: 
4801:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
4802: 
4803:      $LastX = ""; $LastY = "";
4804:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
4805:       {
4806:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
4807:         {
4808:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
4809:          if ( $DisplayColor == DISPLAY_AUTO ) { $DisplayR = 255; $DisplayG = 255; $DisplayB = 255; }
4810:          if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
4811:          if ( $InnerSurrounding != NULL ) { $InnerBorderR = $R+$InnerSurrounding; $InnerBorderG = $G+$InnerSurrounding; $InnerBorderB = $B+$InnerSurrounding; }
4812:          if ( $InnerBorderR == -1 ) { $InnerColor = NULL; } else { $InnerColor = array("R"=>$InnerBorderR,"G"=>$InnerBorderG,"B"=>$InnerBorderB); }
4813: 
4814:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
4815:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
4816:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
4817:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
4818: 
4819:          if (isset($Serie["Description"])) { $SerieDescription = $Serie["Description"]; } else { $SerieDescription = $SerieName; }
4820: 
4821:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]),TRUE);
4822:          $YZero    = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
4823: 
4824:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
4825: 
4826:          $Color = array("TransCorner"=>TRUE,"R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"BorderR"=>$BorderR,"BorderG"=>$BorderG,"BorderB"=>$BorderB);
4827: 
4828:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
4829:           {
4830:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4831:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
4832: 
4833:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4834:            $X     = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
4835: 
4836:            $XSize   = ($XStep / (1+$Interleave) );
4837:            $XOffset = -($XSize/2);
4838: 
4839:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4840:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Height)
4841:             {
4842:              if ( $Height != VOID && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != 0 )
4843:               {
4844:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] > 0 ) { $Pos = "+"; } else { $Pos = "-"; }
4845: 
4846:                if ( !isset($LastY[$Key] ) ) { $LastY[$Key] = ""; }
4847:                if ( !isset($LastY[$Key][$Pos] ) ) { $LastY[$Key][$Pos] = $YZero; }
4848: 
4849:                $Y1 = $LastY[$Key][$Pos];
4850:                $Y2 = $Y1 - $Height;
4851: 
4852:                if ( ($Rounded || $BorderR != -1) && ($Pos == "+" && $Y1 != $YZero) ) { $YSpaceUp = 1; } else { $YSpaceUp = 0; }
4853:                if ( ($Rounded || $BorderR != -1) && ($Pos == "-" && $Y1 != $YZero) ) { $YSpaceDown = 1; } else { $YSpaceDown = 0; }
4854: 
4855:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X+$XOffset).",".floor($Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown).",".floor($X+$XOffset+$XSize).",".floor($Y2),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4856: 
4857:                if ( $Rounded )
4858:                 $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset,$Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$X+$XOffset+$XSize,$Y2,$RoundRadius,$Color);
4859:                else
4860:                 {
4861:                  $this->drawFilledRectangle($X+$XOffset,$Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$X+$XOffset+$XSize,$Y2,$Color);
4862: 
4863:                  if ( $InnerColor != NULL ) { $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow; $this->Shadow = FALSE; $this->drawRectangle(min($X+$XOffset+1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize),min($Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$Y2)+1,max($X+$XOffset+1,$X+$XOffset+$XSize)-1,max($Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$Y2)-1,$InnerColor); $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;}
4864: 
4865:                  if ( $Gradient )
4866:                   {
4867:                    $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
4868: 
4869:                    if ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_SIMPLE )
4870:                     {
4871:                      $GradientColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4872:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XOffset,$Y1-1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$X+$XOffset+$XSize,$Y2+1,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientColor);
4873:                     }
4874:                    elseif ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_EFFECT_CAN )
4875:                     {
4876:                      $GradientColor1 = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4877:                      $GradientColor2 = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4878:                      $XSpan = floor($XSize / 3);
4879: 
4880:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XOffset-.5,$Y1-.5-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$X+$XOffset+$XSpan,$Y2+.5,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradientColor1);
4881:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X+$XSpan+$XOffset-.5,$Y1-.5-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown,$X+$XOffset+$XSize,$Y2+.5,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradientColor2);
4882:                     }
4883:                    $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4884:                   }
4885:                 }
4886: 
4887:                if ( $DisplayValues )
4888:                 {
4889:                  $BarHeight = abs($Y2-$Y1)-2;
4890:                  $BarWidth  = $XSize+($XOffset/2)-$FontFactor;
4891: 
4892:                  $Caption   = $this->scaleFormat(round($Serie["Data"][$Key],$DisplayRound),$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
4893:                  $TxtPos    = $this->getTextBox(0,0,$DisplayFont,$DisplaySize,0,$Caption);
4894:                  $TxtHeight = abs($TxtPos[2]["Y"] - $TxtPos[0]["Y"]);
4895:                  $TxtWidth  = abs($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"]);
4896: 
4897:                  $XCenter = ( ($X+$XOffset+$XSize) - ($X+$XOffset) ) / 2 + $X+$XOffset;
4898:                  $YCenter = ( ($Y2) - ($Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown) ) / 2 + $Y1-$YSpaceUp+$YSpaceDown;
4899: 
4900:                  $Done = FALSE;
4901:                  if ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL || $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_AUTO )
4902:                   {
4903:                    if ( $TxtHeight < $BarHeight && $TxtWidth < $BarWidth  )
4904:                     {
4905:                      $this->drawText($XCenter,$YCenter,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize,"FontName"=>$DisplayFont));
4906:                      $Done = TRUE;
4907:                     }
4908:                   }
4909: 
4910:                  if ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_VERTICAL || ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_AUTO && !$Done) )
4911:                   {
4912:                    if ( $TxtHeight < $BarWidth && $TxtWidth < $BarHeight  )
4913:                     $this->drawText($XCenter,$YCenter,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Angle"=>90,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize,"FontName"=>$DisplayFont));
4914:                   }
4915:                 }
4916: 
4917:                $LastY[$Key][$Pos] = $Y2;
4918:               }
4919: 
4920:              $X = $X + $XStep;
4921:             }
4922:           }
4923:          else
4924:           {
4925:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
4926:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
4927: 
4928:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
4929:            $Y     = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
4930: 
4931:            $YSize   = $YStep / (1+$Interleave);
4932:            $YOffset = -($YSize/2);
4933: 
4934:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
4935:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Width)
4936:             {
4937:              if ( $Width != VOID && $Serie["Data"][$Key] != 0 )
4938:               {
4939:                if ( $Serie["Data"][$Key] > 0 ) { $Pos = "+"; } else { $Pos = "-"; }
4940: 
4941:                if ( !isset($LastX[$Key] ) ) { $LastX[$Key] = ""; }
4942:                if ( !isset($LastX[$Key][$Pos] ) ) { $LastX[$Key][$Pos] = $YZero; }
4943: 
4944:                $X1 = $LastX[$Key][$Pos];
4945:                $X2 = $X1 + $Width;
4946: 
4947:                if ( ($Rounded || $BorderR != -1) && ($Pos == "+" && $X1 != $YZero) ) { $XSpaceLeft = 2; } else { $XSpaceLeft = 0; }
4948:                if ( ($Rounded || $BorderR != -1) && ($Pos == "-" && $X1 != $YZero) ) { $XSpaceRight = 2; } else { $XSpaceRight = 0; }
4949: 
4950:                if ( $RecordImageMap ) { $this->addToImageMap("RECT",floor($X1+$XSpaceLeft).",".floor($Y+$YOffset).",".floor($X2-$XSpaceRight).",".floor($Y+$YOffset+$YSize),$this->toHTMLColor($R,$G,$B),$SerieDescription,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit)); }
4951: 
4952:                if ( $Rounded )
4953:                 $this->drawRoundedFilledRectangle($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$Y+$YOffset,$X2-$XSpaceRight,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize,$RoundRadius,$Color);
4954:                else
4955:                 {
4956:                  $this->drawFilledRectangle($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$Y+$YOffset,$X2-$XSpaceRight,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize,$Color);
4957: 
4958:                  if ( $InnerColor != NULL ) { $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow; $this->Shadow = FALSE; $this->drawRectangle(min($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$X2-$XSpaceRight)+1,min($Y+$YOffset,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize)+1,max($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$X2-$XSpaceRight)-1,max($Y+$YOffset,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize)-1,$InnerColor); $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;}
4959: 
4960:                  if ( $Gradient )
4961:                   {
4962:                    $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
4963: 
4964:                    if ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_SIMPLE )
4965:                     {
4966:                      $GradientColor = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4967:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$Y+$YOffset,$X2-$XSpaceRight,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradientColor);
4968:                     }
4969:                    elseif ( $GradientMode == GRADIENT_EFFECT_CAN )
4970:                     {
4971:                      $GradientColor1 = array("StartR"=>$GradientEndR,"StartG"=>$GradientEndG,"StartB"=>$GradientEndB,"EndR"=>$GradientStartR,"EndG"=>$GradientStartG,"EndB"=>$GradientStartB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4972:                      $GradientColor2 = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB,"Alpha"=>$GradientAlpha);
4973:                      $YSpan = floor($YSize / 3);
4974: 
4975:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$Y+$YOffset,$X2-$XSpaceRight,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpan,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientColor1);
4976:                      $this->drawGradientArea($X1+$XSpaceLeft,$Y+$YOffset+$YSpan,$X2-$XSpaceRight,$Y+$YOffset+$YSize,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientColor2);
4977:                     }
4978:                    $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
4979:                   }
4980:                 }
4981: 
4982:                if ( $DisplayValues )
4983:                 {
4984:                  $BarWidth = abs($X2-$X1)-$FontFactor;
4985:                  $BarHeight = $YSize+($YOffset/2)-$FontFactor/2;
4986:                  $Caption   = $this->scaleFormat(round($Serie["Data"][$Key],$DisplayRound),$Mode,$Format,$Unit);
4987:                  $TxtPos    = $this->getTextBox(0,0,$DisplayFont,$DisplaySize,0,$Caption);
4988:                  $TxtHeight = abs($TxtPos[2]["Y"] - $TxtPos[0]["Y"]);
4989:                  $TxtWidth  = abs($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"]);
4990: 
4991:                  $XCenter  = ( $X2 - $X1 ) / 2 + $X1;
4992:                  $YCenter  = ( ($Y+$YOffset+$YSize) - ($Y+$YOffset) ) / 2 + $Y+$YOffset;
4993: 
4994:                  $Done = FALSE;
4995:                  if ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL || $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_AUTO )
4996:                   {
4997:                    if ( $TxtHeight < $BarHeight && $TxtWidth < $BarWidth  )
4998:                     {
4999:                      $this->drawText($XCenter,$YCenter,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize,"FontName"=>$DisplayFont));
5000:                      $Done = TRUE;
5001:                     }
5002:                   }
5003: 
5004:                  if ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_VERTICAL || ( $DisplayOrientation == ORIENTATION_AUTO && !$Done) )
5005:                   {
5006:                    if ( $TxtHeight < $BarWidth && $TxtWidth < $BarHeight  )
5007:                     $this->drawText($XCenter,$YCenter,$this->scaleFormat($Serie["Data"][$Key],$Mode,$Format,$Unit),array("R"=>$DisplayR,"G"=>$DisplayG,"B"=>$DisplayB,"Angle"=>90,"Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_MIDDLEMIDDLE,"FontSize"=>$DisplaySize,"FontName"=>$DisplayFont));
5008:                   }
5009:                 }
5010: 
5011:                $LastX[$Key][$Pos] = $X2;
5012:               }
5013: 
5014:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
5015:             }
5016:           }
5017:         }
5018:       }
5019:     }
5020: 
5021:    /* Draw a stacked area chart */
5022:    function drawStackedAreaChart($Format=NULL)
5023:     {
5024:      $DrawLine      = isset($Format["DrawLine"]) ? $Format["DrawLine"] : FALSE;
5025:      $LineSurrounding   = isset($Format["LineSurrounding"]) ? $Format["LineSurrounding"] : NULL;
5026:      $LineR     = isset($Format["LineR"]) ? $Format["LineR"] : VOID;
5027:      $LineG     = isset($Format["LineG"]) ? $Format["LineG"] : VOID;
5028:      $LineB     = isset($Format["LineB"]) ? $Format["LineB"] : VOID;
5029:      $LineAlpha     = isset($Format["LineAlpha"]) ? $Format["LineAlpha"] : 100;
5030:      $DrawPlot      = isset($Format["DrawPlot"]) ? $Format["DrawPlot"] : FALSE;
5031:      $PlotRadius    = isset($Format["PlotRadius"]) ? $Format["PlotRadius"] : 2;
5032:      $PlotBorder    = isset($Format["PlotBorder"]) ? $Format["PlotBorder"] : 1;
5033:      $PlotBorderSurrounding = isset($Format["PlotBorderSurrounding"]) ? $Format["PlotBorderSurrounding"] : NULL;
5034:      $PlotBorderR   = isset($Format["PlotBorderR"]) ? $Format["PlotBorderR"] : 0;
5035:      $PlotBorderG   = isset($Format["PlotBorderG"]) ? $Format["PlotBorderG"] : 0;
5036:      $PlotBorderB   = isset($Format["PlotBorderB"]) ? $Format["PlotBorderB"] : 0;
5037:      $PlotBorderAlpha   = isset($Format["PlotBorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["PlotBorderAlpha"] : 50;
5038:      $ForceTransparency = isset($Format["ForceTransparency"]) ? $Format["ForceTransparency"] : NULL;
5039: 
5040:      $this->LastChartLayout = CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_STACKED;
5041: 
5042:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
5043:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
5044: 
5045:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
5046:      $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
5047: 
5048:      /* Build the offset data series */
5049:      $OffsetData    = "";
5050:      $OverallOffset = "";
5051:      $SerieOrder    = "";
5052:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
5053:       {
5054:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
5055:         {
5056:          $SerieOrder[] = $SerieName;
5057: 
5058:          foreach($Serie["Data"] as $Key => $Value)
5059:           {
5060:            if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Value = 0; }
5061:            if ($Value >= 0) { $Sign = "+"; } else { $Sign = "-"; }
5062:            if ( !isset($OverallOffset[$Key]) || !isset($OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign]) ) { $OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign] = 0; }
5063: 
5064:            if ( $Sign == "+" )
5065:             { $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Key] = $Value + $OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign]; }
5066:            else
5067:             { $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Key] = $Value - $OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign]; }
5068: 
5069:            $OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign] = $OverallOffset[$Key][$Sign] + abs($Value);
5070:           }
5071:         } 
5072:       }
5073:      $SerieOrder = array_reverse($SerieOrder);
5074: 
5075:      $LastX = ""; $LastY = "";
5076:      foreach($SerieOrder as $Key => $SerieName)
5077:       {
5078:        $Serie = $Data["Series"][$SerieName];
5079:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
5080:         {
5081:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"];
5082:          if ( $ForceTransparency != NULL ) { $Alpha = $ForceTransparency; }
5083: 
5084:          $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
5085: 
5086:          if ( $LineSurrounding != NULL )
5087:           $LineColor = array("R"=>$R+$LineSurrounding,"G"=>$G+$LineSurrounding,"B"=>$B+$LineSurrounding,"Alpha"=>$Alpha);
5088:          elseif ( $LineR != VOID )
5089:           $LineColor = array("R"=>$LineR,"G"=>$LineG,"B"=>$LineB,"Alpha"=>$LineAlpha);
5090:          else
5091:           $LineColor = $Color;
5092: 
5093:          if ( $PlotBorderSurrounding != NULL )
5094:           $PlotBorderColor = array("R"=>$R+$PlotBorderSurrounding,"G"=>$G+$PlotBorderSurrounding,"B"=>$B+$PlotBorderSurrounding,"Alpha"=>$PlotBorderAlpha);
5095:          else
5096:           $PlotBorderColor = array("R"=>$PlotBorderR,"G"=>$PlotBorderG,"B"=>$PlotBorderB,"Alpha"=>$PlotBorderAlpha);
5097: 
5098:          $AxisID    = $Serie["Axis"];
5099:          $Mode      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
5100:          $Format    = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
5101:          $Unit      = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
5102: 
5103:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]),TRUE);
5104:          $YZero    = $this->scaleComputeY(0,array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
5105: 
5106:          $this->DataSet->Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"] = 0;
5107: 
5108:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
5109:           {
5110:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaY1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY1+1; }
5111:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaY2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaY2-1; }
5112: 
5113:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5114:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
5115: 
5116:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5117: 
5118:            $Plots = ""; $Plots[] = $X; $Plots[] = $YZero;
5119:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Height)
5120:             {
5121:              if ( $Height != VOID ) { $Plots[] = $X; $Plots[] = $YZero-$Height; }
5122:              $X = $X + $XStep;
5123:             }
5124:            $Plots[] = $X-$XStep; $Plots[] = $YZero;
5125: 
5126:            $this->drawPolygon($Plots,$Color);
5127: 
5128:            $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
5129:            if ( $DrawLine ) { for($i=2; $i<=count($Plots)-6; $i=$i+2) { $this->drawLine($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$Plots[$i+2],$Plots[$i+3],$LineColor); } }
5130:            if ( $DrawPlot )
5131:             {
5132:              for($i=2; $i<=count($Plots)-4; $i=$i+2)
5133:               {
5134:                if ( $PlotBorder != 0 )
5135:                 { $this->drawFilledCircle($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$PlotRadius+$PlotBorder,$PlotBorderColor); }
5136: 
5137:                $this->drawFilledCircle($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$PlotRadius,$Color);
5138:               }
5139:             }
5140:            $this->Shadow = FALSE;
5141:           }
5142:          elseif ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_TOPBOTTOM )
5143:           {
5144:            if ( $YZero < $this->GraphAreaX1+1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX1+1; }
5145:            if ( $YZero > $this->GraphAreaX2-1 ) { $YZero = $this->GraphAreaX2-1; }
5146: 
5147:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5148:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
5149: 
5150:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5151: 
5152:            $Plots = ""; $Plots[] = $YZero; $Plots[] = $Y;
5153:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Height)
5154:             {
5155:              if ( $Height != VOID ) { $Plots[] = $YZero+$Height; $Plots[] = $Y; }
5156:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
5157:             }
5158:            $Plots[] = $YZero; $Plots[] = $Y-$YStep;
5159: 
5160:            $this->drawPolygon($Plots,$Color);
5161: 
5162:            $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
5163:            if ( $DrawLine ) { for($i=2; $i<=count($Plots)-6; $i=$i+2) { $this->drawLine($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$Plots[$i+2],$Plots[$i+3],$LineColor); } }
5164:            if ( $DrawPlot )
5165:             {
5166:              for($i=2; $i<=count($Plots)-4; $i=$i+2)
5167:               {
5168:                if ( $PlotBorder != 0 )
5169:                 { $this->drawFilledCircle($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$PlotRadius+$PlotBorder,$PlotBorderColor); }
5170: 
5171:                $this->drawFilledCircle($Plots[$i],$Plots[$i+1],$PlotRadius,$Color);
5172:               }
5173:             }
5174:            $this->Shadow = FALSE;
5175:           }
5176:         }
5177:       }
5178:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
5179:     }
5180: 
5181:    /* Returns a random color */
5182:    function getRandomColor($Alpha=100)
5183:     { return(array("R"=>rand(0,255),"G"=>rand(0,255),"B"=>rand(0,255),"Alpha"=>$Alpha)); }
5184:  
5185:    /* Validate a palette */
5186:    function validatePalette($Colors,$Surrounding=NULL)
5187:     {
5188:      $Result = "";
5189: 
5190:      if ( !is_array($Colors) ) { return($this->getRandomColor()); }
5191: 
5192:      foreach($Colors as $Key => $Values)
5193:       {
5194:        if ( isset($Values["R"]) ) { $Result[$Key]["R"] = $Values["R"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["R"] = rand(0,255); }
5195:        if ( isset($Values["G"]) ) { $Result[$Key]["G"] = $Values["G"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["G"] = rand(0,255); }
5196:        if ( isset($Values["B"]) ) { $Result[$Key]["B"] = $Values["B"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["B"] = rand(0,255); }
5197:        if ( isset($Values["Alpha"]) ) { $Result[$Key]["Alpha"] = $Values["Alpha"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["Alpha"] = 100; }
5198: 
5199:        if ( $Surrounding != NULL )
5200:         {
5201:          $Result[$Key]["BorderR"] = $Result[$Key]["R"] + $Surrounding;
5202:          $Result[$Key]["BorderG"] = $Result[$Key]["G"] + $Surrounding;
5203:          $Result[$Key]["BorderB"] = $Result[$Key]["B"] + $Surrounding;
5204:         }
5205:        else
5206:         {
5207:          if ( isset($Values["BorderR"]) )     { $Result[$Key]["BorderR"] = $Values["BorderR"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["BorderR"] = $Result[$Key]["R"]; }
5208:          if ( isset($Values["BorderG"]) )     { $Result[$Key]["BorderG"] = $Values["BorderG"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["BorderG"] = $Result[$Key]["G"]; }
5209:          if ( isset($Values["BorderB"]) )     { $Result[$Key]["BorderB"] = $Values["BorderB"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["BorderB"] = $Result[$Key]["B"]; }
5210:          if ( isset($Values["BorderAlpha"]) ) { $Result[$Key]["BorderAlpha"] = $Values["BorderAlpha"]; } else { $Result[$Key]["BorderAlpha"] = $Result[$Key]["Alpha"]; }
5211:         }
5212:       }
5213: 
5214:      return($Result);
5215:     }
5216: 
5217:    /* Draw the derivative chart associated to the data series */
5218:    function drawDerivative($Format=NULL)
5219:     {
5220:      $Offset        = isset($Format["Offset"]) ? $Format["Offset"] : 10;
5221:      $SerieSpacing  = isset($Format["SerieSpacing"]) ? $Format["SerieSpacing"] : 3;
5222:      $DerivativeHeight  = isset($Format["DerivativeHeight"]) ? $Format["DerivativeHeight"] : 4;
5223:      $ShadedSlopeBox    = isset($Format["ShadedSlopeBox"]) ? $Format["ShadedSlopeBox"] : FALSE;
5224:      $DrawBackground    = isset($Format["DrawBackground"]) ? $Format["DrawBackground"] : TRUE;
5225:      $BackgroundR   = isset($Format["BackgroundR"]) ? $Format["BackgroundR"] : 255;
5226:      $BackgroundG   = isset($Format["BackgroundG"]) ? $Format["BackgroundG"] : 255;
5227:      $BackgroundB   = isset($Format["BackgroundB"]) ? $Format["BackgroundB"] : 255;
5228:      $BackgroundAlpha   = isset($Format["BackgroundAlpha"]) ? $Format["BackgroundAlpha"] : 20;
5229:      $DrawBorder    = isset($Format["DrawBorder"]) ? $Format["DrawBorder"] : TRUE;
5230:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : 0;
5231:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : 0;
5232:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : 0;
5233:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : 100;
5234:      $Caption       = isset($Format["Caption"]) ? $Format["Caption"] : TRUE;
5235:      $CaptionHeight = isset($Format["CaptionHeight"]) ? $Format["CaptionHeight"] : 10;
5236:      $CaptionWidth  = isset($Format["CaptionWidth"]) ? $Format["CaptionWidth"] : 20;
5237:      $CaptionMargin = isset($Format["CaptionMargin"]) ? $Format["CaptionMargin"] : 4;
5238:      $CaptionLine   = isset($Format["CaptionLine"]) ? $Format["CaptionLine"] : FALSE;
5239:      $CaptionBox    = isset($Format["CaptionBox"]) ? $Format["CaptionBox"] : FALSE;
5240:      $CaptionBorderR    = isset($Format["CaptionBorderR"]) ? $Format["CaptionBorderR"] : 0;
5241:      $CaptionBorderG    = isset($Format["CaptionBorderG"]) ? $Format["CaptionBorderG"] : 0;
5242:      $CaptionBorderB    = isset($Format["CaptionBorderB"]) ? $Format["CaptionBorderB"] : 0;
5243:      $CaptionFillR  = isset($Format["CaptionFillR"]) ? $Format["CaptionFillR"] : 255;
5244:      $CaptionFillG  = isset($Format["CaptionFillG"]) ? $Format["CaptionFillG"] : 255;
5245:      $CaptionFillB  = isset($Format["CaptionFillB"]) ? $Format["CaptionFillB"] : 255;
5246:      $CaptionFillAlpha  = isset($Format["CaptionFillAlpha"]) ? $Format["CaptionFillAlpha"] : 80;
5247:      $PositiveSlopeStartR   = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartR"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartR"] : 184;
5248:      $PositiveSlopeStartG   = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartG"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartG"] : 234;
5249:      $PositiveSlopeStartB   = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartB"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartB"] : 88;
5250:      $PositiveSlopeEndR     = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartR"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartR"] : 239;
5251:      $PositiveSlopeEndG     = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartG"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartG"] : 31;
5252:      $PositiveSlopeEndB     = isset($Format["PositiveSlopeStartB"]) ? $Format["PositiveSlopeStartB"] : 36;
5253:      $NegativeSlopeStartR   = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartR"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartR"] : 184;
5254:      $NegativeSlopeStartG   = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartG"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartG"] : 234;
5255:      $NegativeSlopeStartB   = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartB"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartB"] : 88;
5256:      $NegativeSlopeEndR     = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartR"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartR"] : 67;
5257:      $NegativeSlopeEndG     = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartG"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartG"] : 124;
5258:      $NegativeSlopeEndB     = isset($Format["NegativeSlopeStartB"]) ? $Format["NegativeSlopeStartB"] : 227;
5259: 
5260:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
5261: 
5262:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
5263: 
5264:      if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
5265:       $YPos = $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["Y2"] + $Offset;
5266:      else
5267:       $XPos = $this->DataSet->Data["GraphArea"]["X2"] + $Offset;
5268: 
5269:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
5270:       {
5271:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
5272:         {
5273:          $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; $Weight = $Serie["Weight"];
5274: 
5275:          $AxisID   = $Serie["Axis"];
5276:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
5277: 
5278:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
5279:           {
5280:            if ( $Caption )
5281:             {
5282:              if ( $CaptionLine ) 
5283:               {
5284:                $StartX = floor($this->GraphAreaX1-$CaptionWidth+$XMargin-$CaptionMargin);
5285:                $EndX   = floor($this->GraphAreaX1-$CaptionMargin+$XMargin);
5286: 
5287:                $CaptionSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
5288:                if ( $CaptionBox ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($StartX,$YPos,$EndX,$YPos+$CaptionHeight,array("R"=>$CaptionFillR,"G"=>$CaptionFillG,"B"=>$CaptionFillB,"BorderR"=>$CaptionBorderR,"BorderG"=>$CaptionBorderG,"BorderB"=>$CaptionBorderB,"Alpha"=>$CaptionFillAlpha)); }
5289:                $this->drawLine($StartX+2,$YPos+($CaptionHeight/2),$EndX-2,$YPos+($CaptionHeight/2),$CaptionSettings);
5290:               }
5291:              else
5292:               $this->drawFilledRectangle($this->GraphAreaX1-$CaptionWidth+$XMargin-$CaptionMargin,$YPos,$this->GraphAreaX1-$CaptionMargin+$XMargin,$YPos+$CaptionHeight,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"BorderR"=>$CaptionBorderR,"BorderG"=>$CaptionBorderG,"BorderB"=>$CaptionBorderB));
5293:             }
5294: 
5295:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5296:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
5297: 
5298:            $TopY    = $YPos + ($CaptionHeight/2) - ($DerivativeHeight/2);
5299:            $BottomY = $YPos + ($CaptionHeight/2) + ($DerivativeHeight/2);
5300: 
5301:            $StartX  = floor($this->GraphAreaX1+$XMargin);
5302:            $EndX    = floor($this->GraphAreaX2-$XMargin);
5303: 
5304:            if ( $DrawBackground ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($StartX-1,$TopY-1,$EndX+1,$BottomY+1,array("R"=>$BackgroundR,"G"=>$BackgroundG,"B"=>$BackgroundB,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha)); }
5305:            if ( $DrawBorder ) { $this->drawRectangle($StartX-1,$TopY-1,$EndX+1,$BottomY+1,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha)); }
5306: 
5307:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5308: 
5309:            $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
5310:            $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
5311: 
5312:            /* Determine the Max slope index */
5313:            $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; $MinSlope = 0; $MaxSlope = 1;
5314:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
5315:             {
5316:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastX != NULL )
5317:               { $Slope = ($LastY - $Y); if ( $Slope > $MaxSlope ) { $MaxSlope = $Slope; } if ( $Slope < $MinSlope ) { $MinSlope = $Slope; } }
5318: 
5319:              if ( $Y == VOID )
5320:               { $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; }
5321:              else
5322:               { $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y; }
5323:             }
5324: 
5325:            $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; $LastColor = NULL;
5326:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
5327:             {
5328:              if ( $Y != VOID && $LastY != NULL )
5329:               {
5330:                $Slope = ($LastY - $Y);
5331: 
5332:                if ( $Slope >= 0 )
5333:                 {
5334:                  $SlopeIndex = (100 / $MaxSlope) * $Slope;
5335:                  $R = (($PositiveSlopeEndR - $PositiveSlopeStartR)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartR;
5336:                  $G = (($PositiveSlopeEndG - $PositiveSlopeStartG)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartG;
5337:                  $B = (($PositiveSlopeEndB - $PositiveSlopeStartB)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartB;
5338:                 }
5339:                elseif ( $Slope < 0 )
5340:                 {
5341:                  $SlopeIndex = (100 / abs($MinSlope)) * abs($Slope);
5342:                  $R = (($NegativeSlopeEndR - $NegativeSlopeStartR)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartR;
5343:                  $G = (($NegativeSlopeEndG - $NegativeSlopeStartG)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartG;
5344:                  $B = (($NegativeSlopeEndB - $NegativeSlopeStartB)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartB;
5345:                 }
5346: 
5347:                $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B);
5348: 
5349:                if ( $ShadedSlopeBox && $LastColor != NULL ) // && $Slope != 0
5350:                 {
5351:                  $GradientSettings = array("StartR"=>$LastColor["R"],"StartG"=>$LastColor["G"],"StartB"=>$LastColor["B"],"EndR"=>$R,"EndG"=>$G,"EndB"=>$B);
5352:                  $this->drawGradientArea($LastX,$TopY,$X,$BottomY,DIRECTION_HORIZONTAL,$GradientSettings);
5353:                 }
5354:                elseif ( !$ShadedSlopeBox || $LastColor == NULL ) // || $Slope == 0
5355:                 $this->drawFilledRectangle(floor($LastX),$TopY,floor($X),$BottomY,$Color);
5356: 
5357:                $LastColor = $Color;
5358:               }
5359: 
5360:              if ( $Y == VOID )
5361:               { $LastY = NULL; }
5362:              else
5363:               { $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y; }
5364: 
5365:              $X = $X + $XStep;
5366:             }
5367: 
5368:            $YPos = $YPos + $CaptionHeight + $SerieSpacing;
5369:           }
5370:          else
5371:           {
5372:            if ( $Caption )
5373:             {
5374:              $StartY = floor($this->GraphAreaY1-$CaptionWidth+$XMargin-$CaptionMargin);
5375:              $EndY   = floor($this->GraphAreaY1-$CaptionMargin+$XMargin);
5376:              if ( $CaptionLine ) 
5377:               {
5378:                $CaptionSettings = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks,"Weight"=>$Weight);
5379:                if ( $CaptionBox ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($XPos,$StartY,$XPos+$CaptionHeight,$EndY,array("R"=>$CaptionFillR,"G"=>$CaptionFillG,"B"=>$CaptionFillB,"BorderR"=>$CaptionBorderR,"BorderG"=>$CaptionBorderG,"BorderB"=>$CaptionBorderB,"Alpha"=>$CaptionFillAlpha)); }
5380:                $this->drawLine($XPos+($CaptionHeight/2),$StartY+2,$XPos+($CaptionHeight/2),$EndY-2,$CaptionSettings);
5381:               }
5382:              else
5383:               $this->drawFilledRectangle($XPos,$StartY,$XPos+$CaptionHeight,$EndY,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"BorderR"=>$CaptionBorderR,"BorderG"=>$CaptionBorderG,"BorderB"=>$CaptionBorderB));
5384:             }
5385: 
5386: 
5387:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5388:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
5389: 
5390:            $TopX    = $XPos + ($CaptionHeight/2) - ($DerivativeHeight/2);
5391:            $BottomX = $XPos + ($CaptionHeight/2) + ($DerivativeHeight/2);
5392: 
5393:            $StartY  = floor($this->GraphAreaY1+$XMargin);
5394:            $EndY    = floor($this->GraphAreaY2-$XMargin);
5395: 
5396:            if ( $DrawBackground ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($TopX-1,$StartY-1,$BottomX+1,$EndY+1,array("R"=>$BackgroundR,"G"=>$BackgroundG,"B"=>$BackgroundB,"Alpha"=>$BackgroundAlpha)); }
5397:            if ( $DrawBorder ) { $this->drawRectangle($TopX-1,$StartY-1,$BottomX+1,$EndY+1,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha)); }
5398: 
5399:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5400: 
5401:            $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
5402:            $this->Shadow  = FALSE;
5403: 
5404:            /* Determine the Max slope index */
5405:            $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; $MinSlope = 0; $MaxSlope = 1;
5406:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
5407:             {
5408:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX != NULL )
5409:               { $Slope = ($X - $LastX); if ( $Slope > $MaxSlope ) { $MaxSlope = $Slope; } if ( $Slope < $MinSlope ) { $MinSlope = $Slope; } }
5410: 
5411:              if ( $X == VOID )
5412:               { $LastX = NULL; }
5413:              else
5414:               { $LastX = $X; }
5415:             }
5416: 
5417:            $LastX = NULL; $LastY = NULL; $LastColor = NULL;
5418:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
5419:             {
5420:              if ( $X != VOID && $LastX != NULL )
5421:               {
5422:                $Slope = ($X - $LastX);
5423: 
5424:                if ( $Slope >= 0 )
5425:                 {
5426:                  $SlopeIndex = (100 / $MaxSlope) * $Slope;
5427:                  $R = (($PositiveSlopeEndR - $PositiveSlopeStartR)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartR;
5428:                  $G = (($PositiveSlopeEndG - $PositiveSlopeStartG)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartG;
5429:                  $B = (($PositiveSlopeEndB - $PositiveSlopeStartB)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$PositiveSlopeStartB;
5430:                 }
5431:                elseif ( $Slope < 0 )
5432:                 {
5433:                  $SlopeIndex = (100 / abs($MinSlope)) * abs($Slope);
5434:                  $R = (($NegativeSlopeEndR - $NegativeSlopeStartR)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartR;
5435:                  $G = (($NegativeSlopeEndG - $NegativeSlopeStartG)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartG;
5436:                  $B = (($NegativeSlopeEndB - $NegativeSlopeStartB)/100)*$SlopeIndex+$NegativeSlopeStartB;
5437:                 }
5438: 
5439:                $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B);
5440: 
5441:                if ( $ShadedSlopeBox && $LastColor != NULL )
5442:                 {
5443:                  $GradientSettings = array("StartR"=>$LastColor["R"],"StartG"=>$LastColor["G"],"StartB"=>$LastColor["B"],"EndR"=>$R,"EndG"=>$G,"EndB"=>$B);
5444: 
5445:                  $this->drawGradientArea($TopX,$LastY,$BottomX,$Y,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientSettings);
5446:                 }
5447:                elseif ( !$ShadedSlopeBox || $LastColor == NULL ) 
5448:                 $this->drawFilledRectangle($TopX,floor($LastY),$BottomX,floor($Y),$Color);
5449: 
5450:                $LastColor = $Color;
5451:               }
5452: 
5453:              if ( $X == VOID )
5454:               { $LastX = NULL; }
5455:              else
5456:               { $LastX = $X; $LastY = $Y; }
5457: 
5458:              $Y = $Y + $XStep;
5459:             }
5460: 
5461:            $XPos = $XPos + $CaptionHeight + $SerieSpacing;
5462:           }
5463: 
5464:          $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
5465:         }
5466:       }
5467:     }
5468: 
5469:    /* Draw the line of best fit */
5470:    function drawBestFit($Format="")
5471:     {
5472:      $OverrideTicks = isset($Format["Ticks"]) ? $Format["Ticks"] : NULL;
5473:      $OverrideR     = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : VOID;
5474:      $OverrideG     = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : VOID;
5475:      $OverrideB     = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : VOID;
5476:      $OverrideAlpha = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : VOID;
5477: 
5478:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
5479:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
5480: 
5481:      foreach($Data["Series"] as $SerieName => $Serie)
5482:       {
5483:        if ( $Serie["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $SerieName != $Data["Abscissa"] )
5484:         {
5485:          if ( $OverrideR != VOID && $OverrideG != VOID && $OverrideB != VOID ) { $R = $OverrideR; $G = $OverrideG; $B = $OverrideB; } else { $R = $Serie["Color"]["R"]; $G = $Serie["Color"]["G"]; $B = $Serie["Color"]["B"]; }
5486:          if ( $OverrideTicks == NULL ) { $Ticks = $Serie["Ticks"]; } else { $Ticks = $OverrideTicks; }
5487:          if ( $OverrideAlpha == VOID ) { $Alpha = $Serie["Color"]["Alpha"]; } else { $Alpha = $OverrideAlpha; }
5488: 
5489:          $Color = array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha,"Ticks"=>$Ticks);
5490: 
5491:          $AxisID   = $Serie["Axis"];
5492:          $PosArray = $this->scaleComputeY($Serie["Data"],array("AxisID"=>$Serie["Axis"]));
5493: 
5494:          if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
5495:           {
5496:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5497:            $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
5498: 
5499:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5500:            $Sxy = 0; $Sx = 0; $Sy = 0; $Sxx = 0;
5501:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $Y)
5502:             {
5503:              if ( $Y != VOID )
5504:               {
5505:                $Sxy = $Sxy + $X*$Y;
5506:                $Sx  = $Sx + $X;
5507:                $Sy  = $Sy + $Y;
5508:                $Sxx = $Sxx + $X*$X;
5509:               }
5510: 
5511:              $X = $X + $XStep;
5512:             }
5513:            $n = count($this->DataSet->stripVOID($PosArray)); //$n = count($PosArray);
5514:            $M = (($n*$Sxy)-($Sx*$Sy)) / (($n*$Sxx)-($Sx*$Sx));
5515:            $B = (($Sy)-($M*$Sx))/($n);
5516: 
5517:            $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin;
5518:            $Y1 = $M * $X1 + $B;
5519:            $X2 = $this->GraphAreaX2 - $XMargin;
5520:            $Y2 = $M * $X2 + $B;
5521: 
5522:            if ( $Y1 < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $X1 = $X1 + ($this->GraphAreaY1-$Y1); $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY1; }
5523:            if ( $Y1 > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $X1 = $X1 + ($Y1-$this->GraphAreaY2); $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY2; }
5524:            if ( $Y2 < $this->GraphAreaY1 ) { $X2 = $X2 - ($this->GraphAreaY1-$Y2); $Y2 = $this->GraphAreaY1; }
5525:            if ( $Y2 > $this->GraphAreaY2 ) { $X2 = $X2 - ($Y2-$this->GraphAreaY2); $Y2 = $this->GraphAreaY2; }
5526: 
5527:            $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
5528:           }
5529:          else
5530:           {
5531:            if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $YStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5532:            $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
5533: 
5534:            if ( !is_array($PosArray) ) { $Value = $PosArray; $PosArray = ""; $PosArray[0] = $Value; }
5535:            $Sxy = 0; $Sx = 0; $Sy = 0; $Sxx = 0;
5536:            foreach($PosArray as $Key => $X)
5537:             {
5538:              if ( $X != VOID )
5539:               {
5540:                $Sxy = $Sxy + $X*$Y;
5541:                $Sx  = $Sx + $Y;
5542:                $Sy  = $Sy + $X;
5543:                $Sxx = $Sxx + $Y*$Y;
5544:               }
5545: 
5546:              $Y = $Y + $YStep;
5547:             }
5548:            $n = count($this->DataSet->stripVOID($PosArray)); //$n = count($PosArray);
5549:            $M = (($n*$Sxy)-($Sx*$Sy)) / (($n*$Sxx)-($Sx*$Sx));
5550:            $B = (($Sy)-($M*$Sx))/($n);
5551: 
5552:            $Y1 = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin;
5553:            $X1 = $M * $Y1 + $B;
5554:            $Y2 = $this->GraphAreaY2 - $XMargin;
5555:            $X2 = $M * $Y2 + $B;
5556: 
5557:            if ( $X1 < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $Y1 = $Y1 + ($this->GraphAreaX1-$X1); $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX1; }
5558:            if ( $X1 > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $Y1 = $Y1 + ($X1-$this->GraphAreaX2); $X1 = $this->GraphAreaX2; }
5559:            if ( $X2 < $this->GraphAreaX1 ) { $Y2 = $Y2 - ($this->GraphAreaY1-$X2); $X2 = $this->GraphAreaX1; }
5560:            if ( $X2 > $this->GraphAreaX2 ) { $Y2 = $Y2 - ($X2-$this->GraphAreaX2); $X2 = $this->GraphAreaX2; }
5561: 
5562:            $this->drawLine($X1,$Y1,$X2,$Y2,$Color);
5563:           }
5564:         }
5565:       }
5566:     }
5567: 
5568:    /* Write labels */
5569:    function writeLabel($SeriesName,$Indexes,$Format="")
5570:     {
5571:      $OverrideTitle = isset($Format["OverrideTitle"]) ? $Format["OverrideTitle"] : NULL;
5572:      $ForceLabels   = isset($Format["ForceLabels"]) ? $Format["ForceLabels"] : NULL;
5573:      $DrawPoint     = isset($Format["DrawPoint"]) ? $Format["DrawPoint"] : LABEL_POINT_BOX;
5574:      $DrawVerticalLine  = isset($Format["DrawVerticalLine"]) ? $Format["DrawVerticalLine"] : FALSE;
5575:      $VerticalLineR = isset($Format["VerticalLineR"]) ? $Format["VerticalLineR"] : 0;
5576:      $VerticalLineG = isset($Format["VerticalLineG"]) ? $Format["VerticalLineG"] : 0;
5577:      $VerticalLineB = isset($Format["VerticalLineB"]) ? $Format["VerticalLineB"] : 0;
5578:      $VerticalLineAlpha = isset($Format["VerticalLineAlpha"]) ? $Format["VerticalLineAlpha"] : 40;
5579:      $VerticalLineTicks = isset($Format["VerticalLineTicks"]) ? $Format["VerticalLineTicks"] : 2;
5580: 
5581:      $Data = $this->DataSet->getData();
5582:      list($XMargin,$XDivs) = $this->scaleGetXSettings();
5583: 
5584:      if ( !is_array($Indexes) )    { $Index = $Indexes; $Indexes = ""; $Indexes[] = $Index; }
5585:      if ( !is_array($SeriesName) ) { $SerieName = $SeriesName; $SeriesName = ""; $SeriesName[] = $SerieName; }
5586:      if ( $ForceLabels != NULL && !is_array($ForceLabels) ) { $ForceLabel = $ForceLabels; $ForceLabels = ""; $ForceLabels[] = $ForceLabel; }
5587: 
5588:      foreach ($Indexes as $Key => $Index)
5589:       {
5590:        $Series = "";
5591: 
5592:        if ( $Data["Orientation"] == SCALE_POS_LEFTRIGHT )
5593:         {
5594:          if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaX2-$this->GraphAreaX1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5595:          $X = $this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin + $Index * $XStep;
5596: 
5597:          if ( $DrawVerticalLine ) { $this->drawLine($X,$this->GraphAreaY1+$Data["YMargin"],$X,$this->GraphAreaY2-$Data["YMargin"],array("R"=>$VerticalLineR,"G"=>$VerticalLineG,"B"=>$VerticalLineB,"Alpha"=>$VerticalLineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$VerticalLineTicks)); }
5598: 
5599:          $MinY = $this->GraphAreaY2;
5600:          foreach ($SeriesName as $iKey => $SerieName)
5601:           {
5602:            if ( isset($Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Index]) )
5603:             {
5604:              $AxisID      = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Axis"];
5605: 
5606:              if ( $OverrideTitle != NULL)
5607:               $Description = $OverrideTitle;
5608:              elseif ( count($SeriesName) == 1 )
5609:               {
5610:                if ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) && isset($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index]) )
5611:                 $Description = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Description"]." - ".$Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index];
5612:                else
5613:                 $Description = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Description"];
5614:               }
5615:              elseif ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) && isset($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index]) )
5616:               $Description = $Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index];
5617: 
5618:              $AxisMode     = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
5619:              $AxisFormat   = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
5620:              $AxisUnit     = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
5621: 
5622:              $Serie = "";
5623:              $Serie["R"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["R"];
5624:              $Serie["G"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["G"];
5625:              $Serie["B"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["B"];
5626:              $Serie["Alpha"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["Alpha"];
5627: 
5628:              if ( count($SeriesName) == 1 && isset($Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"]) )
5629:               $SerieOffset = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"];
5630:              else
5631:               $SerieOffset = 0;
5632: 
5633:              $Value = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Index];
5634:              if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Value = "NaN"; }
5635: 
5636:              if ( $ForceLabels != NULL )
5637:               $Caption = isset($ForceLabels[$Key]) ? $ForceLabels[$Key] : "Not set";
5638:              else
5639:               $Caption = $this->scaleFormat($Value,$AxisMode,$AxisFormat,$AxisUnit);
5640: 
5641:              if ( $this->LastChartLayout == CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_STACKED )
5642:               {
5643:                if ( $Value >=0 ) { $LookFor = "+"; } else { $LookFor = "-"; }
5644: 
5645:                $Value = 0; $Done = FALSE;
5646:                foreach($Data["Series"] as $Name => $SerieLookup)
5647:                 {
5648:                  if ( $SerieLookup["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $Name != $Data["Abscissa"] && !$Done )
5649:                   {
5650:                    if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]) && $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] != VOID )
5651:                     {
5652:                      if ($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] >= 0 && $LookFor == "+" ) { $Value = $Value + $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]; }
5653:                      if ($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] < 0 && $LookFor == "-" )  { $Value = $Value - $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]; }
5654:                      if ($Name == $SerieName ) { $Done = TRUE; }
5655:                     }
5656:                   }
5657:                 }
5658:               }
5659: 
5660:              $X = floor($this->GraphAreaX1 + $XMargin + $Index * $XStep + $SerieOffset);
5661:              $Y = floor($this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID)));
5662: 
5663:              if ($Y < $MinY) { $MinY = $Y; }
5664: 
5665:              if ( $DrawPoint == LABEL_POINT_CIRCLE )
5666:               $this->drawFilledCircle($X,$Y,3,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"BorderR"=>0,"BorderG"=>0,"BorderB"=>0));
5667:              elseif ( $DrawPoint == LABEL_POINT_BOX )
