5668:               $this->drawFilledRectangle($X-2,$Y-2,$X+2,$Y+2,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"BorderR"=>0,"BorderG"=>0,"BorderB"=>0));
5669: 
5670:              $Series[] = array("Format"=>$Serie,"Caption"=>$Caption);
5671:             }
5672:           }
5673:          $this->drawLabelBox($X,$MinY-3,$Description,$Series,$Format);
5674: 
5675:         }
5676:        else
5677:         {
5678:          if ( $XDivs == 0 ) { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1)/4; } else { $XStep = ($this->GraphAreaY2-$this->GraphAreaY1-$XMargin*2)/$XDivs; }
5679:          $Y = $this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin + $Index * $XStep;
5680: 
5681:          if ( $DrawVerticalLine ) { $this->drawLine($this->GraphAreaX1+$Data["YMargin"],$Y,$this->GraphAreaX2-$Data["YMargin"],$Y,array("R"=>$VerticalLineR,"G"=>$VerticalLineG,"B"=>$VerticalLineB,"Alpha"=>$VerticalLineAlpha,"Ticks"=>$VerticalLineTicks)); }
5682: 
5683:          $MinX = $this->GraphAreaX2;
5684:          foreach ($SeriesName as $Key => $SerieName)
5685:           {
5686:            if ( isset($Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Index]) )
5687:             {
5688:              $AxisID      = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Axis"];
5689: 
5690:              if ( $OverrideTitle != NULL)
5691:               $Description = $OverrideTitle;
5692:              elseif ( count($SeriesName) == 1 )
5693:               {
5694:                if ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) && isset($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index]) )
5695:                 $Description = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Description"]." - ".$Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index];
5696:                else
5697:                 $Description = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Description"];
5698:               }
5699:              elseif ( isset($Data["Abscissa"]) && isset($Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index]) )
5700:               $Description = $Data["Series"][$Data["Abscissa"]]["Data"][$Index];
5701: 
5702:              $AxisMode     = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Display"];
5703:              $AxisFormat   = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Format"];
5704:              $AxisUnit     = $Data["Axis"][$AxisID]["Unit"];
5705: 
5706:              $Serie = "";
5707:              if ( isset($Data["Extended"]["Palette"][$Index] ) )
5708:               {
5709:                $Serie["R"] = $Data["Extended"]["Palette"][$Index]["R"];
5710:                $Serie["G"] = $Data["Extended"]["Palette"][$Index]["G"];
5711:                $Serie["B"] = $Data["Extended"]["Palette"][$Index]["B"];
5712:                $Serie["Alpha"] = $Data["Extended"]["Palette"][$Index]["Alpha"];
5713:               }
5714:              else
5715:               {
5716:                $Serie["R"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["R"];
5717:                $Serie["G"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["G"];
5718:                $Serie["B"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["B"];
5719:                $Serie["Alpha"] = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Color"]["Alpha"];
5720:               }
5721: 
5722:              if ( count($SeriesName) == 1 && isset($Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"]) )
5723:               $SerieOffset = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["XOffset"];
5724:              else
5725:               $SerieOffset = 0;
5726: 
5727:              $Value = $Data["Series"][$SerieName]["Data"][$Index];
5728:              if ( $ForceLabels != NULL )
5729:               $Caption = isset($ForceLabels[$Key]) ? $ForceLabels[$Key] : "Not set";
5730:              else
5731:               $Caption = $this->scaleFormat($Value,$AxisMode,$AxisFormat,$AxisUnit);
5732:              if ( $Value == VOID ) { $Value = "NaN"; }
5733: 
5734:              if ( $this->LastChartLayout == CHART_LAST_LAYOUT_STACKED )
5735:               {
5736:                if ( $Value >=0 ) { $LookFor = "+"; } else { $LookFor = "-"; }
5737: 
5738:                $Value = 0; $Done = FALSE;
5739:                foreach($Data["Series"] as $Name => $SerieLookup)
5740:                 {
5741:                  if ( $SerieLookup["isDrawable"] == TRUE && $Name != $Data["Abscissa"] && !$Done )
5742:                   {
5743:                    if ( isset($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]) && $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] != VOID )
5744:                     {
5745:                      if ($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] >= 0 && $LookFor == "+" ) { $Value = $Value + $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]; }
5746:                      if ($Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index] < 0 && $LookFor == "-" )  { $Value = $Value - $Data["Series"][$Name]["Data"][$Index]; }
5747:                      if ($Name == $SerieName ) { $Done = TRUE; }
5748:                     }
5749:                   }
5750:                 }
5751:               }
5752: 
5753:              $X = floor($this->scaleComputeY($Value,array("AxisID"=>$AxisID)));
5754:              $Y = floor($this->GraphAreaY1 + $XMargin + $Index * $XStep + $SerieOffset);
5755: 
5756:              if ($X < $MinX) { $MinX = $X; }
5757: 
5758:              if ( $DrawPoint == LABEL_POINT_CIRCLE )
5759:               $this->drawFilledCircle($X,$Y,3,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"BorderR"=>0,"BorderG"=>0,"BorderB"=>0));
5760:              elseif ( $DrawPoint == LABEL_POINT_BOX )
5761:               $this->drawFilledRectangle($X-2,$Y-2,$X+2,$Y+2,array("R"=>255,"G"=>255,"B"=>255,"BorderR"=>0,"BorderG"=>0,"BorderB"=>0));
5762: 
5763:              $Series[] = array("Format"=>$Serie,"Caption"=>$Caption);
5764:             }
5765:           }
5766:          $this->drawLabelBox($MinX,$Y-3,$Description,$Series,$Format);
5767: 
5768:         }
5769:       }
5770:     }
5771: 
5772:    /* Draw a label box */
5773:    function drawLabelBox($X,$Y,$Title,$Captions,$Format="")
5774:     {
5775:      $NoTitle       = isset($Format["NoTitle"]) ? $Format["NoTitle"] : NULL;
5776:      $BoxWidth      = isset($Format["BoxWidth"]) ? $Format["BoxWidth"] : 50;
5777:      $DrawSerieColor    = isset($Format["DrawSerieColor"]) ? $Format["DrawSerieColor"] : TRUE;
5778:      $SerieR        = isset($Format["SerieR"]) ? $Format["SerieR"] : NULL;
5779:      $SerieG        = isset($Format["SerieG"]) ? $Format["SerieG"] : NULL;
5780:      $SerieB        = isset($Format["SerieB"]) ? $Format["SerieB"] : NULL;
5781:      $SerieAlpha    = isset($Format["SerieAlpha"]) ? $Format["SerieAlpha"] : NULL;
5782:      $SerieBoxSize  = isset($Format["SerieBoxSize"]) ? $Format["SerieBoxSize"] : 6;
5783:      $SerieBoxSpacing   = isset($Format["SerieBoxSpacing"]) ? $Format["SerieBoxSpacing"] : 4;
5784:      $VerticalMargin    = isset($Format["VerticalMargin"]) ? $Format["VerticalMargin"] : 10;
5785:      $HorizontalMargin  = isset($Format["HorizontalMargin"]) ? $Format["HorizontalMargin"] : 8;
5786:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : $this->FontColorR;
5787:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : $this->FontColorG;
5788:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : $this->FontColorB;
5789:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : $this->FontColorA;
5790:      $FontName      = isset($Format["FontName"]) ? $Format["FontName"] : $this->FontName;
5791:      $FontSize      = isset($Format["FontSize"]) ? $Format["FontSize"] : $this->FontSize;
5792:      $TitleMode     = isset($Format["TitleMode"]) ? $Format["TitleMode"] : LABEL_TITLE_NOBACKGROUND;
5793:      $TitleR        = isset($Format["TitleR"]) ? $Format["TitleR"] : $R;
5794:      $TitleG        = isset($Format["TitleG"]) ? $Format["TitleG"] : $G;
5795:      $TitleB        = isset($Format["TitleB"]) ? $Format["TitleB"] : $B;
5796:      $TitleBackgroundR  = isset($Format["TitleBackgroundR"]) ? $Format["TitleBackgroundR"] : 0;
5797:      $TitleBackgroundG  = isset($Format["TitleBackgroundG"]) ? $Format["TitleBackgroundG"] : 0;
5798:      $TitleBackgroundB  = isset($Format["TitleBackgroundB"]) ? $Format["TitleBackgroundB"] : 0;
5799:      $GradientStartR    = isset($Format["GradientStartR"]) ? $Format["GradientStartR"] : 255;
5800:      $GradientStartG    = isset($Format["GradientStartG"]) ? $Format["GradientStartG"] : 255;
5801:      $GradientStartB    = isset($Format["GradientStartB"]) ? $Format["GradientStartB"] : 255;
5802:      $GradientEndR  = isset($Format["GradientEndR"]) ? $Format["GradientEndR"] : 220;
5803:      $GradientEndG  = isset($Format["GradientEndG"]) ? $Format["GradientEndG"] : 220;
5804:      $GradientEndB  = isset($Format["GradientEndB"]) ? $Format["GradientEndB"] : 220;
5805: 
5806:      if ( !$DrawSerieColor ) { $SerieBoxSize = 0; $SerieBoxSpacing = 0; }
5807: 
5808:      $TxtPos      = $this->getTextBox($X,$Y,$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Title);
5809:      $TitleWidth  = ($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"])+$VerticalMargin*2;
5810:      $TitleHeight = ($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $TxtPos[2]["Y"]);
5811: 
5812:      if ( $NoTitle ) { $TitleWidth = 0; $TitleHeight = 0; }
5813: 
5814:      $CaptionWidth = 0; $CaptionHeight = -$HorizontalMargin;
5815:      foreach($Captions as $Key =>$Caption)
5816:       {
5817:        $TxtPos        = $this->getTextBox($X,$Y,$FontName,$FontSize,0,$Caption["Caption"]);
5818:        $CaptionWidth  = max($CaptionWidth,($TxtPos[1]["X"] - $TxtPos[0]["X"])+$VerticalMargin*2);
5819:        $CaptionHeight = $CaptionHeight + max(($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $TxtPos[2]["Y"]),($SerieBoxSize+2)) + $HorizontalMargin;
5820:       }
5821: 
5822:      if ( $CaptionHeight <= 5 ) { $CaptionHeight = $CaptionHeight + $HorizontalMargin/2; }
5823: 
5824:      if ( $DrawSerieColor ) { $CaptionWidth = $CaptionWidth + $SerieBoxSize + $SerieBoxSpacing; }
5825: 
5826:      $BoxWidth = max($BoxWidth,$TitleWidth,$CaptionWidth);
5827: 
5828:      $XMin = $X - 5 - floor(($BoxWidth-10) / 2);
5829:      $XMax = $X + 5 + floor(($BoxWidth-10) / 2);
5830: 
5831:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
5832:      if ( $this->Shadow == TRUE )
5833:       {
5834:        $this->Shadow = FALSE;
5835: 
5836:        $Poly = "";
5837:        $Poly[] = $X+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y+$this->ShadowX;
5838:        $Poly[] = $X+5+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5+$this->ShadowX;
5839:        $Poly[] = $XMax+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5+$this->ShadowX;
5840: 
5841:        if ( $NoTitle )
5842:         {
5843:          $Poly[] = $XMax+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2+$this->ShadowX;
5844:          $Poly[] = $XMin+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2+$this->ShadowX;
5845:         }
5846:        else
5847:         {
5848:          $Poly[] = $XMax+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3+$this->ShadowX;
5849:          $Poly[] = $XMin+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3+$this->ShadowX;
5850:         }
5851: 
5852:        $Poly[] = $XMin+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5+$this->ShadowX;
5853:        $Poly[] = $X-5+$this->ShadowX; $Poly[] = $Y-5+$this->ShadowX;
5854:        $this->drawPolygon($Poly,array("R"=>$this->ShadowR,"G"=>$this->ShadowG,"B"=>$this->ShadowB,"Alpha"=>$this->Shadowa));
5855:       }
5856: 
5857:      /* Draw the background */
5858:      $GradientSettings = array("StartR"=>$GradientStartR,"StartG"=>$GradientStartG,"StartB"=>$GradientStartB,"EndR"=>$GradientEndR,"EndG"=>$GradientEndG,"EndB"=>$GradientEndB);
5859:      if ( $NoTitle )
5860:       $this->drawGradientArea($XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMax,$Y-6,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientSettings);
5861:      else
5862:       $this->drawGradientArea($XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax,$Y-6,DIRECTION_VERTICAL,$GradientSettings);
5863:      $Poly = ""; $Poly[] = $X; $Poly[] = $Y; $Poly[] = $X-5; $Poly[] = $Y-5; $Poly[] = $X+5; $Poly[] = $Y-5;
5864:      $this->drawPolygon($Poly,array("R"=>$GradientEndR,"G"=>$GradientEndG,"B"=>$GradientEndB,"NoBorder"=>TRUE));
5865: 
5866:      /* Outer border */
5867:      $OuterBorderColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,100,100,100,100);
5868:      imageline($this->Picture,$XMin,$Y-5,$X-5,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5869:      imageline($this->Picture,$X,$Y,$X-5,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5870:      imageline($this->Picture,$X,$Y,$X+5,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5871:      imageline($this->Picture,$X+5,$Y-5,$XMax,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5872:      if ( $NoTitle )
5873:       {
5874:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMin,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5875:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMax,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMax,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5876:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMax,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$OuterBorderColor);
5877:       }
5878:      else
5879:       {
5880:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMin,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5881:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMax,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax,$Y-5,$OuterBorderColor);
5882:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$OuterBorderColor);
5883:       }
5884: 
5885:      /* Inner border */
5886:      $InnerBorderColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,255,255,255,100);
5887:      imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-6,$X-5,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5888:      imageline($this->Picture,$X,$Y-1,$X-5,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5889:      imageline($this->Picture,$X,$Y-1,$X+5,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5890:      imageline($this->Picture,$X+5,$Y-6,$XMax-1,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5891:      if ( $NoTitle )
5892:       {
5893:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMin+1,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5894:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMax-1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMax-1,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5895:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$XMax-1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$InnerBorderColor);
5896:       }
5897:      else
5898:       {
5899:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMin+1,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5900:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMax-1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax-1,$Y-6,$InnerBorderColor);
5901:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax-1,$Y-4-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$InnerBorderColor);
5902:       }
5903: 
5904:      /* Draw the separator line */
5905:      if ( $TitleMode == LABEL_TITLE_NOBACKGROUND && !$NoTitle )
5906:       {
5907:        $YPos    = $Y-7-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin-$HorizontalMargin/2;
5908:        $XMargin = $VerticalMargin / 2;
5909:        $this->drawLine($XMin+$XMargin,$YPos+1,$XMax-$XMargin,$YPos+1,array("R"=>$GradientEndR,"G"=>$GradientEndG,"B"=>$GradientEndB));
5910:        $this->drawLine($XMin+$XMargin,$YPos,$XMax-$XMargin,$YPos,array("R"=>$GradientStartR,"G"=>$GradientStartG,"B"=>$GradientStartB));
5911:       }
5912:      elseif ( $TitleMode == LABEL_TITLE_BACKGROUND )
5913:       {
5914:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($XMin,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*3,$XMax,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin+$HorizontalMargin/2,array("R"=>$TitleBackgroundR,"G"=>$TitleBackgroundG,"B"=>$TitleBackgroundB));
5915:        imageline($this->Picture,$XMin+1,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin+$HorizontalMargin/2+1,$XMax-1,$Y-5-$TitleHeight-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin+$HorizontalMargin/2+1,$InnerBorderColor);
5916:       }
5917: 
5918:      /* Write the description */
5919:      if ( !$NoTitle )
5920:       $this->drawText($XMin+$VerticalMargin,$Y-7-$CaptionHeight-$HorizontalMargin*2,$Title,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMLEFT,"R"=>$TitleR,"G"=>$TitleG,"B"=>$TitleB));
5921: 
5922:      /* Write the value */
5923:      $YPos = $Y-5-$HorizontalMargin; $XPos = $XMin+$VerticalMargin+$SerieBoxSize+$SerieBoxSpacing;
5924:      foreach($Captions as $Key => $Caption)
5925:       {
5926:        $CaptionTxt    = $Caption["Caption"];
5927:        $TxtPos        = $this->getTextBox($XPos,$YPos,$FontName,$FontSize,0,$CaptionTxt);
5928:        $CaptionHeight = ($TxtPos[0]["Y"] - $TxtPos[2]["Y"]);
5929: 
5930:        /* Write the serie color if needed */
5931:        if ( $DrawSerieColor )
5932:         {
5933:          $BoxSettings = array("R"=>$Caption["Format"]["R"],"G"=>$Caption["Format"]["G"],"B"=>$Caption["Format"]["B"],"Alpha"=>$Caption["Format"]["Alpha"],"BorderR"=>0,"BorderG"=>0,"BorderB"=>0);
5934:          $this->drawFilledRectangle($XMin+$VerticalMargin,$YPos-$SerieBoxSize,$XMin+$VerticalMargin+$SerieBoxSize,$YPos,$BoxSettings);
5935:         }
5936: 
5937:        $this->drawText($XPos,$YPos,$CaptionTxt,array("Align"=>TEXT_ALIGN_BOTTOMLEFT));
5938: 
5939:        $YPos = $YPos - $CaptionHeight - $HorizontalMargin;
5940:       }
5941: 
5942:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
5943:     }
5944: 
5945:    /* Draw a basic shape */
5946:    function drawShape($X,$Y,$Shape,$PlotSize,$PlotBorder,$BorderSize,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha,$BorderR,$BorderG,$BorderB,$BorderAlpha)
5947:     {
5948:      if ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_FILLEDCIRCLE )
5949:       {
5950:        if ( $PlotBorder ) { $this->drawFilledCircle($X,$Y,$PlotSize+$BorderSize,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha)); }
5951:        $this->drawFilledCircle($X,$Y,$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5952:       }
5953:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_FILLEDSQUARE )
5954:       {
5955:        if ( $PlotBorder ) { $this->drawFilledRectangle($X-$PlotSize-$BorderSize,$Y-$PlotSize-$BorderSize,$X+$PlotSize+$BorderSize,$Y+$PlotSize+$BorderSize,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha)); }
5956:        $this->drawFilledRectangle($X-$PlotSize,$Y-$PlotSize,$X+$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5957:       }
5958:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_FILLEDTRIANGLE )
5959:       {
5960:        if ( $PlotBorder )
5961:         {
5962:          $Pos = ""; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y-$PlotSize-$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$X-$PlotSize-$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize+$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$X+$PlotSize+$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize+$BorderSize;
5963:          $this->drawPolygon($Pos,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha));
5964:         }
5965: 
5966:        $Pos = ""; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$X-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$X+$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize;
5967:        $this->drawPolygon($Pos,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5968:       }
5969:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_TRIANGLE )
5970:       {
5971:        $this->drawLine($X,$Y-$PlotSize,$X-$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5972:        $this->drawLine($X-$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,$X+$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5973:        $this->drawLine($X+$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,$X,$Y-$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5974:       }
5975:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_SQUARE )
5976:       $this->drawRectangle($X-$PlotSize,$Y-$PlotSize,$X+$PlotSize,$Y+$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5977:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_CIRCLE )
5978:       $this->drawCircle($X,$Y,$PlotSize,$PlotSize,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5979:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_DIAMOND )
5980:       {
5981:        $Pos = ""; $Pos[]=$X-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$X+$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize;
5982:        $this->drawPolygon($Pos,array("NoFill"=>TRUE,"BorderR"=>$R,"BorderG"=>$G,"BorderB"=>$B,"BorderAlpha"=>$Alpha));
5983:       }      
5984:      elseif ( $Shape == SERIE_SHAPE_FILLEDDIAMOND )
5985:       {
5986:        if ( $PlotBorder )
5987:         {
5988:          $Pos = ""; $Pos[]=$X-$PlotSize-$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y-$PlotSize-$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$X+$PlotSize+$BorderSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize+$BorderSize;
5989:          $this->drawPolygon($Pos,array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha));
5990:         }
5991: 
5992:        $Pos = ""; $Pos[]=$X-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y-$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$X+$PlotSize; $Pos[]=$Y; $Pos[]=$X; $Pos[]=$Y+$PlotSize;
5993:        $this->drawPolygon($Pos,array("R"=>$R,"G"=>$G,"B"=>$B,"Alpha"=>$Alpha));
5994:       }      
5995:     }
5996: 
5997:    function drawPolygonChart($Points,$Format="")
5998:     {
5999:      $R         = isset($Format["R"]) ? $Format["R"] : 0;
6000:      $G         = isset($Format["G"]) ? $Format["G"] : 0;
6001:      $B         = isset($Format["B"]) ? $Format["B"] : 0;
6002:      $Alpha     = isset($Format["Alpha"]) ? $Format["Alpha"] : 100;
6003:      $NoFill        = isset($Format["NoFill"]) ? $Format["NoFill"] : FALSE;
6004:      $NoBorder      = isset($Format["NoBorder"]) ? $Format["NoBorder"] : FALSE;
6005:      $BorderR       = isset($Format["BorderR"]) ? $Format["BorderR"] : $R;
6006:      $BorderG       = isset($Format["BorderG"]) ? $Format["BorderG"] : $G;
6007:      $BorderB       = isset($Format["BorderB"]) ? $Format["BorderB"] : $B;
6008:      $BorderAlpha   = isset($Format["BorderAlpha"]) ? $Format["BorderAlpha"] : $Alpha / 2;
6009:      $Surrounding   = isset($Format["Surrounding"]) ? $Format["Surrounding"] : NULL;
6010:      $Threshold         = isset($Format["Threshold"]) ? $Format["Threshold"] : NULL;
6011: 
6012:      if ( $Surrounding != NULL ) { $BorderR = $R+$Surrounding; $BorderG = $G+$Surrounding; $BorderB = $B+$Surrounding; }
6013: 
6014:      $RestoreShadow = $this->Shadow;
6015:      $this->Shadow = FALSE;
6016: 
6017:      $AllIntegers = TRUE;
6018:      for($i=0;$i<=count($Points)-2;$i=$i+2)
6019:       { if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($Points[$i+1]) != 0 ) { $AllIntegers = FALSE; } }
6020: 
6021:      /* Convert polygon to segments */
6022:      $Segments = "";
6023:      for($i=2;$i<=count($Points)-2;$i=$i+2)
6024:       { $Segments[] = array("X1"=>$Points[$i-2],"Y1"=>$Points[$i-1],"X2"=>$Points[$i],"Y2"=>$Points[$i+1]); }
6025:      $Segments[] = array("X1"=>$Points[$i-2],"Y1"=>$Points[$i-1],"X2"=>$Points[0],"Y2"=>$Points[1]);
6026: 
6027:      /* Simplify straight lines */
6028:      $Result = ""; $inHorizon = FALSE; $LastX = VOID;
6029:      foreach($Segments as $Key => $Pos)
6030:       {
6031:        if ( $Pos["Y1"] != $Pos["Y2"] )
6032:         {
6033:          if ( $inHorizon ) { $inHorizon = FALSE; $Result[] = array("X1"=>$LastX,"Y1"=>$Pos["Y1"],"X2"=>$Pos["X1"],"Y2"=>$Pos["Y1"]); }
6034: 
6035:          $Result[] = array("X1"=>$Pos["X1"],"Y1"=>$Pos["Y1"],"X2"=>$Pos["X2"],"Y2"=>$Pos["Y2"]);
6036:         }
6037:        else { if ( !$inHorizon ) { $inHorizon = TRUE; $LastX = $Pos["X1"];} }
6038:       }
6039:      $Segments = $Result;
6040: 
6041:      /* Do we have something to draw */
6042:      if ( $Segments == "" ) { return(0); }
6043: 
6044:      /* For segments debugging purpose */
6045:      //foreach($Segments as $Key => $Pos)
6046:      // echo $Pos["X1"].",".$Pos["Y1"].",".$Pos["X2"].",".$Pos["Y2"]."\r\n";
6047: 
6048:      /* Find out the min & max Y boundaries */
6049:      $MinY = OUT_OF_SIGHT; $MaxY = OUT_OF_SIGHT;
6050:      foreach($Segments as $Key => $Coords)
6051:       {
6052:        if ( $MinY == OUT_OF_SIGHT || $MinY > min($Coords["Y1"],$Coords["Y2"]) ) { $MinY = min($Coords["Y1"],$Coords["Y2"]); }
6053:        if ( $MaxY == OUT_OF_SIGHT || $MaxY < max($Coords["Y1"],$Coords["Y2"]) ) { $MaxY = max($Coords["Y1"],$Coords["Y2"]); }
6054:       }
6055: 
6056:      if ( $AllIntegers ) { $YStep = 1; } else { $YStep = .5; }
6057: 
6058:      $MinY = floor($MinY); $MaxY = floor($MaxY);
6059: 
6060:      /* Scan each Y lines */
6061:      $DefaultColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
6062:      $DebugLine = 0; $DebugColor = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,255,0,0,100);
6063: 
6064:      $MinY = floor($MinY); $MaxY = floor($MaxY); $YStep = 1; 
6065: 
6066:      if ( !$NoFill )
6067:       {
6068:        //if ( $DebugLine ) { $MinY = $DebugLine; $MaxY = $DebugLine; }
6069:        for($Y=$MinY;$Y<=$MaxY;$Y=$Y+$YStep)
6070:         {
6071:          $Intersections = ""; $LastSlope = NULL; $RestoreLast = "-";
6072:          foreach($Segments as $Key => $Coords)
6073:           {
6074:            $X1 = $Coords["X1"]; $X2 = $Coords["X2"]; $Y1 = $Coords["Y1"]; $Y2 = $Coords["Y2"];
6075: 
6076:            if ( min($Y1,$Y2) <= $Y && max($Y1,$Y2) >= $Y )
6077:             {
6078:              if ( $Y1 == $Y2 )
6079:               { $X = $X1; }
6080:              else
6081:               { $X = $X1 + ( ($Y-$Y1)*$X2 - ($Y-$Y1)*$X1 ) / ($Y2-$Y1); }
6082: 
6083:              $X = floor($X);
6084: 
6085:              if ( $X2 == $X1 )
6086:               { $Slope = "!"; }
6087:              else
6088:               {
6089:                $SlopeC = ($Y2 - $Y1) / ($X2 - $X1);
6090:                if( $SlopeC == 0 )
6091:                 { $Slope = "="; }
6092:                elseif( $SlopeC > 0 )
6093:                 { $Slope = "+"; }
6094:                elseif ( $SlopeC < 0 )
6095:                 { $Slope = "-"; }
6096:               }
6097: 
6098:              if ( !is_array($Intersections) )
6099:               { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6100:              elseif( !in_array($X,$Intersections) )
6101:               { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6102:              elseif( in_array($X,$Intersections) )
6103:               {
6104:                if ($Y == $DebugLine) { echo $Slope."/".$LastSlope."(".$X.") "; }
6105: 
6106:                if ( $Slope == "=" && $LastSlope == "-"  )                             { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6107:                if ( $Slope != $LastSlope && $LastSlope != "!" && $LastSlope != "=" )  { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6108:                if ( $Slope != $LastSlope && $LastSlope == "!" && $Slope == "+" )      { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6109:               }
6110: 
6111:              if ( is_array($Intersections) && in_array($X,$Intersections) && $LastSlope == "=" && ($Slope == "-" )) { $Intersections[] = $X; }
6112: 
6113:              $LastSlope = $Slope;
6114:             }
6115:           }
6116:          if ( $RestoreLast != "-" ) { $Intersections[] = $RestoreLast; echo "@".$Y."\r\n"; }
6117: 
6118:          if ( is_array($Intersections) )
6119:           {
6120:            sort($Intersections);
6121: 
6122:            if ($Y == $DebugLine) { print_r($Intersections); }
6123: 
6124:            /* Remove NULL plots */
6125:            $Result = "";
6126:            for($i=0;$i<=count($Intersections)-1;$i=$i+2)
6127:             {
6128:              if ( isset($Intersections[$i+1]) )
6129:               { if ( $Intersections[$i] != $Intersections[$i+1] ) { $Result[] = $Intersections[$i]; $Result[] = $Intersections[$i+1]; } }
6130:             }
6131: 
6132:            if ( is_array($Result) )
6133:             {
6134:              $Intersections = $Result;
6135: 
6136:              $LastX = OUT_OF_SIGHT;
6137:              foreach($Intersections as $Key => $X)
6138:               {
6139:                if ( $LastX == OUT_OF_SIGHT )
6140:                 $LastX = $X;
6141:                elseif ( $LastX != OUT_OF_SIGHT )
6142:                 {
6143:                  if ( $this->getFirstDecimal($LastX) > 1 ) { $LastX++; }
6144: 
6145:                  $Color = $DefaultColor;
6146:                  if ( $Threshold != NULL )
6147:                   {
6148:                    foreach($Threshold as $Key => $Parameters)
6149:                     {
6150:                      if ( $Y <= $Parameters["MinX"] && $Y >= $Parameters["MaxX"])
6151:                       {
6152:                        if ( isset($Parameters["R"]) ) { $R = $Parameters["R"]; } else { $R = 0; }
6153:                        if ( isset($Parameters["G"]) ) { $G = $Parameters["G"]; } else { $G = 0; }
6154:                        if ( isset($Parameters["B"]) ) { $B = $Parameters["B"]; } else { $B = 0; }
6155:                        if ( isset($Parameters["Alpha"]) ) { $Alpha = $Parameters["Alpha"]; } else { $Alpha = 100; }
6156:                        $Color = $this->allocateColor($this->Picture,$R,$G,$B,$Alpha);
6157:                       }
6158:                     }
6159:                   }
6160: 
6161:                  imageline($this->Picture,$LastX,$Y,$X,$Y,$Color);
6162: 
6163:                  if ( $Y == $DebugLine) { imageline($this->Picture,$LastX,$Y,$X,$Y,$DebugColor); }
6164: 
6165:                  $LastX = OUT_OF_SIGHT;
6166:                 }
6167:               }
6168:             }
6169:           }
6170:         }
6171:       }
6172: 
6173:      /* Draw the polygon border, if required */
6174:      if ( !$NoBorder)
6175:       {
6176:        foreach($Segments as $Key => $Coords)
6177:         $this->drawLine($Coords["X1"],$Coords["Y1"],$Coords["X2"],$Coords["Y2"],array("R"=>$BorderR,"G"=>$BorderG,"B"=>$BorderB,"Alpha"=>$BorderAlpha,"Threshold"=>$Threshold));
6178:       }
6179: 
6180:      $this->Shadow = $RestoreShadow;
6181:     }
6182: 
6183:    /* Return the abscissa margin */
6184:    function getAbscissaMargin($Data)
6185:     {
6186:      foreach($Data["Axis"] as $AxisID => $Values) { if ( $Values["Identity"] == AXIS_X ) { return($Values["Margin"]); } }
6187:      return(0);
6188:     }
6189: 
6190:   }
6191: ?>
AdIS API documentation generated by ApiGen 2.7.0
